1.content:
You really needed this weekend. School wasn't really stressing you out, it was just that this week felt like it was going by so slowly. As you get home, you fumble around your pocket for the key and get inside.


"Afternoon, [your name]!" says Spike.


"Hey, Spike." you say.


"Where's Twilight?" he asks.


"She'll be here soon." you say. "She's over at Fluttershy's helping her with the animals."


Spike nods his head and you go to your room. Right then, you get a phone call from none other than Princess Celestia.


"Hello?" you say as you answer the phone.


"Hello, [your name]! It's Auntie Celeste!" says the princess. She always insisted on you calling her that since she was very good friends with your parents, especially your mother. "I just called to see how everything's been."


You appreciate the check-up call, but found it rather embarrassing and rather unnecessary. "Auntie Celeste, I've been living here for two and a half years, I'm pretty much adjusted."


"That doesn't mean I can't still ask how you're doing." she says.


"Fine, same as always." you say.


"Well, okay then." she says, sensing that you didn't feel like talking. "Bye." After you hang up, you get five texts at the same time, all from five different people, or should I say ponies. You read one text after another.


Rainbow Dash: Yo, could use someone 2 help my time my laps @ the track. Hook a pony up?


Pinkie Pie: Hiiiiiiiii! Need someone 2 try this new muffin recipe I'm trying out. Pwetty plz?


Rarity: Good afternoon, [your name]. Need your artistic opinion on my new line. Could you swing by the boutique?


Applejack: Howdy, could use an extra pair of eyes 2 watch my sister since Big Mac is out. Up 4 it?


Twilight: Fluttershy needed more help than she thought. Help us out?


Who do you decide to help out?
1.title: Weekend Plans

11.content:
You look at Rainbow Dash's Letter, you and Rainbow are the best of friends. You both are very good athletes even if Rainbow Dash beat you in races all the time. You consider it and decide that is in your best interest to help Rainbow Dash out first. You text her back on your phone stating that you are in for the idea. She replies to you with a powerful thanks and tells you to get there as fast as you can. You decide to reply and state that you will be there in a few minutes.

You soon head over to the Race Track and meet Rainbow Dash there and you see that Dash is wearing a Two-piece gym outfit. You see Rainbow stretching her wings and legs.
"Hey Dash, I'm here." you say.

"Awesome, Glad you could make it" Rainbow Dash replies.

"Ok, I need you to help me time my laps." Rainbow Dash says,

"Let's see if we can try to get a new record today."

"Alright Dash, get on the starting line." you state.

"On your mark." you say.

"Get Set" Rainbow says readying her wings.

"GO!" you say as you start the stopwatch.

Rainbow Dash roars around the track at an amazing speed and you look at the stopwatch.
Rainbow then crosses the finishing point and you stop the timer.
Rainbow Dash then looks with you at the time 5.27

"Awesome, that's a new record!" Dash says excitedly.

"You said it Rainbow Dash" you say proudly.

"You know, maybe you and I could hang out again later at my place?" Rainbow Dash asks.

"Rainbow, you and I both know I don't have wings" you tell her.

"No Problem, just ask Twilight to cast a spell that will allow you to walk on Clouds, I'll ask Pinkie for permission for you to borrow her Hot air Balloon" Rainbow Dash says beaming.

"Well.......Ok! If you say so Dash" you reply.

"What time should we meet at?" Rainbow Dash asks you.

"How does a quarter after 4:00 sound to you Dash?" you reply.

"That will be great, I'll see you at 4:15 at my house" Rainbow Dash says.

"Alright, see you later Dash" you reply.

You and Dash both brohoof and Rainbow Dash flies off

"Alright then, who should I help next?" you ponder
11.title: Rainbow

112.content:
You look at your watch and check the time.

"1:30, 2 hours and 45 minutes until my meet up with Rainbow Dash" you say.

You make it to Sweet Apple Acres, AJ is a good friend of yours, she is very reliable and always honest with you.

"Howdy there Sugarcube, Glad you could muster the time to get here." Applejack says.

"Well, I decided that I would have time to help you out. By the way how long will this take?" you ask her.

"It will take about an hour and thirty minutes." Applejack says.

"Great!" you say.

"Applebloom, <Your Name> is going to be helping me watch ya for a bit" Applejack says.

"Howdy there <Your Name>, I'm Applebloom, I can't wait to spend some time with you and Applejack"

"I am sure it will be fun." you reply to Applebloom.

"Also <Your Name>, Ah think it would be wise to let Twilight know where you are so she does not worry about ya." Applejack tells you.

"You're Right AJ, I'll do that right now" you say.

You take out your cell phone and dial Twilight's number.

"Hello?" Twilight answers the phone.

"Hey Twilight, I am going to be helping Applejack watch Applebloom for a bit and then I will be at Rainbow Dash's" you explain.

"Ok, Just make sure you are back at around 8:00 or I will start to get worried" Twilight says.

"Don't Worry I will" you say.

"Good, I'll keep in touch" She says.

"Alright, I'll see you later Twilight" you say.

"Bye <Your Name>" she says as she hangs up.

"So what are we going to do?" you ask.

"Well we need to help Applebloom with her homework." Applejack says.

"Ok, so what is the subject?" you ask her.

"Mathematics!" Applebloom answers.

"Ugh...." you groan realizing how much you hated math.

"What is the topic?" you ask.

"It's graphing Coordinates" Applebloom says.

"This is actually easy" you say.

"Applejack do you have graph paper?" you ask.

"Ah Sure do, just give me a second" she says.

She leaves for a minute and comes back with 5 sheets of graph paper

You instruct Applebloom on how to do it and she soon gets her work done!

You look at your watch and see its 3:00,

"I got to go Applejack!" you say.

"Alright Sugarcube, thanks for helping out" Applejack says.

"Ok, I need to get home and talk to Twilight" you think.
112.title: Go help Applejack

1121.content:
You make it home and see Twilight.
"<Your Name>, I thought you were going to Rainbow's place!" she says in a surprised tone.
"I need you to cast a spell that will allow me to walk on clouds, I am a human after all" you explain.
Twilight looks at you and smiles. And then she starts to go through her bookshelf to find the spellbook.
"Where is it! Where is it!" she says frantically!

"What's wrong Twilight?" you ask her.
"I can't find the spellbook, If I can't find it then I can't help you stand on clouds" she says worriedly. She gets an idea!
"SPIKE!" she calls.
The purple and green dragon comes running downstairs.
"What is it Twilight?" he asks.

"Where is my Spellbook, the one that contains the cloud walking spell?" she tells him, still worried.
He gets the book from the top shelf. "It's right here Twilight, it was on the top shelf, I am surprised you did not see it" he says.
She slaps her face in stupidity "How could I be so careless? Thanks Spike" She says. "you may return to work."
Spike then heads back upstairs to continue what he was doing.

"Sorry you had to see that <your name>." She says apologetically.
"It's ok, We all get stressed sometimes." you reply.
"Ok, Let's do the spell." she says.
Twilight opens the book and finds the cloud walking spell
"Ok, stand still" She instructs.
You listen and stand still. Twilight's horn glows purple and you feel a magical blast hit you.
"Ok, you should be able to walk on Clouds now." She says. "I'll be seeing you at 8:00"
"Alright Twilight, I'll see you later" you tell her.
Twilight gives you a hug and opens the exit allowing you to leave the treehouse
Ok, Next Stop: Rainbow Dash's house.
1121.title: Heading home

11211.content:
You look at your watch and it says 4:05. You seemed to have arrived quite early.
"Hey <Your Name>, up here!" a voice says.
You look up and see it is your best friend Rainbow Dash.
"Hey, your early" Rainbow Dash says. "I already got Pinkie's balloon set up" she states.
You get into the balloon and ride it up to Rainbow Dash's cloud house.
"I take it Twilight cast the cloud walking spell on you?" Rainbow Dash Questions.

"You got it Dash, though she sort of forgot it was on the top shelf" you say laughing.
"Ha, sometimes Twilight stresses herself out and ends up forgetting." Rainbow laughs. "Anyways, Let's go in" she says.
You follow Rainbow Dash inside and awe at how big it is.
"Welcome to the House of Awesomeness" Rainbow brags.
"This place is certainly awesome I have to admit!" you say impressed.

"So what do you want to do?" you ask.
"Wanna watch a movie?" She says.
"Sure!" you say. "What movies do you have?"
"The Adventures of Daring Do" she says.
"Awesome, Let's make some popcorn for the movie" you say.
"Ok" Rainbow Dash says.
11211.title: Heading to Rainbow Dash's home

112111.content:
The two of you sit together and watch the movie.
"This is really great, I love hanging out with you [Your Name]." Dash smiles as she watches.
The Two of you watch Daring Do and eat popcorn.
"I have always been such a big fan of Daring Do." you say.
"Really?" Rainbow Dash asks.
"Yeah, I love action movies with Daring Do." you reply to her.
"I guess that is one think we have in common." She says.

Rainbow smiles and wraps a hoof around you.
"I'm glad we get to hang out often." you say.
"I agree, It is so awesome being with you." Rainbow states.
Rainbow Smiles and soon the movie ends and you look at the time.
The time is 7:45.
"I gotta go home Dash." you say.
"Alright [Your name], see you tomorrow." She says as he gives you a playful slap on the back.
You smile as you get out of the house and fly down on the balloon.
"I better get home." you think.

Once you hit the ground, you head off to the Library to get home.
"I hope Twilight and Aunt Celestia aren't too worried of me." you say to yourself.
You soon make it to the library.
112111.title: To the movie

choices: "Of course I'm okay! Why wouldn't I be?"
112112.content:
When you get up to go with Rainbow Dash to her kitchen to pop some popcorn, she hears a jingling sound.


"What was that?" she asks.


"Oh, it's just this," you tell her, and you show her a charm that was attached to one of the loops of your pants. Rainbow immediately recognized it.


"Wait, you still have that charm I gave you?" she asks.


"Well, yeah," you say. "I really liked it, so I kept wearing it on my pants."


Rainbow Dash's mind goes back to when she first gave you that charm.


It was four months ago, Hearts and Hooves Day to be exact. Rainbow, you and the others had this tradition where you would all get each other Hearts and Hooves Day presents. She had given her gifts to everypony else, except for you. She missed you at lunch, and she didn't have any classes with you that day. When the last bell of the day rang, she waits for you by your locker. Once you get there, you're surprised to see her.


"Hey, Dashie," you say. "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day."


"Hi, [your name]," she says. "I didn't get to give you your present."


"Ditto," you say. "Here you go."


You hand Rainbow a large envelope, and she is stunned to see what was inside. This year, you decided to draw all your pony friends a portrait of them in costumes that suited their personalities. For Rainbow's picture, you drew her in Roman inspired armor that was rainbow colored.


"Wow, this is awesome!" she says. "Now I feel bad about what I got you."


"I'm sure it's great," you say. "What is it?"


Rainbow Dash reached into her pocket, and pulls out a small box. "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day," she says.


You open the box and see a charm of a lightning bolt in your favorite color, orange.


"Thanks, Dashie!" you say. "I really like this!" You then give the pegasus a hug as a thank you.


"Okay, relax," she says, embarrassed. "It's not like I like you or anything."


Rainbow didn't say anything, but she felt touched that you kept the charm after all that time. She expected you to lose it after a few weeks, but instead you held on to it.


"Thanks..." she says rather quietly.


"So, why don't we pop some popcorn?" you say.


"Oh, right!" she says, getting herself flustered. "Where's my head at?" she asks, more to herself than to you.


"You okay, Dashie?" you ask.


What does she say?
112112.title: Charmed, I'm Sure

choices: Yes, she wants to hear this.
No because that would make Rainbow be uneasy listening to you like this.
1121121.content:
You tilt your head sideways, wondering where is her head at. Usually, she's more organized than that, not as Twilight, mind you, but enough to keep attention to her objectives.

"Well, no offense, but you seem a bit off," you reply.

"Ah, it's nothing. I'll be back with the popcorn."

"Um--"

"Extra butter?" Rainbow interrupts. "Got it; right back!"

With a whooshing sound, she flees into the kitchen, leaving you confused. 'Dashie never acted this funny. Oh, well.' "Must be something bothering her," you softly say, somewhat loud enough that Rainbow hears that. You then see her pet turtle. "Hey,Tank."

She was about to go back to say something, but only goes back inside the kitchen, press herself against the wall, and breathe heavily to the mistake that she neary did.

"You idiot!" Dash says to herself. "You nearly blew it! All because of some charm that [your name] kept for so long, you nearly give yourself away!" She then takes a peek at you and see that you're holding it up again, admiring it as you usually do.

"(Sigh) Oh, Rainbow Dash..." you say. You could start a soliloquy and have Dash eavesdrop, or she could just go back to popping corn, which, you won't lie, always brought you back to Discord's reign of distortion. Pinkie Pie was so hilarious.

"Something seems off with you, Dashie, and I don't know why... Maybe because of this charm that you were robably expecting for me to lose, or the fact that it's all too special to me..."

Does Rainbow stay to hear the rest of what you're saying?
1121121.title: Contradiction suspicion

choices: She has it in a photo album of pictures of just you and her.
11211212.content:
"[Your name] thinks that charm is special to him?" Rainbow thinks to herself. "Funny. That's exactly how I feel about the drawing he made me. I should go back inside the kitchen, though. Hearing him monologue would probably make me queasy. I can't take that much mushiness in such a short amount of time."


The pegasus retired to her kitchen, where she was safely out of earshot. After setting the microwave to pop the popcorn, she waits for about two and a half minutes, then she takes the popped snack out of the microwave, pours it into a bowl, and returns to the living room to serve the snack.


"Popcorn's ready!" she says.


"Oh, already?" you say. I didn't notice how much time passed.


"You know," she says, "I still have the picture you made for me for Hearts and Hooves Day..."


"Really?" you ask. "I never scanned a copy of it. Can I see it?"


Rainbow Dash is stunned to hear you say that. "Um... sure. It's in my room. Follow me."


You follow the pegasus up to her bedroom, and she goes over to her dresser, where she kept all her important pictures. You then see that...
11211212.title: That's Enough For Now

112112122.content:
In a scrapbook, Rainbow Dash brings out the picture you drew in its page by its entirety. You were surprised to see that it was in perfect condition, not even yellowed at all. It seems that she takes this special as much as you do with her charm.

"Wow..." you start, losing yourself into the picture, especially how Rainbow looks like. "I can't believe this; it's like I'm seeing this for the first time and that it's made by you."

You didn't see it, but Dashie was nearly close to blushing. "Aw, it's nothing, really."

"'Nothing'? Dashie, I can tell this was special to you just how the charm is to me. Why else would you have this with all the other important pictures? Say, what are those anyway?"

Now the blush got stronger as Rainbow closes the binder. W-what? Oh, well, they're nothing, n-nothing." Her smile was bigger than usual, bigger than Fluttershy's hopeful smile to please Angel Bunny. Apparently, it takes you to calmly talk to him to even eat. Prick. You re the only person he isn't one towards.

Now this was funny. But what do you reply with?
112112122.title: Now your curiosity got the better...

1121121221.content:
"Okay then, if you say so," you say, taking her word for it.


Rainbow Dash is surprised at how easily you drop the subject. "Alright, let's go watch the movie," she says. "Besides, the popcorn must be getting cold."


Little does the pegasus know, you know that she had something in that album that she didn't want you to see. Even so, you decided to drop it and not pry into her personal business. You wouldn't want Rainbow to get mad at you. The two of you go downstairs to watch the movie, and you both enjoy yourselves. When the movie ends, you gat a call from Twilight.


"Hello?" you say.


"Hey, [your name]," she says. "It's a little late. When are you coming home?"


"Well, Dashie and I just finished our movie, so I can come home now," you say.


"Great! We have a big day ahead of us tomorrow!" she says. Before you can ask what she meant by that, Twilight hangs up. "Looks like I need to get going," you say. "I'll have to return Pinkie Pie's balloon, too."


"Well..." says Rainbow, "Why don't I fly you home, and I can return the balloon for you."


"Really?" you ask. "Thanks, Dashie!"


You and the pegasus walks outside, then she gets behind you. She wraps her arms around you tightly, then starts to flap her wings. "Ready?" she asks. "You're not scared, are you?"


"You kidding?" you say. "I'm not scared."


Dash smiles, and she takes flight. As you both fly over Ponyville, you enjoy the view, while Rainbow Dash blushes at the fact that she was hugging you so tightly. You both eventually reach the library, and the pegasus drops you off. "Well, this is the last stop," she says. "See you around."


"Ditto," you say. You watch Rainbow Dash as she flies back towards her place, then you enter the library to turn in for the night.


The next morning, Twilight uses an alarm to wake you up.


"Up and at 'em!" she says.


You fall out of your bed, stunned by the loudness of the alarm and Twilight's voice. "What the hell, Twi?" you ask.


"Did you forget what Monday is?" she asks back. "It's the start of final exam week, and you haven't studied at all!"


"I never study for finals."


"And therein lies the problem."


"I never needed to. I've always gotten good grades on the final without studying. You know that."


"Well, think of how much better you'll do if you do study!"


"I can't think of anything because my head is still ringing."


"C'mon, [your name]! Come downstairs to eat, then take a shower, and then it's studying time!"


"Can we at least invite the others?" you ask. If you were gonna suffer through this, you weren't gonna suffer alone.


What does Twilight say?
1121121221.title: "Okay, then, if you say so..."

choices: All correct, which is a shock to her.
11211212212.content:
Nope! We don't want any distractions at all!" Twilight says. 'Sheesh, what are you, my mother?' you thought.

It really sucked because it was torture, first of all, second, you really hoped to bring someone else into this. Rainbow Dash, to be specific. She especially needs help, not as much like Applejack, but enough for it to be considered. And furthermore, Twilight is a real bore and stuckup tutor!

If you were trying to pay attention, your mind ocassionally wanders off, forgetting the lst few seconds of critical info, since Twilight talks a bit too fast. For some reason though, you were actually making the whole study session being awake, which is usually two hours or 3.

Afer everything, your tutor forces a quiz on you which you somehow always manage to pass with at least 3 or 4 wrong. But Twilight was expecting for everything, and she meant every little detail, to be absolute. This scared you as you never have before. You even wonder if there is another side of Twilight that is a bit loose.

It's usually around this time where Twilight leaves and tends to Spike every now and then for what she asks him to do. With all that you can remember, you speed through the final part of Twilight's torture tutoring. When she comes back, you were already done, and sleeping. What? It's SO boring, you don't think Celestia can handle this. Then again, she's the Princess. Who knows..?

Oh, and was it mentioned that Twilight would punish you if you didn't follow her rules?

What were your results?
11211212212.title: Yep, didn't think so.

choices: Rainbow Dash, because you just like spending time with her.
Applejack, 'cause she definitely needs some help studying.
112112122122.content:
You were doing good during this quiz, getting every question right so far, but the questions just got tougher and tougher as you kept going. Eventually, you reached the last question.


"Okay, [your name]," she says. "Here's the last question."


"Subject?" you ask.


"Equestrian History," she answered. "Name all the founding fathers of Manehattan."


You chuckle. This was way too easy. You open your mouth to answer, but then Twilight interrupts.


"-in order according to their birth date," she adds.


"Are you serious!? They don't even cover that in the textbooks!" you yell in frustration.


"So?" the unicorn says nonchalantly, "There's nothing wrong with a little extra knowledge."


"I don't know about you, Twi, but I'm not aiming for a perfect score on these exams, I'm only shooting for a B or higher," you say. "I can afford to not know when every major figure in Equestrian history was born."


"It's that kind of attitude that caused you to get a bad grade on your history final last year," Twilight argues.


"I got an A!" you retort.


"You got a 90, which is barely an A," she says.


Realizing that you can't win this argument, you decide to find a way out of it. "You know, my grades really are Celestia's concern, since she's my legal guardian, and all."


"Yeah, but I have to look after you, too!" she argues.


"I'm older than you!" you say. "Look, Twilight. I'm glad you're concerned, but I'm obviously prepared enough to get a good enough grade on my finals, so I'm gonna go."


You try to leave the library, but Twilight had already cast a force field around the place. "Nice try," she said as she approached you. You smirk and flick Twilight's horn, causing the force field to falter for a few seconds, allowing you to escape. You decide to go visit one of your friends, but who do you visit?
112112122122.title: Close, But No Cigar

1121121221221.content:
As you jumped out the dissipating field, Twilight stops her horn from dangling and regains her concentration. She looks at you in surprise that you were able to do that.

"How the hell were you able to do that!?" she exclaims.

"I have my ways and reasons, Twilight," you tell her.

"What!?"

"Let's just say, I know a guy. I'll be at Rainbow's. If you need me for anything--" "Uh--" "that's not studying, then give me a call."

"Wait, how are you gonna get up to Rainbow's house? Wait, you know a guy?"

"Yup."

"Do you really?"

"Nope," says a stallion behind you.

"Big Mac?" you ask not looking back.

"Eeyup."

"Did you really have any idea what we were talking about?"

"Nope."

"Didn't think so. Things alright?"

"Eeyup."

"Unless it's a situation like with Ms, Cheerilee, or with the fillies gossiping, will you ever say anything else?"

"Nope." He walks away.

"What can you do..? Who knows, but I care; see ya, Twi."

While leaving your unicorn sister behind, you head over to Rainbow's house, having to borrow Pinkie Pie's balloon again. Reaching up to Dashie's home, you say the incantation that allows you to defy the law of physics (even though it was already broken).

When you come to Rainbow's house, she opens the door and...
1121121221221.title: A small visit to a good friend

11211212212212.content:
When the cloud door opened, you were somewhat expecting for a slightly messy living room and for Rainbow to be somewhat casually dressed. But you saw a more clean space and for the Pegasus to be... uh...

Well, she isn't in a tracksuit, or other clothing suitable for running, which is usually bike shorts and a loose-fitting t-shirt for her, but she's in a sort of short white dress with a miniskirt, which, you really have to say, looks great on Rainbow.

"Um, Dashie, are you feeling okay..?" you ask.

"Sure, why wouldn't I be?" she says, rather shyly than laid-back. "Why do you ask?"

"Couple reasons: you're too nicely dressed, everything is cleaner than usual and... are you blushing?"

Realizing that she nearly was, somehow it disappeared and Rainbow was jst the least bit casual. "Nah, I'm just a little hot. Nothing serious."

Taking her word for it, you decide to drop that, even though that the blushing reminded you of Fluttershy. It looks adorable on Dashie though. "That's answered; can you please do so to the rest of my reasons?"

She looks cutely offended, as if she was looking like a vulnerable and unsure anime girl. Maybe a little too cute. "Wht? A girl can't change her apprearance?"

"Not saying that, Dashie, albeit you do look kinda pretty..."

What was her response?
11211212212212.title: What's going on..?

112112122122121.content:
Rainbow Dash's face instantly brightens up when you compliment her.


"Really!? You think so?" she says in a way that resembled Pinkie Pie a little bit, but then she collects herself. "Ahem, thanks, [your name.]"


"No problem, Dashie," you say.


"So, what brings you here?" she asks.


"You know how finals start on Monday, right?"


"Yeah."


"Twilight wants me to study with her, and she's running me ragged. She's a friggin' drill sergeant!"


"Oh, I know the feeling. When Twi first moved here, she wanted me and the others to study with her, and it was torture!"


You both laugh at your respective memories. Even though Twilight took things too seriously, there was something adorable about the way she acts.


"Well, being out in the open won't help you stay out of Twilight's sight, so why don't you come in?" says rainbow.


You follow the pegasus into her home and you both take a seat on her couch. "So, which subject are you the most worried about?" she asks. "I know you came here to avoid talking about finals, but I was just curious."


"I would have to say... Chemistry," you answer. "You?"


"English, hands down," she said without giving it a second thought. Rainbow was in your english class, so you knew how much trouble she had with the subject.


"I'm sure you'll do just fine," you say.


"What makes you say that?" she asks.


"Well, I don't know," you say. "I just have faith in you. You always seem to pull through anything, no matter how hard it is."


Rainbow Dash blushes when you say that, secretly excited that you complimented her twice in five minutes. "You always know what to say, [your name]," she says as she scoots closer to you.


"I try," you say. "I've gotta be there for the ponies and people I care about."


Rainbow blushes yet again. The emotions that are welling up inside her become too much for her to bear. "You know, [your name]," she says. "The fact that you'd always be there for me is one of the things I like about you?"


"Huh?" you ask, not hearing her right.


Dashie smiles and scoots even closer to you, takes a deep breath and...
112112122122121.title: A Little Over-Enthusiastic, Are We?

choices: You tried to reach for the panties
You signalled for her to remove her top.
1121121221221211.content:
She leans in too kiss you. Caught by surprise you realized that Dashie's lips made a contact with yours and her hoofs tried to hug your back.

You tried to salvage the situation by embracing her awkward kiss with your attempt to grab her body in a comfortable position.

Her breasts pressed into your body forcing you to laid back on the sofa, both you and her making passionate kiss.

You shifted position so you could be on top and she would be on the bottom. Your kisses continued from her lips to her neck.

You could feel her warm breathing while one of your hands traveled downwards to her butt feeling up the texture of her skirt and her panties.

By now Rainbows face was blushing furiously because she felt what about to happen. With a slight node of her head she was waiting for your next action
1121121221221211.title: she tries to kiss you.

1121121221221212.content:
Dashie's pulse raced as she though about what she was gonna do, but THE ONE TIME where Twilight really ruins everything!

Reason being, she was the one who knocks on the door. Using teleportation, and her polite sense, including the spell, Twilight tries to look for you. Rainbow growls and moves away from you. "I'll get that." Seeing that it was Twilight, she gives a quick eye twitch, curses under her breath, and walks out, closing the door, leaving you wondering what just happened.

'Did Dashie just tried to kiss me..?' you thought. 'I thought something was off when she dressed like that. She does look pretty like that though... I guess my slight attraction is stronger than I expected...'

Meanwhile, Rainbow was outside talking to Twilight. "Did you really have to interrupt like that, Twilight!?" she whispers. "You seriously ruined the moment!"

"Sorry, Rainbow, but I thought it was today you wanted me to get the books you borrowed back. Second, why are you wearing that and what moment?"

Rainbow overlooked this so bad. "What? I can't chnge my apprearance every now and then? And the moment was... uh, from me reading that suspenseful part on the book I was just reading."

Twilight has a skeptical look. Does she blieve Dashie?
1121121221221212.title: Of all days, now!?

choices: Rainbow Dash tries to kiss you again.
You hear a loud gasp from outside (Twilight never left).
11211212212212122.content:
Twilight looks at Rainbow Dash with a look that says. "You really think that I'm gonna buy that?" she asks. "You may not be as bad a liar as Applejack, but you're still pretty damn close, Rainbow Dash."


The pegasus sigh in defeat. She decides to tell Twilight the truth, but not the whole truth. "You see, the thing is... I have boy from school over, and I'm really trying to impress him, so I'm gonna need you to come back at a better time," she says.


"Ahhhhh, I see," the unicorn says with a wink. "Do I know this stallion?"


"Oh, thank Celestia. She doesn't suspect that it's [your name]," Dashie thinks. "Well, no. He's not in any of your classes." In a way, she was telling the truth. You actually weren't in any of Twilight's classes, since most of her classes are either honors or AP courses. The only advanced course that you're enrolled in is AP Art, and that was one area that the unicorn did not excel in.


"Well, say no more!" says Twilight. "I'll leave you two alone. Good luck!"


"I was having good luck until you showed up," Rainbow thinks. "Thanks, Twi. See ya around."


The two ponies wave goodbye and Rainbow Dash goes back inside. "Dear Celestia..." she says.


"Who was it?" you ask.


"Twilight, of all ponies," she answers.


"You didn't tell her that I was here did you?" you ask.


"And put you through more of her torture tutoring? I wouldn't wish that on my worst enemy, let alone my closest friend." Dashie says with a chuckle. She then takes a seat on the couch next to you, right where she was sitting before a certain somepony came over. "Actually," she says, "I've been thinking a lot lately, and I was hoping that... we could be more than friends."


Your eyes widen at what you hear. Sure, part of you kind of saw it coming, but you still couldn't believe your ears.


Just then...
11211212212212122.title: I.D.B.U. - I Don't Believe You

112112122122121221.content:
Now that she had just said that, Dashie was sorta hoping to take it back. After all, be true it may be, she feels that she might screw this up.

Even though you were shocked, and saw it coming, you didn't quite understand exactly what Rainbow meant. "What do you mean, Dashie?"

Being inches close from each other, all the feelings welling up in the Pegasus makes her do what she thought would've been impossible until now. Grabbing your face with both hands, she pulls your head close to hers, close enough for your lips to meet but only your noses do. Before anything else happens, what you heard is what you were always hoping to hear, in a whisper anyway. "I love you."

No time was left for any reaction as Rainbow finally puts your lips to hers. The sudden effect left you shocked but only temporarily. You even tried to pull back but her grip was too strong for you to squirm from. The soothing feeling of Dashie kissing you though was slowly creeping throughout your body, eventually relaxing you and sort of kissing back. The sheer force of will also went to your arms as you hugged back.

This causes for the Pegasus to wrap her wings around you, and let go, hugging you tightly and burying her face into your shoulder.

"Dashie..."

"For so long now, [your name], I finally managed to work up my mind to finally confess. (Voice breaking) I'm just glad you like me back."

You look at Rainbow and see that she's in tears, but with a smile, a sight you never thought you would see, but it looks so cute and adorable. Wiping the tears of her eyes, you replied, "Why else did I have the charm for so long?"

'No wonder!' she thought. 'And here I am thinking that it was just luck..!' "I love you, [your name]."

It was your turn to at least shed one tear. "I love you too, Dashie."

Then...
112112122122121221.title: You and Rainbow, kissing in a cloud...

Things were fine now... until some unfortunate Pegasus interrupts the scene. Even Pinkie Pie would know not to lurk in doorways for whatever reason.

The only problem is...
1121121221221212212.title: When will awkwardness ever end?

choices: She's close to laughing her flank off!
11211212212212122122.content:
The oh so shy Pegasus. Just to ask Rainbow a favor, she was not expecting for her to be doing anything else. But once entering the door, she immediately gasps. It was loud enough to disturb your little make out session and blush that Fluttershy was there. Her expression says it all.

         Of course, while she was kissing you, Rainbow actually managed to sorta pin you down. Her blush though surpasses yours and the other Pegasus combined.

         But while seeing Fluttershy's face, you realize that...
11211212212212122122.title: Well... This is embarrassing...

112112122122121221221.content:
Tears were forming at the edges of Fluttershy's eyes as she held her hands firmly against her mouth. Her body was shaking.

"Fluttershy," you plead. Your heart ached at seeing your dear friend hurt.

"This isn't what it looks like." Rainbow insisted.

But to the bewilderment of both of you, Fluttershy can no longer hold back and bursts out laughing. You both stare in total confusion as the yellow pegasus is practically rolling around on the floor. Fluttershy never expresses herself like this. You think. "Um, Flutter..."

She holds up a hand to stop you. "Give... me... a minute." She says between bursts of laughter. After a solid two minutes she finally calms down. "I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. It hurts," she says as she grips her gut and wipes the tears away. "It's just, the two of you... together... It's just so amazing."

You and Rainbowdash exchange glances. Either something was very wrong, or neither of you knew quite as much about Fluttershy as you thought.

"And Dashie. That dress."

"What about it?" Rainbowdash asked defensively.

"You just look so adorable in it. Apple Jack would absolutely flip if she saw you in that." Suddenly Fluttershy managed to calm herself down. "Oh. AJ."

"What about AJ?" Rainbowdash asks.

"Well," Fluttershy begins.
112112122122121221221.title: She's close to laughing her flank off!

choices: You find her in her cottage, crying her eyes out.
112112122122121221222.content:
You feel the heat escape from your face and start to feel guilt when you see the tear. Rainbow was just confused. Ans to prevent any more awkwardness, she gets off from you and helps you up.

         Fluttershy, though, still felt betrayed. "I thought you liked me..." she says, barely audible.

         You didn't hear her. But before you could've said anything, she says it louder. "I thought you liked me..."

         You blush as you didn't realize how much this affected her. "Fluttershy, I..."

         You couldn’t say anything since she started flying away, leaving you and Rainbow dumbfounded.

         "What just happened?" She asks.

         "I don't know, but we should look for her. I think she's taking this more personal than anypony would."

         But as fate would have it...

An hour later, you all meet up at Fluttershy's cottage. The hour before, you told them she ran off somewhere and you didn't know why. They were not expecting for Rainbow Dash to be dressed that way.

         Especially Applejack, "Was Rarity givin' you dressin' tips or somethin'?"

         "Ask later," Dashie replies, blushing a bit.

         You knock but no answer. You knock again. "Fluttershy?"

         The door just opened and no one was inside, scratch that, nopony was inside. Angel Bunny though was. Now, you always thought he was an uptight prick, but he seems nice only to you and to the point where you can actually understand him.

         He was trying to get your attention even. "What is it, Angel Bunny? You've seen Fluttershy?"

         He was giving off hand signals that was very confusing to everypony. But you got the jist of it.

         "She what!?" You exclaim. "Why!?"

         He explained that his owner went to the Everfree Forest due to a tragic mishap. But he responded to you by...
1121121221221212212222.title: Where is she..?

choices: How she was gonna confess today to give her motivation to do so.
Her plan and last message to run away...
11211212212212122122222.content:
Funny that you see a notebook here. Actually, funny it's stuffed at all. Fluttershy isn't one to write they much, unless it's to study for an upcoming test. Out of everypony, minus Twilight, she's the smarter one. You saw a corner of a paper, looking more like an image that just a loose leaf. Wait a minute...

         You grab that slip and take it out. It wasn't an image... it was a drawing..! Of you and her!

         She was hugging you, per se, and you're surprised at the detail on this. You didn't know she could draw...

         Then there is another image, yet another drawing... You eventually stumble upon a note, a funny one at that. You can tell it was recent; the ink was slightly damp. Your eyes widen as you read what was on it.

         And the contents were...
11211212212212122122222.title: Did she make a shrine or something..?

112112122122121221222222.content:
"And so, my dear friends, I leave this as my last message to you now that I see that [your name]'s heart belongs to Rainbow Dash. My only regret is that I couldn't confess to him sooner and have gotten an honest answer. This is why you see all these drawings, to match his skills, why I've done a few things for him to find out about my liking to him, and when anypony asks me about who I like is always no one. But, [your name], if you're the one reading this, then I'd like you to know that ever since I met you, I always liked you and hoped that we could have a bond together. Tell everypony that I'll miss them and that I'll never forget them."


         The way she wrote that to you broke your heart, especially Rainbow's. But the worst part was this: where she was running away to was...
112112122122121221222222.title: Heartache to three...

choices: One of the teams finds her
1121121221221212212222221.content:
"The Everfree Forest! That's where she's headed." you say, somewhat relieved that you know where she is, but more worried that i was going to be dark soon.

"We have to hurry!" you say "The forest can be dangerous at night"

Everypony agrees and soon you all start looking through the forest, even Angel bunny.
You all split into teams. Rainbowdash went with Pinkie Pie, who took her air balloon, to look for her from the sky. Twilight and Spike were working to try and locate her using magic, and Applejack and Rarity made up one of the search teams for the ground, while you and Angel bunny made the second.

After about two hours of searching, night had just fallen and...
1121121221221212212222221.title: Over the river and through the woods...

11211212212212122122222211.content:
You hear a very familiar voice in your head.

"(*Name*), can you hear me?"

"I hear you, Twilight. How are we doing?" you ask

"Listen, Spike and I found her."

"Where is she?!" you ask worriedly

"She's not far from you now but she looks hurt, you need to hurry, start heading west. I've already told everypony else to meet you there."

"No, send them back." you say

"What? But (*Name*)-"

"It's getting too dark, if they look for us now they'll get lost too. I'll get Fluttershy and meet up with you guys soon" you say

Twilight remained silent for a few moments.

"... Alright, but be careful." she says

"Like I said, I'll be back soon, Twilight"

You and Angel bunny then start running as fast as you can towrds Fluttershy, almost tripping more than once because of how dark it was getting.

"Fluttershy!" you call "FLUTTERSHY!!!"

You then hear a faint voice not far from where you are.
11211212212212122122222211.title: One of the teams finds her

choices: you basuically have to cut yourself to get her mane and tail free...
112112122122121221222222111.content:
You're not sure whether it was just a protective instinct, or something else you don't know, but as soon as you heard Fluttershy's desperate voice, you and Angel Bunny hurried to her rescue. You were unfortunately beating yourself up for everything that has happened so far: the poor pegasus heartbroken seeing you kissing Rainbow Dash, running away knowing she can't be with her crush, nearly going through hell in these Celestia-forsaken woods...

         Now that all that is in place, you might want to start reconsidering your life now.

         As soon as you heard an even louder plead of help, you knew you were going on the right track... or is it just the fact that pieces of her mane was scattered across the ground?

         Following them, you saw a very teary Fluttershy, whose mane and tail was stuck in a few thorn bushes and who was lifting her hoof. Wait.. did she..? Oh, no...

         "Fluttershy!" you exclaim, going into tears as well.

         "[Your name]!" You rushed over and hugged her, her hugging you tighter than you were.

         "Fluttershy, you're so damn stupid! Why would you do this to us, especially me!?"

         "(Voice Cracking) I can't stand the thought of not being able to be with you the way that I wanted. I was going to Dashie's for emotional support to confess to you today but... all I saw was you kissing her!

         This caused her to change expressions and release you as well. She now thought that it was a mistake because some thorns were starting to create small cuts.

         You were very worried and try to take her out of the thorns. "We'll talk about this later when we get back to Ponyville. Right now, I have to get-- these-- thorns off!"

         Seeing that she was stuck there, unless something else happens, you won't get Fluttershy out of there. Especially since--

         Ow, my hoof!" she exclaims as she steps on her left one. "Fluttershy, don't tell me..?"

         "I think I broke my hoof, [your name]..." Now you're starting to regret having the others go home.

         To make matters worse...
112112122122121221222222111.title: Rescuing a very hurt pegasus

1121121221221212212222221111.content:
"Hold on, Fluttershy." you say "I'm gonna get you out of this"

You start to remove some of the thorns that were stuck to her mane and tail.

"Ouch- Damn these hurt!" you say.

You're eventually able to remove enough of the thorns that Fluttershy is able to move out of the rest. She looks at you and gasps at the sight of the blood that was now dripping from your arms.

"Are you alright?" she asks

"I'll be fine, Fluttershy. It's you I am worried about." you respond
"We need to get you back to Ponyville"

You start to pick her up and cradle her and your arms are starting to feel like they are on fire. You wince at the pain but keep going.

"Please, (*Name*). Leave me here..." says the injured pony

"What?"

"I'll just be a hinderance, you need to get your arms-"

"I told you... I'll be fine" you say cutting her off mid-sentence
"You might not think so, Fluttershy, but I do care about you. And you running off like that wasn't doing me a favor, it scared me, it made me sad that you wanted to leave and I was worried about you and so was everybody else, even Rainbowdash."

Fluttershy looks at you as you're carrying her.

"Please promise that you won't do anything like this again." you say

"oh, (*Name*).... I'm so sorry..." she says now crying.

A few hours have passed since then and everypony was waiting outside of yours and Twilight's house.

"They should have been back by now" Says Applejack

"Where could they be?" asked Rarity

Rainbowdash seemed to have the worst of it, she was pacing back and forth for over 20 minutes. Finally she decides to go looking for the two of you.

"Don't ,Rainbowdash" says Twilight "It's too dark, you would get lost in there too"

"Well I can't just sit here and do nothing!" she says

She starts to spread her wings for take-off but just then, Pinkie pie screams "LOOK! It's Angel bunny!!!"

Everypony then stops to look as, sure enough, Angel bunny came hopping out of the woods. Soon after, so do you, carrying an injured Fluttershy into town.

"(*Name*)!" Calls Rainbowdash

"Hey guys" you say "Hey Twi, could you carry her for me please?" you ask

"Sure" She says now using her magic to carry the injured pegasus

Rainbowdash then runs up to you and hugs you as hard as she could.

"I thought I lost you!" she says now crying

Next, she kisses you. much to the surprise of the other ponies.

"I'm fine, Dash.. I..." you say as you apse to the ground.

What caused you to faint?
1121121221221212212222221111.title: This may sting a bit.

11211212212212122122222211112.content:
You wake up in your room, in your bed.

You sit up and see Twilight and Rainbow dash next to the bed.
Twilight was reading and Dash was sleeping while kneeling next to you.

"Good, You're awake" says Twilight

"What happened? Is Fluttershy okay?" you ask

"She's resting in my room now" she says "Her ankle was broken but it could have been much worse. She just needs to keep off of it until I can heal it fully"

"That's good to hear... Why am I in bed?" you ask

"When you were helping Fluttershy, you cut yourr arms on some thornbushes, right?"

"Yeah, but I'll be fine" you say as you look down at your arms, which are now bandaged. "Uh... why are my arms all wrapped up? The cuts weren't serious" you say

"No, but the thorns that had cut you carried a dangerous toxin, the fact that you were able to carry Fluttershy at all after that is nothing short of a miracle..." says Twilight

"... It could have killed you..." she says "But we were able to stop the toxin before too much reached you heart"

This shocked you "But, how am I affected and not Fluttershy?"

"The toxin is specific to humans, you were the only one it would have taken affect on"

"Lucky me" you say


and then...
11211212212212122122222211112.title: Your injuries

choices: she's mostly concerned about your well-being..
she feels very guilty about everything...
112112122122121221222222111121.content:
You look over at Dashie and see that she has dried up tear marks. "Hey, what happened with Rainbow?"

         "You tell he," Twilight replies with a giggle, "or maybe the kiss explained it to me. She was pretty worried sick after you fainted. It took some time, but we managed to calm her down."

         'Huh, I guess it had a harder effect on her than I thought,' you think. But it wasn't just worry... You couldn't see it, but she was sweating badly...

         In her dream, she was having the time of her life, and ironically, it was at your prom dance, which was last month, but in all actuality, you all went as a group. Rainbow was wearing a dress that was waaaayy unfitting for her but you seemed to really like it. It was a spotlight dance, and she was embarrassed out of her mind, as well as you, but you enjoyed it either way. As the last part of the music is played, you both lean in for a kiss and Dashie hugs you tightly afterward.

         Unfortunately, her earlier experience went to her subconscious as you started to fade away and everything else succumbed to darkness. You can basically say that her dream turned into many horrific nightmares that involved you... a lot. For one, you were at your deathbed, in a scenario sorta like right now, but it was too late to save you and your funeral came and went. There was also a part where instead of that, you were kidnapped and eventually killed for her not being able to save you in time by following your kidnapper's orders.

         There was even this one other thing that she feared more than your death. Yup, and it was you, not in a horrible situation, but instead put Rainbow into the worst one ever. Instead of her, you were with another mare, a thought that she can't stand. And either she was hearing taunting voices, or something else was starting to become funny...


         Dashie woke up with a start and a gasp as she realized that she was back in reality and you were still in bed, just sitting near her. You were trying to gently wake her up for the past minute.

         "[Your name]..." she whispered, before crushing you in a death hug. You hug back, no longer in pain. "I thought I lost you..."

         "Dashie, it's gonna take more than a toxic thorn bush to take me away from you," you reply. "Speaking of which, is Fluttershy able to come here?"

         "Actually, no," Twilight replies. "If we want her ankle to heal up, then she needs to stay off it for a while. I think it's better if we go over to my room to see her."

         "Alright."

         Seeing that Fluttershy would be alright calmed your mind a bit... but what about what happened because of this..?

         And as for her...
112112122122121221222222111121.title: A new (and probable only) fear

shyly confess about her liking to you.

Fluttershy was sitting up talking with Pinkie Pie, Applejack and Rarity... or more like they were to each other. She was looking over at her cuts, very minor of course, her bandaged hoof, and uneven strands of mane. But deeper than that, she saw how badly it affected you the most, risking your life just to save hers and almost died because of doing so...

         So now, there are two things haunting Fluttershy: her jealousy of Rainbow Dash and the burden of you saving her. Just rethinking that over again is making a few tears appear.

         "You alright there, Fluttershy?" Applejack asks.

         "N... no..." she responds, looking down.

         "Look, sugarcube--"

         "Now, look, Fluttershy," Rarity joins, "sure, he did all that, but he did it to prove to you that he does care about you and maybe even more. I mean, he even went and looked for you alone."

         Fluttershy looked slightly shocked. "He- he did?"

         "Of course, silly!" Pinkie Pie exclaims. "It's possible he likes you too!"

         "We've all known that ya had at least a slight crush on [your name], sugarcube," Applejack concurs. "Actually, ya aren't exactly stealthy with hidin' hints from anypony. Our thoughts were right when we saw your notebook full of great drawings of you an' him."

         "Was he the only reason you improved so much, darling?"

         Fluttershy blushes. "Y-yes..."

         "Was he the other reason why you were with me for the past few birthdays of his?" Pinkie asks.

         "And why I always finish before you, Pinkie Pie. There are reasons why I like [your name], but--"

         As soon as the door opens, revealing you (Dashie, and Twilight), it caused Fluttershy to...
1121121221221212212222221111212.title: Working things out

choices: Kiss you unexpectedly, then faint afterward...
Break down and tell the truth about her jealousy to everypony...
11211212212212122122222211112121.content:
Seeing as how it was you and Rainbow Dash, and she's closer to you than anypony would be, her guilt, sadness, and despair got the better of her and decided to look away and have everypony else have their questions answered.

         "Ya told me to ask later," Applejack starts, "an' so Ah guess it's now. Why are ya those clothes, Rainbow?"

         She gave a weak blush and recoiled a bit. "I thought [your name] would've liked it."

         The latter though, rolled her eyes. "That's nice an' all, but could ya at least talk to Fluttershy? Except for just now, we couldn't even get a peep out of her the entire afternoon."

         "Wait, what?" you ask? Never seeing the time, you thought it was at least midnight or something. But upon further inspection of the clock, you see that it's close to 6 PM, Saturday evening. "How long have I been knocked out for!?"

         "Almost a day," Fluttershy responds. She looks at you. You've been asleep for so long, I thought you..."

         You walk to her. "Fluttershy, it's gonna take more than a mere bush to take me away. But again, why did you just run away like that? You had me worried sick, and everypony else as well."

         "[Your name], I..." What does she do?
11211212212212122122222211112121.title: The guilt doesn't subside, does it?

112112122122121221222222111121211.content:
Without warning, she leaps forward and closes her arms around you, for balance and for hugging you as well, and with no other second thought in mind, Fluttershy closes her eyes, forced you to get closer and makes contact with your lips, catching you by surprise.

         Like Rainbow Dash, you were shocked to say the least but it eventually calmed down, but only slightly. You know better than to look worse than what you are right now in front of your marefriend.

         Unfortunately though, this sent both mares into really high pulses, Fluttershy for kissing you and Rainbow for realizing that her fear of what happened in her dream may become true. For reasons known already, they both somehow faint simultaneously, worrying everypony, but mostly you.

         "Fluttershy!? Rainbow Dash!?" You quickly check to see if they were breathing and thank Celestia they were. Giving off a sigh of relief, you take Rainbow and lay her on the bed as well. You look at both mares passed out, both for different reasons. You had no idea what to do. Meanwhile, everypony else were worried since this was an especial first for them.

         If it was allowed, then fine, you would let them share you somehow but you odn't know what will happen.

         What to do..?
112112122122121221222222111121211.title: Two mares, one guy... any advice?

choices: "I'm sure. I need to talk to them."
"Maybe you're right. I'll talk to them later"
1121121221221212212222221111212112.content:
It's been about 2 hours since the incident with both Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash, and you've been sitting on the edge of your bed for a while now, trying to think things over.

"Damn" you whisper to yourself, almost wishing that none of this had happened at all and that everything would be back to normal. But in the past two days you had two ponies confess to you ending up with one on bedrest and with you nearly dying in the process. Everything was far from normal...

"Hello?" asks a familiar voice from the doorway "May I come in, (*Name*)?"

"Sure, Twilight." you say quietly.

"Are you okay?" she asks as she closes the door behind her.

"No... Why did this have to happen, Twilight?" you ask quite suddenly.

Twilight seemed a bit taken back at this question, but after a moment she just says...

"I don't know, (*Name*). We all do stupid things when we're in love..."

You look at her questioningly after she says this. Not really expecting her to have had a relationship in the past.

"At least, that's what the books say."

"I can't stand the thought of breaking either of their hearts, Twi... I love them both, but... I just don't know what to do." You say, nearly in tears.

"I can't make the choice for you, (*Name*). All I can tell you is to follow where your heart leads. Right now, that is the best you can do..." she replies, now hugging you. Almost sounding unfertain at her own words.

The door opens up and you see Applejack standing in the doorway.

"They're waking up now, Sugarcube. Thought ya' should now. Twilight, could you come check on them, make sure they're not runnin' a fever er nothin'." She asks

"Sure, Applejack. I'll be right there." She replies

"I'll go too." you say "I think I need to talk to them."

"Ya sure, Sugarcube? They might not be up fer' it."

You think for a moment.
1121121221221212212222221111212112.title: Consult Twilight

choices: Probably not. They start to argue as soon as they wake up...
11211212212212122122222211112121122.content:
After mulling things over, you decide that it was best that you left them alone for now. Being in the same place with the mares you kissed might not be such a good idea, especially since it can cause more stress to their ailments.

         "You're right, Applejack," you say. "Go ahead, Twilight. I need to think."

         "Don't stress yourself out too much, alright?"

“I’d love to, Pinkie,” you say, “But I’m kind of busy.”


“Awwww…” she says. “What a bummer.”


“See you around,” you say.


As you walk through Ponyville, you decide to go see Rainbow Dash next. You meet her at the track behind the school.


 “What’s up Rainbow?” you say.


 “[Your name]! You’re here!” she says. “I thought that you were gonna blow me off.”


“Well, I didn’t,” you say. “So, why’d you ask me to help you specifically today?”


 “It’s because the end-of-the-year interscholastic track meet is next Saturday, and I need your help to get me up to speed,” she explains.


This confuses you. Rainbow Dash is the fastest pony you know. Why would she need any help? She sees the perplexed look on your face and explains.

 “The track meet is not only for pegasi,” she says. “Earth ponies and unicorns will be participating, too, so no wings.”


“Okay, now it makes sense,” you say.


“Anyway, I’ve been doing some leg workouts over the past few months and I want to see how far I’ve progressed,” she says, then she hands you a complicated looking stopwatch.


“The track meet will be at Ponyville High this year, and I want to see how fast I can do five laps around it,” she explains. “When you tell me to go, press the green button on the top of the watch. When I finish a lap, press the yellow button, and when I’m done, press the red button.”


“Okay,” you say.


So Rainbow Dash runs the five laps and when she’s done, you give your report on how she did.


“Your time was two minutes and forty-five seconds,” you say. “Your fastest lap was lap three, and then your times for the laps after that got progressively lower, so you reached your top speed sometime during lap three.”


 “I knew I was right to ask you to help me out,” she says.


“It was kind of enjoyable,” you say. “Well, I have to go. The other ponies wanted me to help them out, too.”


You and Rainbow say your goodbyes and you leave the field, wondering where to go next.
