Lyra chooses Bon Bon, but really wants her to live up to her promise.
1331121122122112211222111.content:
Sitting on a bench was a mint-green unicorn in complete despair. With everything that's going on, you're thinking that it's miraculous that you're not even shedding a tear.

"Lyra?" you start. She looks up and immediately hugs you. "Are you okay?"

"I... I'm sorry, [your name]..." she replies, "for dragging you along with all this. I just wanted someone to help me with this but whatever I did made it all worse..!"

Your grip became as tight as hers and then you start stroking her hair as you did Twilight; apparently, it has that calming effect to everypny you know now. "Lyra, you don't have blame for anything. I know you just wanted for Bon Bon to stop being possessive and it got out of hand, but she told me to look for you just a while ago. She told me that for you, she would change."

"W-What?" Lyra says, shocked apparently about Bon Bon's promise.

"I guess you need to hear it from me," somepony suddenly says. You see it was Bon Bon walking down the trail. "Lyra, I'm sorry, and to you too, [your name], for everything. I just didn't want to lose you, Lyra." She starts to tear up. "You're the love of my life and I wouldn't know what to do if you were gone. I know I can't repair the damage I've done..."

'Maybe, maybe not, Bon Bon, but we'll see what Lyra says,' you thought.

"But I promise you, I will change, no matter what."

This left Lyra in a predicament, and you're thinking it's a wonder Twilight isn't reacting at all. Back to the other unicorn, she doesn't know what to do.

"Uh..." she looks down, not being able to make a decision. Her lover or her crush? A stumbling relationship with a slight possessive pony, or a new one that will surely get her killed? (Too far, but who knows what Twilight will do?)
1331121122122112211222111.title: So much sadness...

choices: "Do you want to know why I like you so much?"
13311211221221122112221111.content:
You feel that you need to speak up in order to make this decision easier for Lyra.


"Lyra," you start. "Don't worry about me. I'll be fine. Besides, you're much better off with Bon Bon. I'm sure that after all this, she'll live up to her promise."


The unicorn sits still for a minute, then looks up at Bon Bon with a slight smile. "Okay, I'll give you another chance Bon Bon," she says.


The earth pony's face brightens up and she hugs Lyra tightly. "Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you!" she says. I promise I'll never be clingy with you again!" She then releases the unicorn and walks up to you, too. "I have to thank you, too, [your name]. Even after all the stuff I did to you, you still helped me. I can't thank you enough. I'm sorry for all the trouble I caused you."


"It's okay, Bon Bon," you say. "As long as you and Lyra are happy, I'm happy."


"You're a nice guy, [your name]," she says.


"So I've been told," you say.


Bon Bon chuckles. "If I was into guys, I'd want to go to the dance with you."


"Thanks, I think," you say. "Well, Twilight and I are gonna head home. See you guys on tomorrow at school."


"Bye," the two mares say.


You and Twilight make your way back home, and take a seat on the couch. "Man, this was an eventful day, huh?"


"Yeah..." Twilight says, her mind still on the kiss she gave you. That wasn't the way she wanted her first kiss with you to be. She had the ideal situation set in her mind, and it never came to be. Regardless of that, though, the kiss still felt good.


"You okay, Twi?" you ask.


"Can I ask you something?" she asks back.


"Sure, what's up?" you say.


What does Twilight ask you?
13311211221221122112221111.title: Voicing Your Opinion

133112112212211221122211111.content:
Twilight was a little reluctant, but she went through with it.

"Can-- Can we try that kiss again?" she asks, blushing heavily.

"What?" you ask, not hearing that right.

"Well, I... the way it happened back there seemed really bad and I'd really like to--"

"Shh." Putting a finger on Twi's lips, calming her down. Even though that was just to stop her, her pulse was racing as you leaned closer.

"You don't need to explain. I understand, Twi."

Feeling like fainting, she tries to reply, but completely melts in your arms as you wrap them around her. Quickly warming up to you, she kisses back, hugging you back. Once you let go, you ask the all important question that was needed to be heard.

"Twilight Sparkle, will you go to the dance with me?" you say, in an unusually deep and girl-attracting tone.

Very elated, she pounces on you, nearly choking you... again. "OH, YES, [YOUR FULL NAME]! YES, YES YES, A MILLION TIMES YES!!!"

And you faint, from the suffocation and the happiness you made (not to mention the fact that you're ears are ringing).
133112112212211221122211111.title: Second shot

1331121122122112211222111112.content:
The rest of the week went by rather quickly, and the following week, exam week, went by just as quickly. That Friday night was the day of the dance. With Lyra and Bon Bon back together, and you and Twilight now in a relationship, life could only get better. You couldn't keep the fact that you were now dating away from your friends, who, thanks to Rarity, quickly found out what was going on between you two. Since the cat was out of the bag, you decided to ask them if they were going to the end-of-school dance, and who they'd be going with.


Rainbow Dash was going with a colt that was on her track team.


Pinkie Pie got a ton of invites from various guys, so she just chose one at random.


Rarity was going with Jumper (thanks to you).


Applejack was going alone. She was never looking for a date, since she thought that it wasn't important. You wonder if she has even the tiniest bit of a romantic in her.


Fluttershy didn't want to go, but since she was the Secretary on the Student Council, which is funding the event, she had to go.


On the night of the dance, you all meet at the front entrance. "My, oh my. Don't we all look stunning this evening?" says Rarity.


"Ah guess so..." says Applejack. The dance was semi-formal, so she wore a blouse that Rarity insisted on making for her and some jeans.


"Well, the party's inside, so let's go," you say.


Inside the school gymnasium, where the dance is being held, the air is more festive than you expected. The music was blasting, and everypony was on the dance floor, Pinkie Pie and her date included. "Maybe we should wait for a song that's a little slower," suggests Twilight. "This one is a little too fast-paced for my tastes."


"No problem," you say. "Wanna go get something to drink?"


"Sure," she says.


You and Twilight walk to the snack bar, where Fluttershy was taking her post. "They've got you manning the snack bar, I see," you say.


"Well, at least it gives me an excuse not to go on the dance floor," she says. "What would you two like?"


"Can I get a diet cola?" your date asks.


"Make that two," you add.


"Four bits, please," the pegasus says. Twilight reaches for her wallet, but you beat her to the punch and take yours out first. "No way, Twi," you say,"I'm not gonna let you make me look bad in front of Fluttershy. I'm paying."


Fluttershy giggles, and so does Twilight. "If you insist," the unicorn says.


The two of you find a place to sit once you get your drinks. Suddenly, the song changes to a slower one, but still upbeat. Hoping that the caffeine from her drink loosened her up a bit, you ask Twilight, "Do you want to dance?"


What does she say?
1331121122122112211222111112.title: The Big Night

choices: "It'll be okay, Rarity Just give it time. The dance is only two weeks away."
1332.content:
Jumper thinks about it for a second, and gives you an answer. "Meh, she's pretty and all, but... she's not really my type, if you get what I'm saying."


"Yeah, I see what you mean," you say, disappointed that Rarity isn't gonna get her dream date for the dance. Just then, Jumper says something that surprises you.


"You should go out with her, though," he says. "She seems to be the perfect girl for you."


"Really?" you ask. "How so?"


"Well, you like to draw cartoons, right?" he asks, and you nod your head. "Well, that makes you an artist like her. You two may have other common interests that you don't even know about. Besides that, you're a pretty cool dude. I'm sure if you asked her, she would say yes in a heartbeat."


"Wow, I never even realized," you say. "Thanks, Jumper."


"No problem, bro," he says. "Good luck to ya."


The two of you brohoof and Jumper walks away, leaving you mentally ecstatic. You've had a secret crush on Rarity for almost a year now, and hearing something like that gave you hope. Sure, it saddened you that Rarity wanted to take someone else to the dance, but he said no, which means she's available. Then again, knowing Rarity, she'll be pretty broken up when she hears that Jumper has no interest in her.


You prepare for the inevitable as you walk back to the Carousel Boutique. After a few knocks on the door, Rarity promptly opens it, delighted to see you.


"Well, that was fast," she says excitedly. "Come in, come in!"


After sitting you down in a nearby chair and taking a seat in another, Rarity asks you the all-important question.


"So, what did Jumper say?" she asks. "Is he interested in me?"


You give a heavy sigh. "Well... he said that he does think you're pretty... but he also said that you're... not his type..." you say, wincing in anticipation of Rarity's reaction.


As you expected, it wasn't good.


"Not his type?" Rarity asks, her voice breaking. "I'm not his type?" The unicorn then buries her face in her hands and starts sobbing. "Every time... every time I find a stallion I like, he ends up having no interest in me! What's wrong with me!?"


You put both your hands on Rarity's shoulders, causing her to look up at you. "Rarity, trust me. NOTHING is wrong with you," you say.


"Well, who am I supposed to go to the dance with?" she asks.


What do you say?
1332.title: Words That No Mare Wants to Hear

choices: "... help me out with these other designs?" She chickened out.
13321.content:
"Oh, darling, you always know what to say when I'm down," Rarity says. "You're right. I should just let it go. Maybe by then I can be able to find a date."

"Dont worry, Rarity," you add. "I'm sure there's someone out there that is for you." You secretly hoped that it was you, but there was a fat chance of that. Sure, Jumper may have said all that about you two being artists and whatnot, but you could never picture yourself with Rarity. You could never deserve her.

"(Your name)?"

"Yes, Rarity?"

"Could you please do me another favor?" Rarity was itching to ask you instead because of all the comfort you always give her.

"Anything, Rarity." You now didn't care about anything except making your unicorn friend happy.

"Well, um, could you, err..."

133211.content:
"... help me out with these other designs?" the unicorn asks.


"Sure, Rarity," you answer, slightly confused. As Rarity explains the insecurities she's been having over her latest designs, your mind keeps replaying that brief moment. That brief moment where you... "sensed" something in the mare when she asked you to help her out. Was it... hesitation? No, it couldn't be. Rarity's not the kind of pony to hesitate. Besides, why would she need to hesitate over asking you to look at some designs of hers? Unless... unless she wanted to ask you something else. You decide to pay it no mind and start paying attention to what Rarity's saying.


"So I can't help but think that the jewel arrangement on this dress can be better, but I don't know how," she says.


"Well, I think you should experiment with different arrangements," you say. "I'm sure it'll come to you."


"Thanks, darling," she says, and she stays quiet for a minute before speaking again. "Um... [your name]?"


"Yeah?" you answer.


"Do you think I could ever be somebody's type, or am I just too high-maintenance?" she asks.


"Why would you even think that?" you ask. You never thought that Rarity was "too high-maintenance". Sure, she could be a drama queen at times, and she does have some extravagant tastes, but she was never unreasonable or demanding like a typical high-maintenance girl.


"Well... it's just that I've been evaluating my love life for a while," she explains. "I've gotten a taste of what high-maintenance was when I met Prince Blueblood at the Gala. Celestia knows how long it's been since then. I've been through three boyfriends in my life, all of whom I've dated during our second year of high school. They all wanted to break up because they thought that my standards were too high, but they can't be. All I want is a regular guy. Is that too much to ask?"


"It isn't," you say bluntly. "They were most likely making excuses. I think the problem with guys like your exes is that they expect girls as pretty as you to be just that, pretty girls. Once they saw that you were more than that, I guess they felt intimidated."


"Well that makes sense, I can definitely see what you mea- did you say I was pretty?" asks the unicorn.


"Well... yeah..." you say.” But I'm sure you get that all the time," you say.


"Yes, but it's usually from guys that hit on me," Rarity says with a sigh. "I'm glad we're friends, [your name]. You're always there, looking out for me, helping me when I need it the most. I'm sure the girl you're taking to the dance can't wait to go with you."


"Actually, I don't have a date," you say.


"Oh you don't?" she asks, surprised. "Well..."
133211.title: Hesitation?

1332112.content:
You weren't expecting a question about that, and you definitely weren't about Rarity going to that inquiry.

"Well, there is this one mare I have in mind, but I highly doubt she would go with me..." Your expression becomes depressed, as you were looking away as well, you didn't realize Rarity's change of expression.

"Oh... Darling, who could your dream pony be?" she asks. You heard a slight sad and sarcastic tone.

"It's kinda hard for me to say who since I don't know what she'll say."

"Can you at least give me a hint?" Rarity has that need to find out as how some jealous girls get when this happens.

"Alright; don't see harm in that. She's a very pretty mare, who has a great personality, with those gorgeous shining eyes, and is just overall beautiful. The mare of my dreams for so long that I hope likes me back.

Rarity gets a saddened expression, not expecting your answer. "Well, darling, who is it?"

You turn to face her. "Rarity, she is..."
1332112.title: Maybe there is...

choices: Sweetie Belle comes in from the front door.
13321122.content:
You try to tell Rarity that she is the mare you're talking about, and it was the perfect moment, too. You're alone, you're both opening up your feelings to each other; everything is perfect, so why can't you tell her.


Sensing your nervousness and hesitation, Rarity attempts to relax you. "It's okay, darling," she says, resting a hand on your shoulder. "You can tell me. I promise you I won't think of you any differently."


You look at Rarity and she gives you a smile. "Okay," you say. "My dream pony is... you, Rarity."


The unicorn's eyes widen, and she looks rather stunned. "M-me?" she asks in disbelief. "Darling, I... I had no idea."


"Yeah..." you say. "As a matter of fact, when Jumper told me that he wasn't interested in you, he said that he thought you were more suited for someone like me, since we have a lot in common."


"That's... true..." she says, realizing how much common interests you two have. "But... why would you keep this a secret for so long?"


"Well, call me crazy, but I thought that you were to good for me," you say.


"You're crazy," she says. "You're more than good enough for me. I just needed to realize it." Rarity sighs and smiles. "I'm so stupid."


"How?" you ask.


"All this time, I've been looking for the perfect guy, but I never realized that he was right under my nose," she says, looking at you with dreamy eyes.


"Nobody's perfect," you say modestly, looking away from her.


Rarity chuckles and holds your chin, bringing your face to hers. "Well, you're pretty damn close," she says, before slowly bringing her lips to yours, kissing you softly and passionately. She then lets go of your chin, wrapping her arms around you and you do the same to her. You enjoy every second of the kiss, but the moment is cut short when...
13321122.title: "... y--"

133211222.content: Who's the idiot pony to call you in this perfect moment?
133211222.title: It can't be a worse time than this

1332112221.content:
The perfect moment was ruined by the terrible timing of your incoming phone call.


"Somepony had better be dying!" you think.


"Sorry, Rarity. I have to take this," you say. You look at your phone and see that it was Auntie Celeste that was calling. "Are you kidding me?" you say under your breath. "Hello?" you answer.


"Hi, [your name]!" she said happily. "I forgot to tell you something when I called earlier!"


"Celestia, this really isn't a good time," you say.


"That's Auntie Celeste to you, young man!" the princess says sternly, loud enough for Rarity to hear her. She giggles at your suffering.


"Whatever. Like I said, this is not a good time," you repeat. "Whatever it is, can't it wait until later."


"Whatever you're doing can wait," she says. "Besides, I'm sure you'll love what I'm about to tell you!"


"I'd better, after how badly you just cockblocked me," you think. "Fine, what is it?"


"I'm going to be coming to Ponyville to spend the first few weeks of summer with you!" she says excitedly. "Luna will be taking care of my royal duties during my absence."


"Poor Luna," you think.


"I've already told Twilight, and she'll be preparing the library for my arrival tomorrow morning," she says.


"Tomorrow morning!?" you exclaim.


"Surprise!" she says. "I'll talk to you later, okay? I love you!"


"Okay, bye."


"Ahem!"


"What?"


"I said 'I love you.'"


"And?"


"You're supposed to say..."


"Thank you?"


"Don't play dumb, [your name]!"


"Fine... I love you, too."


"What was that?"


"I said I love you, too!" you yell before hanging up.


Once you put away your phone, Rarity falls to the floor in a fit of laughter. "Oh. My. Celestia! That was utterly hilarious!" she says in between laughs.


"Yeah, yeah..." you say. "I guess I should be heading home. See you around, Rarity."


"Goodbye, darling!" she says, blowing you a kiss before you go.


When you get home, how is Twilight doing?
1332112221.title: Worst. Timing. Ever.

choices: Bombarding you with worry, making YOU faint.
13321122212.content:
Going back and forth was a discombobulated unicorn that is apparently even worrying about the slightest thing, since you see her levitating a protractor, ruler, compass and sextant. Her hair wsa completely ruffled, her eyes were twitching, and her smile is so frickin crooked. And the sextant for what? It's morning!

This was still enough to scare Spike. The poor dragon was hiding under the table holding a spatula. Really?

"Twilight?" you say.

It was enough to make her ear twitch and react.
13321122212.title: Did you expect anything less?

133211222121.content:
For some reason, hearing you say her name was enough to make Twilight fall to the floor with a loud thud.


“Perfect,” you say. “Fucking perfect.”


“Thank Celestia you came here when you did, [your name],” said Spike. “I wouldn’t have been able to carry Twilight to her room on my own.”


“Speaking of Celestia, I’m assuming she’s the reason why Twilight’s so stressed,” you say. “She really needs to relax.”


“In her defense, the Princess is going to be staying here for six weeks. She just wanted everything to be perfect.”


“Wait, she’s staying for six weeks I’ll have to ask her why she didn’t mention that when she called me.”


“Does it matter?”


“Well, we don’t have a guest room, so someone will have to sleep on an air mattress, and what if that someone ends up being me? Not to mention the possibility of her sleeping in my room. That’s my sanctuary!”


“It’s important to be a good host.”


“Ugh. Twilight’s starting to rub off on you. Speaking of Twilight, I should carry her to her room.” You walk over to the unconscious unicorn and lift her up. “Ugh! She’s all sweaty! How stressed was she?” You carry Twilight up to her room and lay her gently on her bed. After a quick shower, you return to her room to check on her and see that she is awake.


“You really should stop stressing out,” you tell her. “It shortens your lifespan, you know.”


“And you should take things seriously, for once,” she says back.


“I’ve known Celestia for as long as I can remember, Twi,” you say. “I understand wanting everything to be perfect, but she’s not gonna be mad at us for missing tiny details.”


“I don’t want to take the chance,” the unicorn argues.


“How about I take care of everything else and you just relax?” you suggest. “You can trust me, right?”


In on honesty, when it comes to situations like this, Twilight can trust you no further than she can throw you, but she still wanted to rest.


“I trust you,” she lies.


“Alright then,” you say. “I’ll make sure everything’s ready for when Celestia gets here tomorrow morning.”


Truth be told, you never planned on doing anything. Everything is as good as it needs to be already. You make your way to your room, but you get a shock when you open the door.


“Spike!” you call.


“Yeah?” he answers.


“Why is the air mattress set up in my room?” you ask.


“Well… Princess Celestia wanted to sleep in your room,” the baby dragon admits.


“I’ll have to hide everything she won’t like before she gets here,” you say. “At least tell me she’s sleeping on the air mattress.”


What does Spike say?
133211222121.title: Overloaded

choices: "The air mattress isn't that bad, is it?"
"Oh, yes it can. Celestia requests to sleep alongside you, actually..."
1332112221212.content:
There was allong pause.

"Weeeeeeeell..."

"Lemme guess, no?"

"(Sigh) Sorry, your name." The baby dragon scratches his head.

"It's cool. Can't get any worse than this..."
1332112221212.title: He can't say what isn't true.

choices: Celestia follows you upstairs and eavesdrops on your call.
13321122212121.content:
“The air mattress isn’t that bad, is it?” Spike asks.


“It’s not the mattress I’m mad about. It’s the fact that I have to sleep on one in my own room,” you explain. “It’s a pride thing. Being a dragon, you should understand.”


“Yeah, when you put it that way…” the dragon says.


“Well, I’d better get to work cleaning my room,” you say. Your room was the only room that Twilight didn’t touch. She always made a point of you doing things for yourself. For some reason, she thinks you’re incredibly lazy, which isn’t true in the slightest.


…


Okay, maybe you procrastinate a little here and there, but that doesn’t count as being lazy, right?


So you proceeded to make your bed, fix up your closet, and straighten out your drawing table. After that, you got to work hiding anything that Auntie Celeste wouldn’t like. R-rated movies, drawings of girls (because Celeste never liked you bringing up the subject of girls), CDs with those “Parental Advisory” stickers on them, anything that she would deem, in her words, “inappropriate for a boy your age,” which is weird considering that you’ll be eighteen by the end of summer. You even make a personal commitment to change the password on your phone every day in case Celestia wanted to do some snooping.


“Well, everything is in order,” you say to yourself. “I should sleep on the air mattress tonight so I don’t mess up the bed. Tomorrow’s gonna be one hell of a Saturday morning.”


The next morning, you wake up to the smell of breakfast being cooked. You walk downstairs and see Twilight and Spike getting a big meal set up. You also notice that Twilight was already showered and dressed.


“Finally! You’re awake!” she says. “Go and take a shower then get dressed.”


“I already have one parental figure coming over. I don’t need another one,” you say before going up the stairs to take a shower. After cleaning yourself up and getting dressed, you go back downstairs to see a mini buffet set up. You lick your lips in anticipation and go for a plate, but a bolt of magic hits your hand as soon as you reach out to grab one.


“Not now!” Twilight scolds. “Wait till Princess Celestia gets here!”


You rub your hand and start to mumble to yourself. “Paranoid, crabby, overbearing little-”


“What was that?” she asks.


“Nothing,” you say.


Just then, you hear a knock on the door, and the unicorn grunts in frustration. “Can you get that, [your name]?” she asks. “Whoever it is, tell them that we’re really busy and to
come back later.”


You roll your eyes and make your way to the door. Once you open it, you’re immediately hugged by the pony on the other side.


“[Your name]!” the pony says. “It’s so good to see you again!”


When the pony lets go of you, you see that it’s a mare. A unicorn mare with a white coat and a pink mane tied back in a long braid. She had on a sun hat and was carrying two
suitcases with her.


“Do I know you?” you ask the mare.


“I know I’m in disguise, but you should still be able to recognize your dear auntie!” the mare says.


“Celeste?” you say.


“Of course, sweetheart!” she says as she walks in and closes the door behind her.


“P-P-Princess!” Twilight says in surprise.


“As you can see, Twi’s been driving me crazy with how perfect she wanted everything to be,” you explain.


“It seems my faithful student still has much to learn,” says the princess as she dispels her disguise.


Once you put away Celestia’s bags in your room and returned downstairs for breakfast, she explains that she wanted to be incognito for this entire vacation.


“If anyone asks,” she says, “I’m Twilight’s cousin Solaria.”


Just then, your phone rings. You check the caller ID and see that it’s Rarity. “Excuse me, guys,” you say. “I need to take this upstairs.” You go up to your room and close the door behind you.
13321122212121.title: Just Get Over It

choices: "Will you meet me later for a... date..?"
133211222121212.content:
"Hello?" you start, completely oblivious of Celestia, err, Solaria

"Good morning, darling!" you hear from Rarity. "How are you today?"

"Fine, Rarity. How about you?"

"Just the same. So, er, I was wondering, [your name], if you, uh..."

Since the speaker was loud enough for even Solaria to hear from behind the door, she was able to see that womething was off. 'Funny. I don't remember Rarity ever being able to hesitate for anything. What happened and what does she want with [your name]?'

"What is it?"

"Well, er..."
133211222121212.title: Sneaky Auntie

choices: Celestia standing in the doorway, smirking at you.
1332112221212122.content:
Your heart stops for a second, but then you quickly collect yourself and resist the urge to blurt out "Yes! I'd love to go on a date with you." "Play it cool. Just be natural," you think. "Sure, Rarity. What did you have in mind?" you ask calmly.


You hear Rarity give a sigh of relief into the receiver. "Well, I was thinking that we could go to the diner at around one-ish. If that's okay with you, of course."


You chuckle. "You sound like Fluttershy."


"Oh, ha, ha, ha. You are such a comedian," she says.


"I try. I'll see you at the diner," you say.


"Okay, darling. Goodbye," she says. You hang up the phone and head towards your door. You had originally planned to stuff yourself, but you decide to saves some room for your lunch with Rarity. When you open the door, you see...
1332112221212122.title: "Will you meet me later for a... date..?"

choices: -- an excited unicorn full of energy.
-- a shy mare who was slightly relictant to see you.
13321122212121221.content:
You look around and see no one in sight (in your sight that is). Seeing that it's noon, you try to find Twilight, completely oblivious to Celestia Solaria behind you.

'So [your name is dating Rarity, huh?' Solaria thought, invisible to the human eye (ironically). 'Interesting. Maybe I should keep a close eye on him, uh, see if he needs any help in this date...'

Meanwhile, you were downstairs talking to Twilight about what happened.

"So, it can be assumed, err, concluded now that you and Rarity are dating now?" she asks.

"Well, I guess so. I felt really bad after Jumper rejected her, and with the events that happened yesterday, I think it brought Rarity up to this stage. I wonder if it was inevitable..."

"Maybe. Either way, I was hoping you would be together soon. You are the perfect guy for her! I hope things go well for you today."

"Speaking of which, where's Ce-- I mean, Solaria?" You still can't believe she's here like this: your aunt in disguise and her sister taking care of duties in Canterlot.

"Not sure," she replies, not even knowing herself. "It's like se disappeared somehow. Knowing her, she probably is."

"Hmm." You leave and head over for Rarity's. After the walk over though, you hear a twig snap. Looking back, you're staring at your aunt, still not visible. "Hmm."

Once at her door, you take a deep breath, pray to Celestia that you don't mess this up, and knock. Once open, the door reveals
13321122212121221.title: Nothing of interest here.

choices: She waits to see how this plays out.
133211222121212211.content:
"Darling! You're here!" Rarity says as she answers the door. She lunges at you and hugs you tightly. "You have no idea how happy I was when you accepted my offer to go on a date!"


"You have no idea how nervous I was when you asked me." you answer.


"You didn't sound nervous on the phone," she said.


"Really?" you ask.


"Certainly," she answers. "In fact, you sounded so confident, it made me even more nervous!" Rarity lets you go, and you get a good look at what she's wearing. She had on a white blouse with black jeans with her cutie mark sewn into the sides. (You only know what Rarity's cutie mark looks like because you saw her in a bikini once.)


"You look great," you tell her. "You don't look too bad yourself," she says. "Why don't we get going?"


The two of you make your way to the diner, and take a seat in the outdoor section. It was a beautiful day, so why not? Solaria, who was still invisible, follows you every step of the way, eventually taking a seat in a nearby chair. "So, what are you having?" you ask Rarity.


"Hmm..." she ponders. "I'm going to get the hay fries," she says.


"That's weird," you say. "I never took you as one for hay fries."


"They're a guilty pleasure of mine," she says. "Besides, my flank could stand to be a little bigger."


"No argument here," you think.


"I see that smile."


"What smile?"


"The one on your face, darling. The one that appeared the moment I mentioned my flank. You haven't been staring lately, have you?"


"Of course not."


"You're a worse liar than Applejack." Rarity says as she kicks you playfully.


"Okay, maybe a few times. You're not mad, are you?"


"Surprisingly, no. If it were anypony else, though..."


"You mean like the guy behind you?"


"Wha-?" she turns around and sees nopony there. "Oh, you're horrible!"


"Well, this seems to be going well for [your name]," Solaria thinks. "With all his friends being girls, I'd be worried if he didn't at least have a crush on one of them. I wonder if I should spice this up..."
133211222121212211.title: Somepony's Happy

choices: Incognito Auntie as a waiter with your food.
Solaria shows up with friends as a "hangout"...
1332112221212122111.content:
"But actually," Rarity continues, now that Solaria is out of sight (again, ironically), "I wouldn't mind if my flank did get a bit bigger."

Now that the conversation got this far, you start to blush. "Uh, Rarity--"

"Oh, it's alright, darling," she continues. "Matter of fact, I even cracked your diary one day." She takes two pages with drawings, one of her in the bikini that one day that says "Rarity now" and another drawing that makes her look just a bit plump, with slightly bigger assets, cheeks a bit wider, and a phrase that say, "How I'd like Rarity later."

Your blush got heavier when you saw that it was her who broke the lock, even though you blamed Twilight nearly a year ago, the fact that you want Rarity chubby, since you like girls that way, and that its being thrown down right now.

"Where did you get that?" you said, in a tone reminiscing to Fluttershy's.

"A mare has to have secrets, [your name]. Again, I don't mind. After all, like I said, hay fries are a guilty pleasure of mine, did I not? I want you to be happy."

"Yeah, but I don't want you to go to extreme measures like that..."

Scooting closer to you, "I don't mind, darling. If you want me to be chubby, then I'll do it..." she grabs your chin, "... for you."

Just before she kisses you, there came such an awkward moment:
1332112221212122111.title: It does by itself before she does

choices: The waitress, who reveals her identity as Celestia to you.
13321122212121221111.content:
Just as Rarity was about to kiss you, a waitress shows up with some plates. Rarity quickly pulls back and clears her throat nervously. You look at the mare that just approached you and see that she's a cream colored unicorn with an orange mane wrapped in a bun. Unbeknownst to you and Rarity, this mare was Celestia in disguise.


"Hello! Here's your food, lovebirds!" she says with a cheerful tone.


"Oh, thanks..." you say with a blush.


"No need to be embarrassed, sweetheart," she says. "I think it's quite romantic that you two have no problem with kissing in public." She then looks at Rarity. "Judging from our boyfriend's looks, you're a pretty lucky mare." she tells her, and the white unicorn blushes. "So, what would you two like to drink?"


"Diet cola," you and Rarity say simultaneously, and the waitress giggles.


"Okay, then. I'll be right back with your drinks. Enjoy your meal!" she says before skipping off.


"Well, she's... eccentric," says Rarity.


"Yeah, but I realized something..." you say.


"What?"


"We never ordered our food, but somehow she knew what we wanted, and notice how there are more hay fries on your plate than mine."


"Are you mad that I got more than you?"


"You know full well that's not the point. That mare... the way she talked... it sounds familiar."


"Oh, you're reading into it too much, darling. Let's eat."


"Well, I'm gonna go to the bathroom first. Excuse me for a minute."


"Alright then, [your name]."


You walk inside, and instead of going to the bathroom, you look for that waitress. Luckily for you, she was looking for you. you feel a tap on your shoulder and turn around to see...
13321122212121221111.title: Master of Disguise

choices: No (It was just for kicks but she ain't telling you that)
133211222121212211111.content:
As soon as you felt that tap, you turn around, seeing that waitress right behind you.

"Oh, hey," you start, "you're the waitress from earlier."

"Would you like something else?" she asks.

"Uh, no, I was just wondering how you..."

"Yes?"

"How you were able to know what we wanted."

"Despite the fact that you're my dear nephew, that I'm your Auntie Celeste in disguise and that you should've told me about dating Rarity much earlier? Just luck, I guess."

You nearly choked when the name "Auntie Celeste" was uttered. This takes embarrassment to a whole new level. "Well, if you're-- then... what-- huh? Okay. Let me ask this first: what are you doing working in a mid-class diner, with tasty food I might add, when you're royalty?"

Giggling, she answers, "I guess I wanted to see how it feels like to work in something that isn't overwhelming."

"Reasonable enough. How are you doing this?"

"I'm a master of disguise, [your name]. Who else did you think that mare was when you saw her and Pinkie Pie in the kitchen two days before your last birthday?"

Now you know who the cake, fruit bowl... and the snakes were from in that piñata. Pinkie Pie swore to Celestia, ironically, that she wouldn't prank you. You guess that that was a loophole.

"Master of loopholes as well. And why are you here on my date with Rarity?"

Does she tell you?
133211222121212211111.title: It can't be more awkward than this...

1332112221212122111111.content:
"Really, Auntie?" you ask when she tells you why she's following you and Rarity.


"What? I can't look you for you anymore?" she asks innocently. "I just wanted to make sure your date went well." She pauses for a moment. "Honestly, I felt a little proud when I found out you were going on your first date."


"Celeste, you're about to start monologuing," you say with a groan.


"Okay, okay, I'll change the subject. How about that little chat with Rarity earlier, hmm? I didn't know you were into big girls."


"N-not 'big girls'... Just girls who are a little bigger than avera- wait, why am I telling you this?"


"Because you know you can tell Auntie anything,"


"Why can't I shake the feeling that you mess with me on purpose like a troll?"


"That's an odd comparison. Trolls aren't very mischievous creatures,"


"You know full well that's not the kind of troll I'm talking about. Luna might be a little out-of-touch with today's language, but I know you aren't."


"Oh, stop being so whiny and get back to Rarity. It's not polite to keep a lady waiting, you know."


You open your mouth to say something, but you realize that she had a point, and you turn around, heading back to your table. Celestia, still disguised as a waitress, follows shortly after you, drinks in hand.


"Thank you very much, Miss," said Rarity.


"Oh, you're very welcome," said the waitress. "Enjoy!"


Once Celestia leaves, you sigh. "So, Rarity, what do you have planned for the summer?"


"Well, there's a summer fashion show in Canterlot in a month, and some of my designs will be featured in that show," she says happily.


You chuckle. "Knowing you, you've most likely gotten started on your designs."


"But of course! Every fashion show is an opportunity to get more customers, and this time around, I'm starting to expand my horizons and designing human clothes. I figure that I'll get more business by doing so."


"Listen to you. You're speaking like a real professional and making a decent living, and you're not even out of high school yet. You'll be a top designer before graduation."


"Well, success is nothing without somepony to share it with. Perhaps you would like to accompany me at the show as my personal guest."


"Don't you normally invite the girls and Spike, as well?"


"I do, but I only got one extra invitation. And all the designers only got 'plus one' tickets. The show will be broadcast worldwide, though, so the girls and Spike will be able to see it, still."


"Well, I'd love to go with you," you say.


"Well, let's not let this food get cold," says Rarity, and the two of you eat while continuing to chat idly. Once the bill came, you offered to pay. Thankfully, the bill wasn't obscenely expensive like in those romantic comedies that had those cliche dinner scenes. As you walk Rarity home, she holds your hand while looking at you with loving eyes.


"I know I said this before," she says. "But I don't know why I didn't notice how perfect you were for me."


"Better late than never right?" you say as the two of you approach the Carousel Boutique. "So, what are you wearing for the dance next Friday?"


"It's a surprise, darling," she says. "I'd kiss you, but my breath smells of hay fries."


"Just a quick peck?"


"I guess I see no harm in that." the unicorn giggles. She gives you a quick kiss on the lips and slips into her home, blowing you a second kiss. You chuckle, and start to walk back home. You just hope that Celestia Solaria doesn't do anything to ruin this dance for you, like showing up.
1332112221212122111111.title: An Unwanted Shadow

choices: Solaria pulls you into a dance.
13321122212121221111111.content:
"Okay, Auntie," you say. "Our carriage is here, so Twilight and I are gonna head to the dance," you say.


"Alright, you two," she says. "Be safe!" Little did you know that Celestia planned on showing up to the dance as Solaria.


Meanwhile, in the carriage, you and Twilight see the rest of your friends.


"Finally! [You're name]'s here!" Rainbow Dash says.


"Since when are you ever happy to see me?" you ask jokingly.


"I want to settle an argument I was having with one of the fillies on my track team," she explains. "The argument was over whether or not guys profile women on how good they are in bed when they haven't even slept with them."


"How did that topic come up in conversation?" you ask.


"Who cares? Is it true or not?" she asks impatiently.


You sigh. "Not with all women, just the ones that we're good friends with."


"Well, you're good friends with us," says Rarity, "so you must have an idea of how we might be during intimate moments."


"I, uh... well..."


"He does!" Pinkie chimes. "He totally does!"


"In that case, [your name]," says Twilight. "Why don't you tell us our profiles?"


"Not on your life."


The unicorn smirks and shoots a beam of magic at you. When it hits, you feel a familiar tingle. "Oh, no. Not the truth telling spell," you say.


"I'll ask you again, [your name]," says Twilight with a devious smile. "What are our profiles?"


"Oh! Oh! Me first! Me first!" says Pinkie Pie.


"Pinkie Pie's the kinky one that will try anything," you say against your will.


"And me?" Applejack asks.


"The rough one," you say, making everypony burst out in laughter, except Fluttershy, who wasn't very comfortable with the topic at hand.


"What about Fluttershy?" asks Rainbow Dash.


"I'd rather not know..." the yellow pegasus says.


"The gentle one," you say.


"No surprise there," says Dashie.


"You're the squealer," you say.


"What!? How!?"


"Any mare that acts tough all the time is a total squealer. It just makes sense." The carriage erupts with laughter again, everypony agreeing on what you just said. Even Fluttershy giggled a little bit.


"How about me, darling?" Rarity asks.


"Dominatrix," you say reluctantly. The unicorn ponders this for a second and says. "Yep, that's me, alright."


"Alright, now me," says Twilight.


"This should be good," Rainbow whispers to Pinkie.


"The freaky one,"


At that point, everypony else, including Fluttershy, laughs loud enough for Canterlot to hear you. Twilight, on the other hand was blushing profusely. "The freaky one? Why?"


"The bookworms are always the freaky ones!" Pinkie Pie giggles. "I bet you have some really freaky fetishes, Twi!"


"Oh, whatever," she says.


The carriage finally pulls up in front of the school, and you all file out. However, just before you enter, a certain somepony calls out to all of you.


"Hey, [your name]! Cousin Twilight!" she calls. Everypony turns their head to see Solaria approaching you and Twilight.


"Oh, fuck me," you say under your breath.


"Oh, hi Solaria," says Twilight.


"Surprise! You weren't expecting me were you?" says the princess in disguise.


"Everypony, this is my cousin, Solaria," says Twilight. "She's going to be staying with me and [your name] for a while."


"I wanted to surprise you two, plus I wanted get out of the house for the night, so this was the perfect excuse!" Solaria says.


"Well, what are we standing out here for?" says Rainbow Dash. "Let's go inside!"


What happens during the dance.
13321122212121221111111.title: Real Talk in the Carriage

133211222121212211111112.content:
It was a fun time, for the hour, dancing to your hearts content, wondering what the flavor was for the punch, teasing each other for not getting down on the dance floor, and overall, having a good time. The only thing to fuck everything up was this next song.

         While Rarity wasn't around, Celestia Solaria pulls you in for a slow dance. Trying not to get aggravated, you whisper to her, "What do you think you're doing?"

         "What?" she asks. "I can't dance with my nephew?"

         "Look, it's not that I don't want to dance with you, even though coming out of me right now sounds like a complete lie; it's just that I'm here with Rarity and I don't want her to know about this."

         "Don't worry. She probably won't take it the wrong way. After all, it's just a friendly dance, isn't it?"

         Unable to wiggle out of this, you angrily dance with Solaria without showing any emotion, except a slight "are you kidding me?" expression.

         Unbeknownst to you though, Rarity came out of the filly's washroom and looks for you. Once she saw that you were dancing with your aunt (in disuise), of course, knowing her, she didn't take it so well.

         Actually, she's...
133211222121212211111112.title: This is way off...

choices: Accept her help and say "Alright, but we have to hurry!"
Swat your hand away and say "No way! You've done enough!"
1332112221212122111111122.content:
Rarity sees you dancing with Solaria, and at first she's a little suspicious, but then Solaria says something that boils Rarity's blood.


"You know you're all I think about when I'm in Canterlot," she says. "I'm always worrying about you."


"You don't have to worry about me, you know," you answer.


"I can't help it. You know you're very precious to me," she says as she nuzzles you.


"Oh, you are, are you?" Rarity says angrily, standing right behind you.


"Rarity?" you say in surprise.


"What, you weren't expecting me to be back so soon?" the angered unicorn asks. "Or did you just lose track of the time dancing with your side mare!"


"Rarity, it was nothing like that," you say.


"Oh, don't give me that!" she argues. "I can't believe you! I thought you were different from the others!" The unicorn turns and leaves in a huff. You stand there putting your hand on your forehead, both because you couldn't believe what just happened, and because you couldn't figure out how nopony else noticed the altercation.


"I have to go after her," you say to Solaria.


The disguised princess grasps your hand before you can leave. You turn to her, and see her looking straight at you. "Let me go with you. This was my fault, so I owe it to you to help you fix this."


What do you do?
1332112221212122111111122.title: Totally Misread

choices: "You really expect me to believe that?"
"Don't curse out my sister like that!"
13321122212121221111111222.content:
With regret you swat her hand away from your shoulder. "No way, Solaria. You've done enough for today."

         Searching throughout the gymnasium, you try to find your date, but fail. You even ask the others if they've seen her. "I'm not sure, [your name]," Twilight says. "Last I saw, she went this way." She was referring to the exit.

         "Oh, no..." You run over and see just in time that Rarity was walking slowly. Probably going home because of this, despite the fact that it's a bit out of reach from walking distance.

         "Rarity!" you call out. She stops.

         "What is it?" she asks, with some passive aggression in her tone.

         "Look, what that was back there wasn't what it looked like. You see Solaria--"

         "Do you really expect me to believe that!?" she exclaimed, turning around. Now you can see how much damage was made. Her tearing angered eyes tell it all.

         "Solaria was the one that pulled me to dance; I didn't really have much of a choice." Now you stop to see what happened. "Wait a minute, what am I saying!? That't my aunt in disguise! (Groan!) Luna-damn it!"

         What was the next thing you heard?
13321122212121221111111222.title: Thanks a lot, Solaria!

choices: "I could do something 'extra special' when for you when you take me home."
133211222121212211111112222.content:
Both you and Rarity are surprised by this sudden interruption, and you both turn to see Solaria walking towards the both of you… well, just you.


"Wait, did she say 'sister'?" Rarity asks.


"Solaria, I told you to stay behind!" you say sternly.


"I don't take orders from my nephew," she retorts.


"Nephew!" Rarity exclaimed in surprise. "So when you said that Solaria was Celestia in disguise, you were telling the truth?"


You and Solaria look at each other, and the unicorn in question lets out a sigh. Her horn glows a familiar gold color, and a gold ribbon of light surrounds her, eventually disappearing and revealing the from of Princess Celestia.


"Yes, Rarity. [Your name] was telling the truth," she admits. "You see, I came to Ponyville on vacation from my royal duties and assumed a false identity in order to hide myself. I never intended to put any strain on your relationship, I just wanted to dance with my nephew. This misunderstanding was completely my fault, and I'm really sorry."


"Oh," Rarity says, wiping away a tear from earlier. "I understand… I guess I overreacted." She then looks at you. "I suppose I owe you an apology, [your name]. I should've trusted you. It was wrong of me to jump to conclusions like that."


"It's okay, Rarity," you say. "In retrospect, what you saw was very misleading. Honestly, if you didn't assume the worst, I'd think that something was wrong with you."


Celestia giggles at your remark. "Look at it this way," she says to the unicorn, "This just proves how much you care about my nephew, and I couldn't ask for anything more in a potential wife."


Hearing that last bit nearly made you choke on your own saliva. "Auntie!" you say. "We've been dating for barely a week, and you're already talking about marriage!?"


"Take note, Rarity," your aunt says, practically ignoring you. "It's really fun teasing [your name], not to mention easy."


"I'll definitely keep that in mind," she says with a giggle.


"Great," you say, looking up at your aunt. "The last thing I need is another one of you."


"You know you'd be lost without me, sweetheart," she says nonchalantly.


You open your mouth to say something, but then you realize how right she was. "Whatever," you mumble.


"And that's how you know you've won an argument with him," she says to Rarity.


"Oh, I learned that ages ago, Princess," the unicorn giggles.


"Shh. It's Solaria," the princess whispers jokingly as she casts her disguise spell on herself again. "Well, now that this whole misunderstanding has been cleared up, why don't we get back to the dance. I bet those oblivious teenagers didn't even realize that we left."


You and Rarity chuckle and follow Celestia Solaria back to the gymnasium. When you get there, Rarity pulls you aside for a moment.


"Listen, darling," she says. "I just want to apologize again for acting the way I did. It was very unladylike of me."


"Like I said, Rarity, it's fine," you respond.


"I know, but I still feel like I should make it up to you and pay you back," she insists.


"You really are the Element of Generosity," you say. "What do you have in mind?"
133211222121212211111112222.title: Watch Your Mouth!

choices: Tell her you'll get Applebloom for her.
14.content:
You scratch your head in thought on who to help out...they just happen to send all at the same time text messages requesting you at the exact same time. Bad luck for you huh?

You take a seat on the edge of your bed, rubbing your chin as you think who would really need your help at the moment.

<Rainbow Dash...> you think to yourself, both of you two tend to bicker & yell at each other for some reason. Whether its you not being to Impressed with her athletic skills or just cause she seems to take everything you say way to literal.

You shake your head, deciding helping Rainbow is not a option at the moment, beside..she has loads of other friends to help her out with something like that, she is the captain of the running team after all. Still, you need to remember to ask that Rainbow-maned Athlete why she takes everything you say to seriously.

You lays back against your bed, holding up your cell phone to see the message after Dash's.

<Pinkie Pie..> you looks away from your phone and back up to the ceiling. Watching the fan spin as you think of your pink-colored party loving friend. Pinkie Pie is a...strange mare, you never understood her crazy antics but she is lots of fun to be around, its hard to be sad with her. But, ever since that..Bake Bad's thing, You never want to be with her in a kitchen ever again.

You feel your body shiver at the thought of those things. You skip Pinkie Pie's message and see the next one.

<Rarity...> you say her name in your head with some affection, the beautiful white coated mare was a Fashion designer, a very good one at that. She made every one of her dresses with much care & love. You recall a fond memory of sharing each others dreams. You can't recall yours, but you remember hers is to have her designs be used by models & find her prince charming.

You remember when she said that, she look into your eyes..like if she was hoping for something, too this day you don't know what she meant.

You sigh to yourself, Rarity once told you that your taste in fashion is...atrocious.

You skip down Rarity's message and see the next one is from Twilight Sparkle & Fluttershy

<Fluttershy..> You smile to yourself as you think of the cute yellow-colored mare with a flowing pink mane, she's everything you'd love in a mare. You recall the first time you both met, she was barely able to say her name, saying it so small & softly with her face being all red. It made your heart explode from adorableness. You two both had this love for animals, which made Fluttershy talk with you a lot more easily.

You smile, wanting to go help her out...but with Twilight their..

<Twilight Sparkle> you chuckle to yourself, no need to say much about Twilight. You love her...as a sister, ever since you met her back then when you were a young boy back in Elementary. After Elementary though, you had to leave since your father was moving jobs all the way to Baltimare. The sad day when you had to tell her yourself that you were going far away was heart breaking non the less. You told her how you loved her, like your own sister.

Then, praise Auntie Celeste, she manage to hook up your dad with a nice job over here near Canterlot. But when you two meet after so long, she felt cold..stuck up towards you for some reason. Then when Celestia send you live with her, the stuck up level increased ten-fold..

You feel yourself getting depressed just thinking about it..

"One more message.." you mutter aloud, you scroll down Twilight's and see the last.

You feel yourself smile again. "Applejack"

Applejack, if there is anypony you've been hanging around with most of your time in Ponyville, it would be Applejack. She had so much confidence like Rainbow Dash, but wasn't to arrogant. She was beautiful, maybe not as much as Rarity, but Applejack had something more than looks. She was kind-hearted, but didn't let anypony treat her like trash like how Angle bunny does to sweet Fluttershy. She was a fun, maybe not in a sense of fun like Pinkie Pie, but looking at clouds, kicking some apples with someone can be fun. She was a leader, like Twilight Sparkle. But unlike Twilight, Applejack wouldn't throw everything out of proportion like when she did just for not sending her letters on time.

Taking a deep breath, you sit up. You've decided to go help Applejack...watching Applebloom can't be as bad as dealing with somepony arrogance, a sicking dessert, getting drama for saying a dress looks nice & dealing with a cold-devil while petting some cats...

You start running down stairs, you spot Spike dusting some shelves on the latter.

You run past the latter, causing it to spin around with the poor dragon holding on for dear life.

"W-W-waaah!! [Your Name]!? Where ya going!?" Spike shouts as you open the door in a rush

You stop for a second, you feet still stamping the ground. You tell your dragon friend with a grin "Going to AJ! See ya!!" and on those words...you're off.

============================================================================ ==============================
After running through Ponyville for the past 10 minutes, you finally reach the front gate of Sweet Apple Acre's. You breath hard as you take some steps forward. You got to thank Rainbow Dash for all the running, you're more faster than you give yourself credit for.

You walk past the little entrance to get into the barn's fields. You look around, seeing haystacks near the barn, the farm animals walking behind the fences, the workers readying the fields

You huff, wiping off some sweat on your forehead. Wondering if AJ is inside her house.

You walks towards the Apple Family's house, you wonder what Big Mac is doing since you never seen him not on this farm. You reach to the front door of their home. You knock on the door 3 times and wait.

After a minute, the door opens. Your eyes are greeted with a nice sight. A tall-orange mare who is wearing a brown cowgirl hat, orange cowgirl-daisy duke top that shows off her midriff with a pair of blue tight shorts that hug her waist tightly that also show off her nice long legs. Her grayish yellow mane & tail are both tied with a band at the end of them.

"[Your name]! You're here now, I thought you'd wouldn't be showing up" said the southern belle of the Apple Family Applejack

You feel yourself blush, you wipe your nose with your finger to hide the blush. "Eehe, Sorry...was busy for a bit.." you tell her, you don't want to tell her you blew everypony off for her. She's to nice like that.

Applejack's muzzle forms a smile, the 3-freckles on each of her cheeks complement her beauty. "Dat's all fine and dandy Sugarcube, I was more worried for Applebloom, she's the one that wanted to see you here.." Applejack says, her shoulders leaning against the door way.

You blink, Applebloom wanted to see you? You find it funny...you do recall seeing her every time you hang around AJ. You wonder why.

Applejack seems to have realized that she's been letting you stand in the heat, she gets off the door way and takes a step inside her house. "Sorry about that sugarcube, C'mon" She urges you.

You walk inside the Apple House, walking past the kitchen and slumping your butt on the living room couch. Applejack giggles at you as she walks to where you are.

"Well, wait here den', I'll go tell Applebloom about ya being here now" she tells you as she walks towards the stair case.

You blink, you open your mouth to tell her "W-wait AJ!"

Applejack stops as she reaches the first step, she blink and walks in front of you. "What is it sugarcube..?" she asks.

You stare at Applejack with your mouth hanging open, your words on what you're gonna say die in your mouth as your eyes taste the sweet eye candy of her well-shaped body.

Applejack's chest bounces slightly from the breath she takes, her tight daisy duke shirt is the only thing holding them back since it seems she doesn't wear a bra, Applejack might have the 2nd biggest set, only losing to Fluttershy. Her belly shows off all the hard work she does for the Apple Family, kicking all those apples & doing all those challenges from RD have toned her body well. Her tight shorts hug tightly against her hips, showing her nice tight butt when ever she moves & bends over.

You vaguely recall when you asked her about her cloths, was that when she works she gets sweaty fast, so she wears the midriff-baring shirt & the tight shorts was to keep her from being to hot.

Applejack stares down at you, her eyes narrowing slightly from you silence. AJ snaps her finger to get your attention.

You blink, wondering what just happen as you look up at Applejack, her left eye twitching in annoyance as her right hoof taps the floor "See something ya like sugarcube...?" she says sternly.

You blush & slump back against the couch, shaking your head fast "N-No..uhhh..nothing.."

You forgot that Applejack tend to get a lot of unwanted attention just from her choice of clothing, some customers,passerby & even some workers all seem to eye her with a dirty look in their eyes, hell, you once saw somepony try to make a pass at AJ with some joke about Daisy Duke needing to ride his wagon or something like that, didn't end well for the poor bastard though..

Applejack tilts her head as she waits for your reply "Well? What did ya want Sugarcube..?"
14.title: The Apple of Your Eye

choices: "if you'd like to get a bite to eat sometime?"
"if you'd want to see a movie together?"
141.content:
You want to tell Applejack something, but for the life of you, you can’t remember. You don’t want to keep her waiting while you desperately try to remember what you had to say, so you just say “Never mind.” Applejack shows a look of confusion on her face as she turns around and walks up the stairs.

You mentally kick yourself for making yourself look like a total idiot in front of AJ. The minute she gets out of your sight, you instantly remember what you wanted to tell her. You were going to tell her that you had feelings for her. Your mind must have gone blank when she turned her attention to you. You take out your phone and send replies to all your other texts saying the same thing: “Sorry, I have a previous engagement.” You get responses within seconds.

Rainbow Dash: “No worries, then. I can find someone else.”

Pinkie Pie: “Awwwwww! Okay, then.”

Rarity: “Well, I suppose it can’t be helped. Good luck with whatever you’re doing.”

Twilight Sparkle: “Alright then. I wouldn’t want to interrupt your ‘engagement’.”

You can’t help but think that Twilight put some passive aggression in her message, and you can sense the disappointment in Rarity’s message. Well, you can’t please everyone. Just then, you hear a familiar voice.

“Hi, [your name]!” the voice says. You turn to see a yellow pony with a pinkish-red mane and tail coming down the stairs.

"Hey, Applebloom." you say.

"So, I was wondering'… if you'd like to see my clubhouse." she says. You were aware that Applebloom hung out with two other ponies and that they were known as the Cutie Mark Crusaders, but you didn't know that they were a legit club. "Umm… sure." you say.

"Great! Come on!" she says as she practically drags you by your arm to her clubhouse, with her older sister trailing behind the two of you. Applebloom spends the next several minutes showing you around the club house. You catch sight of a long list of talents that the Crusaders attempted in order to find out what their special talent was. You chuckle to yourself. After the "grand tour," you and the Apple sisters lounge around outside the clubhouse. You decide to take a chance and ask AJ out, but you had to get her sister out of the way, first.


"Hey, Applejack," you say.


"Yeah?" she says, turning her attention to you.


"Can I talk to you in private for a second?" you ask.


"Okay…" she says, unsure of where you're going with this.


"Applebloom," she says. "Could you give me and [your name] some alone time for a hot minute?"


"Ummm, okay." she says, and she walks back to the house.


"Alrighty, we're alone now, so what is it that you were fixin' to say?" asks AJ.


This was your chance now. You silently hope that you don't screw this up. "Well, I was wondering…"
141.title: Choked Up

choices: Big Mac is watching you and Applejack through the window.
1411.content:
"...if you'd like to get a bite to eat sometime?" you manage to ask.


"Well, Ah'd love to, sugarcube," says the southern belle, "but Ah can't go tonight, since Big Mac ain't here to watch Apple Bloom, and ya know Granny Smith ain't fit fer babysittin'. Tell ya what: Big Mac is comin' back to Ponyville tomorrow night, so how about the next afternoon?"


"Alright, Sunday afternoon it is," you say, trying not to sound too excited.


"Can't wait, partner," she says. "Now, Ah need t' get to work."


"Sure," you say as Applejack walks away, but then something dawns on you: You forgot to tell her that you meant for your outing to be a date. You smack yourself for forgetting to mention that. Oh well, you can still admit your feelings for AJ on Sunday. You walk back into the Apple Family home to watch Apple Bloom while her sister works the orchards.


When you get home later that evening, you're greeted by Twilight.


"Why were you out so late? Why couldn't you help me and Fluttershy? Why didn't you put the toilet seat down?" she asked quickly.


"Can the interrogation wait until after I get in the house?" you ask.


"Fair enough," the unicorn huffs.


You enter the room and sit on the couch before addressing Twilight's inquiries. "I was helping Applejack at the farm. Big Mac isn't around, so she has do do his chores on top of her own, leaving Apple Bloom without someone to watch her. As for your last question, would it kill you to look before you sit?"


"Whatever," she says. "You could have just told me."


"Are we really having this conversation?"


Realizing that nothing will make you care about her complaints, Twilight grunts in frustration and goes up to her room. How you were able to put up with her for three years is beyond you.


Two days later, you walk to Sweet Apple Acres to meet Applejack for your lunch "date". When you knocked on the door, instead of AJ answering, it was Big McIntosh. Seeing him towering over you with a blank expression almost made you shit bricks. "H-hey, Big Mac," you say nervously. "Welcome back to Ponyville... Everything good?"


"Eeyup," he replies.


"So... I'm here for Applejack. We were going out for lunch today..." you say.


Big Mac raises an eyebrow at you and turns around to call his sister, who rushes down to see you. "Howdy there, sugarcube!" she says. "Sorry Ah couldn't answer the door. Ah was havin' some trouble findin' my hat."


"No worries, AJ. Ready to go?" you ask.


"Sure," she says as you two set off to the diner. As you were leaving the farm, however, you got the feeling that you were being watched, so you turned around to see that...
1411.title: No Turning Back Now

choices: A smile and a nod, for you finally going through.
A suspicious like squint, with brotherly instincts added...
14111.content:
Seeing him right there on the window, you try to make out his expression. It scared you and until you knew what it was, you're paranoia isn't gonna go down anytime soon.

         And his emotion is...
14111.title: He's the older brother.

141112.content:
Your heart skips a beat when you see Big McIntosh's expression, and you quickly turn back around, a bead of sweat running down the side of your face. Applejack looks at you in concern and asks "Somethin' wrong, sugarcube?"


"Nothing at all, AJ," you say with a fake smile as you both continue on to the diner. When you get there and take your seats, you try to make small talk with Applejack.


"So, aren't you glad that school will be ending soon?" you ask.


"Ain't Ah ever!" she says. "Math class has been gettin' me all stressed and what not, and this is my last year of takin' it!"


"Oh yeah, I forgot that you hated math," you chuckle.


"How can you forget, when Ah'm always complainin' about it?" she asks.


You chuckle again and say "I usually tune you out when you go on one your 'I hate math' rants."


"Why yer just terrible!" she says.


"You know I'm just kidding," you say. "Matter of fact, I think it's really cute when you get all worked up. Your face turns a pretty shade of red when it happens."


"It does?" she asks nervously, making her face turn the same shade of red you were talking about, causing you to chuckle.


Here's your chance, you can tell AJ how you feel now. There's nothing stopping you, is there?
141112.title: As If You Weren't Nervous Enough

choices: Your bad, wrong shade and expression, lol.
1411122.content:
Rubbing your eyes, you look around and try to see if things are right. Up to the point where Applejack starts to get concerned.

         "You okay there, sugar cube?" she asks.

         "I'm fine," you reply, "don't worry."

         Actually, you were the ine that needed to worry. If that really is Big Mac, then you know something is wrong.

         Was it the cowpony's brother?
1411122.title: Are you blind?

14111221.content:
After closer examination, you realize that there's no denying it. Big Mac is here, and he's staring right at you and Applejack. You gulp nervously and try to keep your mind off of his presence. Whether he's here or not, you're going to confess to AJ. He can't be mad at you just for telling his sister that you like her, can he?


"Hey, AJ..." you say with a deep breath.


"Yeah, hun?" she asks. You blush at her calling you "hun." She has called you that before, but for some reason you felt a little flattered by the name.


You shake your head and continue talking. "There was a reason why I invited you to lunch with me..." you say. "You probably think that we're just hanging out like we always do. We are best friends, after all..."


"Of course!" the mare says with a big smile.


"Well, the thing is..." you hesitate for a moment, then continue. "I was hoping that we could be something a little more than just 'best friends,' because the truth is... I really like you. A lot, actually. I've felt this way about you for a while now, and the possibility of rejection made me afraid to tell you."


Applejack's face softens tremendously, and she puts a comforting hand on your shoulder. "Now listen here, sugarcube. You shouldn't be afraid t' tell me anythin'."


"You sound like my aunt," you chuckle.


"Celestia?"


"Who else?"


"Well, as Ah was sayin', Ah'll never think any dif'rent of ya or end our friendship just because ya have feelings for me. Honestly, Ah've never thought of ya that way, but Ah'm definitely willin' t' give this relationship a try. Ah mean, ya are pretty cute."


You blush again at the compliment, but you blush even harder when you see AJ leaning across the table towards you. You feel her lips touch your cheek and you almost jump out of your seat. "Thanks, Applejack," you say with a smile, but that smile disappears when you remember that Big Mac's been watching. You take a quick glance over at him and see that...
14111221.title: You Thought So...

141112212.content: Was it that whole slightly confused expression mixed with a concerned expression, or that slightly angered one where he doesn't approve?
141112212.title: To what side?

choices: She wiggles her hooves "The obvious answer Tiger~"
She shakes her back "My back would be nice.."
She turns around & archs her stomach "My belly could use a good rubbing..."
1412.content:
If you'd want to see a movie together..?" you manage to ask without sounding like your balls are being clenched.

Applejack looks at you for a few seconds, her eyebrow raises slightly "Is that why you're acting so weird lately sugarcube..?" AJ says as she crosses her arms over his chest while looking at you a bit unimpressed. "Just to ask me to a see a movie...?"
You feel your heart beat a bit faster, feeling's of doubt hitting your chest as you get the sense that she doesn't seem interested..

Your southern crush , Applejack suddenly starts to give a hearty chuckle "Heheh, oh come on [*Your Name*]~" she says as she playfully punches your shoulder lightly, even those light punches have some force into them.. "We've been pals like needles in a' haystack & doing thing's togetha for a long time..Now ya acting like you're asking me on a *date* hehe~" Applejack says with a giggle at the *Date* part.

Applejack does have a point, you two tend to do a lot together, seeing movies, bucking the apple trees (or more like pick them up, since you're human), watching Rainbow Dash to make sure she ain't cheating during their little race's.

You closes your eyes & sigh, you open your eyes with some resolve.

Applejack seems to notice the serious look on your face, since she slowly stops her giggling. "[*You're Name*]...?" Applejack says your name a bit nervously, even her face shows some worry. "W-why are ya looking at me like dat..?" she asks you.

"Cause that's what I wanted to ask you.." you say, trying hard to not let your voice betray you. Your hands hold against each to give you some comfort as you look into her emerald eyes.

"What I'm asking you right now is not are simple thing we do as friends...but a Date.." you finish saying to her.

Applejack's eyes widen from your words, the beautiful southerner's eyes look around frantically to avoid yours. She turns her head away from you, her long yellow mane blocking the view of her cheeks. Applejack holds her left arm, rubbing it softly as she tries to think of what to you say to you. "I-I don't know what to say sugarcube...this is so..sudden" AJ says with a stutter in her voice, something you've never heard coming from such a confident mare.

Your hands let go if each other & slide into your pants pocket as you look down at the grass in sadness "It's okay AJ...you don't have to...I just wanted to ask you for a long time and just..let it out" you mutter, loud enough for her to hear at least. You slowly look up at Applejack, her face still turned away from you, somehow, you manage to see something red under her mane. It causes you to smile. She's cute when she's embarrassed~.

You hear a little giggle from AJ, she turns her head to look at you, her freckled face haves a luminescent blush on her cheeks. "It's all right [*Your Name*]..I'm happy that you were honest with me...for dat, I thank ya with a *Date*" Applejack says with a saucy tone at the word date, even her face gives you a good seductive look with a hot eye flutter.

You suddenly feel that heaviness of rejection get kicked away towards the moon, you get a crazed smile "R-Really??!" You ask, making sure you heard her words right.

Applejack gives a little laugh, sounding a bit nervous again "Eheh~ Yeah..." her words trail off...suddenly, AJ's eyes turn hard & glare at you, she takes a step towards you & pokes her finger hard against your chest, causing you to be taking back.

"But..." she growls softly with a jab of her finger poking your chest "If I find out dat' y'all only interested in me because of....this!" she takes a step back & points to her rather revealing cowgirl clothing. "You got another thing coming mister....~" AJ finishes by taking a step closer to you with her face being inch's away from your own.
You blush like crazy from AJ being so close to you, you slowly nod your head in understanding.

Applejack's harden stare slowly turns into a seductive & lustful look in her eyes, you barely realized that Applejack's arm wrapped around your neck& her body is leaning against your chest. Slowly, being lost in this moment you've been wanting for so long, your eyes slowly close. AJ's eyes also close as both of your lips slowly meet. Under the apple tree of Cutie Mark Crusader's clubhouse

Congratulations, you've had your first kiss with your sweetheart~

Applejack taste like..no surprise, apples. But, theirs this sweet cinnamon like flavor...so sweet, you just want to keep tasting it.

The moment that felt like a eternity, actually was just 10 seconds of pure bliss.
Both of you pull back, your lips making a *smacking* noise as they part.

You & Applejack look into each others eyes for a second, her face having so many shades of red, your face must be as well. Both of you seem to be trying to say something but can't seem to get it out.
Suddenly, you both release each other & take a step back. You cough into your fist & look away, rubbing your nose to keep your blushing red face hidden.

Applejack does the same by rubbing her arm fast & looking away. .

Applejack gives a weary giggle, she kicks her hoof on the floor bashfully with her arms holding each other behind her back. "So...about that date? Ya wanted to see a movie right..?" she ask with her tone still having the cute nervous tone.

You nod, lowering your hands from your face since you think the blush is gone now "Yeah..." is all you can say at the moment, really, after what you did its kinda hard to think of anymore to say.

"Well, sorry sugarcube, but I don't think I'll be able to go too any of theaters..." Applejack says sadly "With Big Macintosh gone helping Cousin Braeburn in Appleloosa with transferring some of are tree there, it might take'em a few days for em to get back. And I need to focus on bucking all the apple's by myself.." AJ finishes telling you

You feel a bit disappointed, but really, you got what you've been wanting from AJ for..well, just asking. Honesty is a virtue indeed.

Applejack seems to notice that sad look in your face, she gives a genuine toothy grin "Now, I can't *go to the movies* with ya..but I can watch one with ya in my house"

You feel yourself light up again. "Awesome!" you say enthusiastically like when Twilight get's herself a new book to read.

Applejack giggles at your excitement, she turns away from you & starts walking over to her house, giving you a nice look at her sweet-ass & swishing tail. "Well, might as well watch one now since my jobs done for today, Come on Tiger~" your southern beauty teases you with a new nickname as she walks into her house.

you quickly run into the Apple Family's house, not wanting to leave your crush waiting.

Unbeknownst you & AJ, Applebloom as been watching you both from her up-stairs window. The little pony's face seems to be a bit red & her eyes filled with a tears....

You put in a video cassette in the VCR in the Apple Family's living room, Applejack went up stairs to put Applebloom to sleep since its past her bedtime.

The movie you're both gonna watch is some Wild West flick, figures Applejack would like that kinda genre, but hey, so do you.

You click the rewind button & grab the remote, seating your butt on the big green couch as you wait for Applejack to come down. Your wish has been granted, Applejack slowly walks down stairs, still wearing her same get-up.

"Heya...wouldn't cha know, Applebloom decided to sleep in early by herself..." Applejack tells you a bit surprised, she sits right next to you on your right. You shrug "She did help you pick up the apple right? That is kinda tiring" you tell her.

Applejack nods, seeming to take your answer as the truth, she leans back on the couch as you press the remote to play. The VCR makes it noise & starts to film. The usual FBI warning & advertisement for other movies begin.
As one commercial starts about some child movie about some boy finding a special device & is some chosen-one starts. AJ shows some discomfort. Her legs keep crossing each other as well as her rubbing her hoof with her hand.

You notice this and ask her "Hey, Applejack. You alright?" your voice sounding a bit worried.

Applejack turns her head to look at you, she smiles softly & shakes her head "Na, I'm fine Tiger, it's just after a long day of apple bucking, my hooves tend to be sore..also doesn't help much when I do my exercises in the morning to stay in shape" she says. AJ lifts her right hoof on her lap & rubs it with her hand roughly. Grimacing slightly from the soreness "Applebloom or Big mac would give me a massage on my tense spots to stop the pain..." Applejack says as she glances at you, a bit of red covers her freckled cheeks.

You suddenly have a coy smile on your face, your eyes narrowing playfully as you understand what she's getting at.

"Okay then, I'll give you a massage then"~ you tell her with a little slur in your tone,

AJ gives you a little grin, her face still looking hot "E-Ehh~ why not...but it's not *just* my hooves Sugar~" she says back at you. Applejack flops on her stomach, she then lays her arms & head on the couch's arm rest. Her hooves lay on your lap, she kicks the playfully as she closes her eyes.

You feel yourself blush since you're gonna be touching Applejack..let's hope you can keep yourself under control.

You cough into your fist to clear your throat & then ask her "Where would you like me to start..?"
1412.title: Honesty is a Virtue

14121.content:
