Applejack looks back at you with a smirk and wiggles her hooves. "I think it's obvious, Tiger." You chuckle with slight embarrassment. You begin to massage AJ's sore hooves as you both watch the movie. "Ahhhh..." she says. "Ya sure are mighty good at this, sugarcube. Ya sure you've never done this before?"


You chuckle again. "Yeah, I'm sure."


"I reckon you're just a natural at this, then." she says. She pauses for a moment to enjoy her hooves being massaged. "So I was wonderin'," she continues. "What is it 'bout me that you like so much, if it ain't my body?"


You stop and think for a couple seconds. "Well, there's a lot of things..." you answer.


"Go on then." she says. "We got time."


"First of all, you're really easy to talk to." you say.


"If I was so 'easy to talk to', then why were ya havin' such a hard time askin' me out a while ago."


"That was different." you say. "As I was saying, I also like you because you're really down-to-earth. You're really fun to spend time with, but you're serious when you're supposed to be, and above all else, you're very honest."


"Well, it is my element." she says.


"That's true." you say.


You and Applejack continue watching the movie for about five more minutes until-
14121.title: Well, Duh.

141212.content: You stop momentarily so you can answer your phone. Who's on the other end?
141212.title: You Should Get That

choices: "I got to find out. Applejack will understand.."
"..I can't just dump AJ now..maybe I'll ask tomorrow..."
1412121.content:
You hear the sounds of your cell phone ringing, you jump up slightly as you weren't expecting anyone to call you. Even Applejack looks a bit surprised by the sudden ringing. You blush, really hoping its really important to interrupt your moment with AJ

"Ehehe..give me a second .." you tell Applejack, the apple farmer looks back at you with a coy little smile. She nods slowly & lays her head between her arms as she continues to watch the movie.

You gently move Applejack's hooves off your lap & stand up, reaching your hand into your back pocket to get your cell phone.

You quickly flip open your phone & say "Hello?". Suddenly, that familiar stoic voice speaks to you.

"Hey...where have you've been the past hours..?" said the voice of an old friend & your host of where you now live...Twilight Sparkle.

You feel a chill go up your spine as she sounds more colder than usual, she must be upset about you leaving her with Fluttershy to take care of those animals.

Before you say anything, you cover the speaker on your shoulder and look back at Applejack, the look on her face showing confusion & worry.

"What is wrong, [*Your Name*]..? Ya look like y'all being called by some ghost.." Applejack says. At this moment, that wouldn't be so bad..

You hold your finger up to her & shh "It's..important..I'll be right back AJ.." you whisper. Applejack blinks, wondering what's got you so fidgety.

"Well, alright hon.." she says back in a whisper.

You quickly step out of the living room, leaving your date alone to watch the movie meant for the both of you....

============================================================================ ===================================

You quickly go outside in the front of the Apple Family's house, leaning your body against the wall. You take a deep breath & hold the phone up to your ear. "Sorry about that...I was..busy.." you say to Twilight.

All you hear for the moment is just the static of the reception, then your lavender-maned unicorn *friend* speaks

"Uh-huh...Where in Luna's moon have you've been..!? Spike told me you left to Applejack's place..!" Twilight shouts into the phone, her voice sounding loud enough for your ears to go deaf for a second.

Your eyes twitch slightly & you move the cell phone away from your ears, pulling it back you reply. "I did..I came over to help her watch Applebloom.." you tell Twilight the reason why you came over.

"Too watch Applebloom? AJ needed help with that??" Twilight says in harsh tone, she's not done "Well, its nice to know she needs an extra pair of eyes to watch one kid."

You feels yourself grow angry, you retort "Hey, Big Mac left her in charge of the farm, she has to buck all the apples, make the cider, bake the pie etc.! She can't do all that if she's watching Applebloom.." you say back at Twilight with a snarl.

"Well, you could of at least TOLD ME yourself, instead of some *"Sorry, I have a previous engagement.”* bullcrap!" Twilight's voice booms through the phone's speaker.

You wince from how loud this mare can be "Look, I'm sorry about that, I didn't want to blow you off..I mean it" you assure her.

Since this conversation is over a phone, you can't be sure if you know what Twilight is really feeling.

Suddenly, she starts speaking again " Applejack usually bucks apples after school during the weekdays to 4 PM, during her weekend she starts at 3 PM and ends at 5 PM sharp....which was 3 hours ago.."

You blink, you look up into the sky and see its actually evening, Celestia has set the sun & Luna raised her moon up high, it shining brightly as the stars twinkle.

You grimace, meaning its 8 PM now..

"W-Well, you see..it's not just Applebloom, she needed help around the house..so I stayed longer." you say with your pride dimming, you can't just tell her that you stayed cause you asked Applejack on a date.

"Oh.." is all you hear from the other line. " So, helping Applejack around her house is more important than helping Rarity out with her dresses shes making for the students of are school's dance..?

What...?

"You of all people should know Rarity gets overworked with making dresses, she needed you there just so she can have a second opinion without having to doubt herself & tearing herself apart for something she doesn't think is right"

You didn't see that in the message..

"Or helping Rainbow Dash with her training for are school's annual track team race..?"

Rainbow Dash didn't tell you this...

" Rainbow has the whole team putting all their hope in her, so she's been staying at the track for hours & hours to get better..Dash can only have so much confidence you know..."

Again, Rainbow didn't say that in her message, besides! She told you she found someone else..she did right?

" Or with Pinkie Pie's muffin recipe? ever since that *Bake Bad's incident* she's been needing someone to test her pastries so she doesn't have to be blamed for a incident like that again.."

You suddenly feel your stomach drop, your hand reaches up to your face. By Auntie Celestia...you didn't know any of this..you thought they just needed some advice..that's it..

" And Fluttershy just wanted to talk with you...that's it .." Twilight finishes telling you, somehow you feel like their was a crack in her voice.

Fluttershy..you realize you haven't talked or hanged out with Fluttershy for the pass days at school...just a *Hello!* while heading to class.

Come to think of it, that's all you've been saying to the girls all the time at school this week.

You stand up & put one of your hands in your pocket as you start walking around. "Twilight..I didn't know this..they didn't tell me any of this..." you tell her.

You can vaguely hear the sound of a..sniffle?

"T-They didn't NEED too tell you! You would of figured it out yourself if you've just talked to us!! But-but you ALWAYS Hang-out with Applejack..! Always..Applejack..it's like you just picked one you liked..and left us all in the rain..!

You can't tell if this is Twilight Sparkle, the one you've known since childhood, or the stoic smart ass that you've come to live with the past years in Ponyville.

You feel yourself become depressed at this, Twilight is right, all you've been hanging out with is Applejack...You rarely ever go to school along with Twilight, go over to Rarity's art class to check out her work, watch Rainbow Dash run on her track field. Go with Pinkie Pie to do her crazy pranks. Talk more with Fluttershy to get her out of her shell..

But still, even though you've been neglecting Dash,Rarity,Pinkie & Fluttershy. Twilight has been acting odd before you even met them. This might be your only chance to ask her without her giving you the cold shoulder.

"Twilight...?" you say softly to her. "I'm sorry about that..truly...but, ever since I've got to live here in Ponyville, even when we met back in Canterlot. You've treated me like some unwanted nuisance than a friend..." you tell her. "Every time I even try to talk to you, you act so snotty, pompous & just giving me the cold shoulder...I just want to know now..why?

Then their was silence.

Finally, she says something "....I..don't want to tell you this over the phone...if you really want to know, just...come back home.. she tells you.


The line suddenly ends, the talk lasting for 5 minutes.

You sigh, closing your phone & putting it in your pocket. This might be the only chance you can get to the bottom of her attitude. But, that means you have to leave AJ during your date now..

What will you do?
1412121.title: What's Eating Twilight Sparkle?

choices: Ask Pinkie Pie to throw a party.
Take the girls out to the movies.
14121211.content:
"I got to find out why Twilight's been acting like this." you say to yourself. "Applejack will understand... I hope."


You go back inside the house and see AJ in the same position you left her in. She turns to you once she hears you enter.


"You've been on the phone for a while now, hon." she says. "Everything alright?"


"Actually no." you say. "AJ, I'd really hate to cut our movie night short, but I've got to get home. I didn't realize how late it was."


"Lemme guess, Twilight's been giving you the business?" she asks.


"You can say that." you answer.


"Well, go on, 'den." she says. "See ya around." She blows you a kiss and you wave goodbye to her before taking off on your way home. When you get back to the house, you unlock the door with your key and head inside. You see Spike sorting out the shelves in the library.


"She's in her room." he says.


"Thanks." you say back. You walk up to Twilight's room and knock on her door. "Twilight." you say. "It's me. Can I come in."


She doesn't answer. Instead, she opens the door using her magic. You see Twilight sitting on her bed, staring out the window. "I guess you really do want to know, why I've been so cold towards you."


"Why wouldn't I?" you ask.


Twilight sighs as she turns to face you. "Remember when we were just elementary school kids, and the day you moved away you told me that you loved me like a sister?" she asks.


"Of course." you say.


"I was really happy when you said that, because I loved you like a brother," she says. "but when you moved away, you never bothered to call me, or shoot me an email or something. It was as if you forgot about me." You look off to the side, because what she's saying is true. You kept forgetting to keep in touch with Twilight over the years. "I'm sure you have an excuse for that, though." she says.


"Actually, I don't." you say, and her eyes widen in surprise. "It's my fault that I didn't keep in touch with you Twilight, and it was stupid of me to think that you wouldn't feel bad about it. I'm really sorry, and I promise to make it up to you and the other girls."


For once, Twilight is speechless. "You... you mean it?" she asks.


"I swear." you answer.


All of a sudden, you feel your body being slightly lifted up into the air. You're then pulled towards Twilight, who wraps you in a hug.


"That's all I wanted to hear." she says.


After that little... moment, you go to your room and think about what to do to make it up to the girls.
14121211.title: What's Eating Twilight Sparkle: Part II

choices: Ask Pinkie Pie about your plan for a party
Save the idea for now, just hang out with Pinkie Pie.
141212111.content:
You drop over on your bed with the biggest smile you've ever had on your face.

*POMF*

A sigh of relief escapes your lips as you nuzzle yourself in your pillows. After a long day, not only did you confess to Applejack but you got your *sister* back as well.

You turn on your back & cross your arms behind your head, looking up at the ceiling while Luna's moon shines through the blinds of your window. Now, you ponder what to do to make it up to Twilight & the rest of the girls.

You closes your eyes & let your brain think...

Your eyes snap open as you have a grin on your face "...Ideeeeeeeea~" you say.

You know the perfect idea & a curtain fluffy maned-pink pony is gonna be the one to help.

You closes your eyes & sleep, since you're gonna need to get up early to meet with Pinkie Pie.

==========================================Saturday 7:34 AM========================================================

Celestia's sun shines high up in the sky's of Equestria, you've already have gotten out of the bed 20 minutes ago, Twilight & Spike still sleep. You quietly sneak out of your room & tip-toe towards the bathroom.

You clean yourself up with a shower,brush your teeth & comb your hair to wake yourself up.

After sprucing yourself up, you head down stairs as you make your stop to the kitchen.

After a few minutes pass, Twilight Sparkle walks down the staircase in her purple polka-dot pajamas which you always found adorable.

Twilight reaches the kitchen, rubbing her sleepy eyes as she ask you "[*Your Name*]..? What are you doing up so early on a sund-..huh??!" The lavender-colored unicorn gives a look of surprise as she sees the dinner table have plates of pancakes with syrup on them along with some veggie salads & waffles on the other plates..or maybe its cause you're wearing a apron.

You snicker at her reaction, just as planned.

You smile at Twilight and wave at her "Heya Twi, come over & dig in" you tell her as you start to take off the apron.

Twilight blinks, the mare then smiles & gives you a hug as she gets closer to the table.

"Thanks, this is very sweet of you" she says with genuine care.

You return the hug with much affection "No problem *sis*" you tease her. Twilight rolls her eyes at that & releases you, sitting down in the chair with the veggie salad dish. She picks up the fork on the side of the plate & starts to take a few bites.

"Mmph..this is really good.." she says with her mouthful.

You grin as your ego gets stroked, you did pass your cooking class with flying colors. <Cooking...Oh right!> you suddenly remember the real reason why you got up early.

You run over to the front door & pick up your shoes that stay on the rug, Twilight notices your sudden urgency & ask you with her mouth dripping some ranch sauce "[*Your Name*]..? What's up..*gulp* ahh~" she says as she swallows some of the salad.

You wave at her as you put on your shoes "Nothing important, I just need to go do some laps." you lie to her, though you do sometimes, right now you need to head to Sugarcube Corner.

"..But..shouldn't you eat first..? It's important for you to have all your daily servings you know.." Twilight states as she waves the fork at you.

You ignore that & start to prepare your legs by jogging in place. "Yeah, yeah I know Twilight but I gotta go! See ya!" you say to her as you rush to the front door & run out.

Twilight reaches out to you & calls your name as you leave, but you're already gone.

She sighs, hoping she'd at least be able to eat breakfast with you..

"*Yawn* Morning Twilight!" said the sleepy Spike as he walks to the kitchen.

Twilight looks at Spike & is about to greet him.

"IS THAT PANCAKES!? OH BOY!!" The little dragon's mouth drop with his tongue hanging out as he spots the fresh food on the table.

Suddenly, Spike's digging into all the food that's not a salad, making a mess on the table & splashing crumbs on Twilight.

Twilight's ears twitch & eye twitches in irritation as some bits of butter slide down her cheek..all she says is.. "..Boys..."

===========================================Saturday 7:43=========================================================

You finally reach Sugarcube Corner after running for the past 9 minutes, you feel a bit bush from running. You really hope someday you'll be as fit as Rainbow Dash & Applejack.

You walk up to the front door, since Sugarcube doesn't open on Saturdays for some reason, you knock on the door, hoping Pinkie Pie will be there.

You wait for the door to open for at least a minute, you tap your foot on the floor.

After knocking again & the same results happen. You sigh in disappointment....

"Pinkie Pie must not be here then.." you say aloud..

Suddenly a playful voice from a familar friend says aloud behind you "I'm not here for what, you silly??"

You jump up & let out a girly scream as you turn around to see Pinkie Pie, the pink-colored & fluffy maned pony that works for the Cakes of Sugarcube corner.

Pinkie Pie stares at you with her signature smile & big blue-eyes, she wears a simple yellow loose shirt with short sleeves. Her legs wear a big striped socks that reach up to her frilly skirt.

You smack yourself mentally, you really need to stop checking out your friends.

You blush slightly & give a force smile back at Pinkie. "Hey Pinkie! I was hoping to talk to you.." you say a bit bashfully.

Pinkie Pie's face beams with happiness, she bounces up 'n down which make her skirt & shirt show off some of her skin "REALLY!? GREATCAUSEWEHAVEN'TTALKEDINREALLYLONGTIMESINCEYOULIKEALWAYSHANGAROUNDAPPLEJA CKORRUNNINGAWAYFROMTWILLIGHTANDSTUFFAN-"

You quickly cover Pinkie Pie's mouth with your hand, she blinks & tilts her head as she looks at you. You forgot how Pinkie Pie can go on 'n on..

"Eeh..sorry, can we talk inside..?" you ask her as you move your hand off her mouth.

The pink pony nods "Sure!"

She walks over to the Sugarcube corners front door, lays her head on it, tabs it gently...causing the door to swing open...how did she even open it without turning the knob at least..?

"Come on silly!" she says as she walks inside.

<Its Pinkie Pie..you can't explain Pinkie Pie..> you tell yourself mentally

You then walk into the Sugarcube Corner..


Now that you're here, will you tell Pinkie Pie about the surprise party for both of your friends? or maybe tell her this later & ask how she's been doing and stuff?
141212111.title: To Slaugter-I mean Sugarcube Corner!

1412121111.content:
You decide that you'd have plenty of time to talk to Pinkie and the other ponies when the party gets started.


"So, [your name], what do you want to talk about?" she asks.


"Well, I actually have more of a question." you answer.


"Oh, goody!" she says. "I love questions!"


"Yeah... Anyway, how fast can you get a party started?" you ask.


"Depends." she answers. "How many guests?"


"You, Twilight, Rainbow Dash, AJ, Rarity, and Fluttershy." you say. "Oh, and Spike if he wants to come, too."


"Oh, that'll be easy-peasy, and today's a perfect day since the shop's closed. The party should be ready by noon." she says. "What's the occasion?"


"You'll all find out when the party starts." you say. "What I need you to do is forward a text to the girls telling them to come here at noon and that it's a surprise."


"Okey-dokey-lokey!" says Pinkie Pie.


"Do you need any help setting up?" you ask.


"Oh, don't you worry about me." she says. "I'll be just fine."


"Alright, then." you say. "I'll be back at around quarter to noon."


As you leave Pinkie Pie's you decide to visit one of your other pony friends. Rarity and Fluttershy's houses were the closest. Rarity is usually up bay now, especially since she has to make outfits for the prom, and Fluttershy is up before anyone (except maybe Celestia) so she can tend to the animals. So, who do you go to.
1412121111.title: First Things First

14121211111.content:
You decide on going over to Rarity's shop, the Carousel Boutique. Since you'll be meeting Fluttershy anyway at the party there’s no point for you to have a guilt trip about it!

You change your direction & head towards Carousel Boutique, wondering how Rarity is doing with those dresses. Part of you wonder's how Applejack is doing right now.

Heh, probably bucking some apples like always.. you tell yourself, maybe once you done meeting up with everypony, you'll go see Applejack to give her another massage....

But enough about that, TO CAROUSEL BOUTIQUE AWAY!!


===================================Carousel Boutique===============================================================

After a bit, you reach Rarity's home & shop. You notice the sign on the entrance says *OPEN* so you might as well just walk inside.

You open the door, taking a few steps inside Rarity's shop, the place looking rather tidy. Though the tables & floors have tuxedos & dresses scattered all over them.

It's not like Rarity to dump her work around the place unless she's really, really overworked...

You close the door & take careful steps so your shoes don't smear any dirt on the cloths or floor; you look around the boutique to see were your fashion loving friend is.

"Rarity..?" you call out, hoping she would answer. No answer.

Walking over some more dresses, you finally see her.

The beautiful white-coated unicorn with a radiant indigo mane stands on her on her personal stage, mannequins circled around her, wearing her latest designs for Ponyville High’s prom night.

You're finally able to walk normally since the floor before you ain't covered with her clothes & fabric.

Rarity seems to have not noticed you. She's so into measuring each of mannequins with her designs. "Almost perfect...just almost…" you hear her mutter to herself.

The lovely mare wears a simple long white dress that covers down to her knees with a beautiful diamond necklace around her neck; no doubt it's one of her own self-made dresses. Simple, but it complements her natural beauty.

You walk up on the stage, right behind her. "Hey Rarity" you speak.

"A-aah!" The unicorn squeaks in shock, she quickly turns around & presses her back against the mannequin that she was measuring. Rarity stares at you in surprise. She blinks as she realizes who it is now.

"[*Your Name*] darling?? W-What are you doing here all of a sudden..?" she says with a little crack in her tone.

You smile & tell her "Just wanted to see you, that's all...”

The look on Rarity's face lights up, her ears perk up as well "R-really?" she says. You nod & take a look around the boutique "Yeah, and help you out with the dresses, like you asked me yesterday." you reply.

Rarity seems a bit taken back at that for some reason "Oh..I see.." she says tiredly as her ears drop, her mane looks a bit messy, even her designer work glasses can't hide the tired look in her eyes.

You feel that damn guilt again for not deciding to help Rarity out...

Rarity seems to notice the look on your face, she giggle softly & stands up straight. "It's fine dear, I've manage to make most of them yesterday anyway" she states.

You feel a bit better hearing that, she is one amazing worker... maybe a bit better than Applejack.

"Well, I'll help pick up around here." you say, Rarity seems fine with that, she nods "Thank you darling. I just need to spruce up these clothing and I should be free."

On those words, she turns around & goes back to doing what she does best. Letting out a tired sigh, you turn around & see all the cloth on the floor of the store. This is gonna take me awhile... you think to yourself.

After about 23 minutes of grabbing every piece of fabric, cloth and clothing, you feel yourself sweat a bit as you keep bending over. Hell, you can feel you thighs getting a bit sore.

Unbeknownst to you, Rarity has taken a few glances at your...*ahem* hindquarters with a little blush on her cheeks.

As you finally grab the rest & put them on a little neat pile on one of her work tables, you walk back to Rarity.

"Rarity, I finished up finally...” you tell her.

The white-colored unicorn turns around with a smile, her horn glows that shimmering azure, using her levitation spell to keep up the sewing of her dress. "Oh, wonderful! Thank you, darling!" she squees in delight. Suddenly she grabs your shoulders & pulls you closer; she then plants little kisses on both of your cheeks.

You can feel the burning shades of red heat on up on your face..

"T-Thanks it was no problem...” you state while averting your eyes in embarrassment.

Rarity giggles at your expression. Suddenly her face turns a bit saddened as if she's thinking about something. She quickly does a heel face turn back towards her mannequin & crosses her arms around her chest as she concentrates back in sewing this one last dress.

You blink, wondering what's with the sudden feel in the mood.

" [*Your Name*]..?" she says.

"Yes, Rarity?" you reply, wondering what’s on her mind.

She then asks you a question...

"Would you..." she trails off, her voice having a little edge in her tone.

"Would you...
14121211111.title: The Diamonds in the Rocks

choices: She refuses, and she's mad at Applejack!
141212111111.content:
Your heart skips a beat when Rarity pops the question. The look of hope in her eyes really throws you for a loop. If you didn't like Applejack, you would've said yes almost instinctively. It almost killed you that you would have to say no to her, but you were planning on asking Applejack, since the two of you were (sort of) together. You want to let Rarity down gently, though. You know how much of a drama queen she can be sometimes.


"I'd love to go to the dance with you, Rarity..." you say. "but I was going to ask someone else."


As you expected, Rarity is hurt deeply. "What?" she asks in disbelief. "Who were you going to ask?"


You might as well tell her the truth. "...... Applejack."


"Oh..." says Rarity, her ears drooping.


You feel that you practically ruined Rarity's Saturday, and her plans for the prom as well. You need to do something to cheer her up. "Tell you what, Rarity." you say. "Since I haven't asked AJ yet, if she says no, I'll go with you."


What's Rarity's response?
141212111111.title: Big Letdowns

choices: Go visit Fluttershy or Rainbow Dash
Go to Applejack & ask if she'll go to the prom
1412121111111.content:
You stand there with a force smile, praying to your Auntie Celestia that Rarity would answer & understand.

She looks into your eyes with them being slightly teary, the white unicorn mare then wipes her eyes softy & smiles back.

"T-That's alright with me darling..thank you.." Rarity says softly, giving a little bow gratitude.

You feel a bit of weight be lifted from your shoulders, you remember that Rarity is the Element of Generosity after all, you need to give her more credit on that.

But, that only took off a bit of the weight. You clench your teeth & look away from Rarity as you think.

Luna dammit...I really want to go with Applejack... you think to yourself, you slowly then look back at Rarity's face, her eyes flutter as she blinks with her face having a luminescent blush on it. Her azure eyes look into yours like if she's seeing into your soul.

You feel yourself getting flustered from her gaze.

...Now part of me really hopes Applejack doesn't except my offer! Now you feel like you have a Cowgirl & Material Girl pulling at each of your arms till they split you in half..ouch.

Rarity suddenly wraps her arms around you & pulls you into a little hug, you feel your face turn into a tomato. Going on instinct, you return the hug to the lovely unicorn.

You both pull back, Rarity being quick to take a step away from you.

"Well, best be going darling, thank you so much for the help. Now I believe I can take a nice nap..*yawn*" said the very tired Rarity as she rubs her eyes.

You nod "Glad to be of assistance." you say, being a bit of gentlemen, you bow.

Rarity giggles "Well, scoot along darling..good luck with...Applejack.." she says with a strained tone.

You smile sadly & nod "Thanks.."

You then start to walk towards the exit of her home, glancing back at Rarity one last time before leaving Carousel Boutique.





As you step outside and start to walk to goddess's knows where, you wonder what to do now.

*sigh*...I was hoping to visit Fluttershy or Rainbow Dash, but with the offer I gave to Rarity, I feel like I should be heading to Applejack's home and ask her... You think to yourself.

It's never easy huh..? Well, what now?
1412121111111.title: What do, What do..?

choices: "Sorry, sugarcube, but I'll have to say no."
14121211111112.content:
You decide to go ask Applejack to the prom since you'd have plenty of time to catch up with Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy. Before you head off, you check the time. It was half past eight, and you were supposed to be back at Sugarcube Corner at quarter to twelve, so you have time to take the fifteen-minute walk.


As you make your way to Sweet Apple Acres, you began thinking about what AJ might say when you ask her to prom. If she's as attracted to you as you are to her, then she'll definitely say yes. Don't forget that she kissed you yesterday, and she's not the type of girl that would string a guy along.


On the other hand, the prom is one of those events where you dress up really nicely, and Applejack was never into those kinds of things, except for that one time she went to the Grand Galloping Gala. If she does say no, you can take Rarity, who's really excited about the dance.


Rarity...


Now that you think about it, Rarity has been dropping some hints that she may have feelings for you. You recall talking to her about her dreams, and aside from being a famous designer, she wanted to find her "Prince Charming." For some reason, she was looking at you with a weird look on her face. You look through your phone on a hunch and see that the majority of phone calls and text messages you received were from Rarity as well.


You do feel some attraction to her, but it's nowhere near as strong as the feelings you have for Applejack. You begin to wonder if promising to take Rarity to the prom if Applejack said no was a good idea. You didn't want to treat her like she was a backup girl. She didn't seem to mind, but love makes people do crazy things...


Your thought process was interrupted by the realization that you reached AJ's place. That was arguably the shortest fifteen minutes of your life. You knock on the door and look around the farm. Applebloom is usually running around with her friends at this hour. If they weren't here, you most likely would've run into them on your way to the farm. Finally someone answers the door.


"Heya, Tiger." says your cowgirl friend as she sees you.


"Hi, AJ." you say.


"What brings ya here this time?" she asks.


"I wanted to ask you something," you say. "but before I do, where's Applebloom."


Applejack sighs. "She's been in her bed all day. I haven't the slightest clue what's wrong."


"Well, tell her that I hope she feels better soon." you say.


"Will do." she says. "So what was it you wanted to ask me, hon?"


"Well..." you say. "I wanted to ask you if you wanted to go to the prom with me."


Applejack pauses for a moment to think about it, and she says...
14121211111112.title: Popping the Question

choices: Oblige Applejack & give her that massage
Tell her you really, Really, REALLY, need to go some where important
141212111111122.content:
"Sorry, sugarcube, but I'll have to say no." said Applejack.

You stare at the cowgirl pony for a good minute as her words reach your cerebellum..

"No..?" you say disheartened, you feel yourself take a step back in shock. You honestly thought she'd say yes in a heart beat!

Applejack takes notice of your body language, the cowgirl grimaces & rubs her arm softly. "I'm really sorry Tiger..." Applejack says softly. You manage to regain your composure & step back in place.

Your mouth opens up with a slight quiver as you speak "B-but why..?" you say with a weak stutter.

Applejack sighs & looks away from your direction, her hooves kick on the edge of the door way "Ya' should know [*Your Name*], how ah'y hate dressing up with those frilly dress, wearing dem weird horseshoes...It's just not me.." admits AJ with a huff. "Ah only wore a dress at the Gala for selling my apple stand, them buckers said ya need to look important or something.." Applejack blushes slightly for recalling the times she wore that dress..and that one time Rarity dared her too..but she ain't telling you that.

You blink, that's it? That's the reason why she doesn't want to go with you..? Part of you understands, Applejack hates getting all pretty with make up or a dress, reason you like her so much is cause of her natural beauty. But another part of you feels offended that she won't go just for your sake.

Either way, you just sigh in defeat "It's alright Applejack..." you state in defeat, so your original idea is shot down the tube. Suddenly the image of Rarity in one of her fine dresses dances in your head, you feel your lips turn into a little smile.

Applejack pulls her hat down to block the sun's gaze from hitting her eyes, she looks at you sadly & pats your shoulders "Ah'y am sorry about this Tiger, hope ah'y didn't ruin ya day now.." she says as she rubs your shoulder lightly.

Feeling a little smile form on your lips, you look into her eyes & shake your head "Na, it's alright AJ. It was just in the moment..I wasn't even really planning on going to prom..heh.." you tell her,

Total lie on your part, you really wanted to go to prom with your special somepony, that's another reason why you helped Applejack out, too confess & ask her out..though, Twilight DID kinda ruined that for you when she called..but you leave that in the past.

Applejack tilts her head back slightly, her eyebrow raised as she judge whether you mean what you said or not. The cowgirl grins & playfully smacks your shoulder..ow.

"Aw shucks you little devil, ya don't need some silly dance to say this..." Applejack says in slur like voice, suddenly she grabs both of your shoulders & pulls you for a deep passionate kiss. Your body tenses up & feel your emotions get bewildered at the start, but as the kiss progresses, you feel yourself get putty in her strong grip & forceful lips.

Applejack decides to break it to your disappointment , her lips pull back from your with a loud *smack*. The cowgirl looks into your dazed eyes with a little grin on her freckled face, her strong arms releases your shoulders & she taps her index finger on your nose "Ya don't need anything fancy~ just love 'n care" said Applejack.

Your eyes derp a bit from such a breath-taking kiss, she must of had practice. No one could be this good without practice. You shake your head & nod with a little grin.

AJ smirks coyly, she turns around & walks back into her home, her butt shaking gently as her tail sways.

You eyes end up glued to her rump...

Applejack turns her back to look at you, noticing where your eyes are staring at. The smirk on her face still there, she makes a gesture with her finger to come inside. "Come on Tiger, might as well give ya a nice drink or something" AJ says, her voice still dripping with seduction.

You quickly look away from her butt & scrunch your mouth, you prepare to take a step inside till something in your mind, well...reminds you of something.

Oh crap, Rarity! you remember, now since AJ shot you down, you should tell her soon.

Feel like maybe now would be the best time, you nervously grin at Applejack

"Uhh..that's all right AJ, I kinda need to-" your sentence gets cut short as AJ speaks back at you.

"Nonsense! What 'eve ya doing ya should at least rest for a bit." Applejack retorts.

As you're about to tell her you really need to be some were, AJ comes over to you & pretty much grabs you inside with ease even with you struggling.

Applejack pulls you inside the house & tosses you on the couch you two spend your movie night together. You let out a little yelp before your face collides with the cushions.

AJ lets out a little giggle, "Ehehe~ Alright now settle down sally, I'll go get ya something t'a drink..." Applejack says as she leaves to the kitchen.

As she leaves, you pull your face from the cushions & rub your face.

"Dear Luna, she's so forceful..." you say to yourself.

Not feeling like sitting down, you stand up and start to walk around, thinking about the idea of really taking Rarity to the prom...

You close your eyes as you walk around the coffee table, envisioning the idea of being with Rarity.

She would be a in one of her beautiful dresses, walking down stairs from her house to meet you, you'd be in one of her fancy tuxedos. You would take her hand & lead her to a fancy carriage outside, arrive in style in front of the school. Dance in the ballroom, win the cutest couples contest..and seal it all with a ki-

"*ahem* Didn't ah tell ya to relax Tiger...?" the sounds of your cowgirl beauty interrupt your little fantasy.

You jolt up & turn to look at Applejack, her face showing a bit of annoyance. She puts down a tray that has some apple juice (go figure), some sliced apples (again..go figure) & a sandwich on the coffee table.

You scratch the back of your head "Uhh..sorry, I'm fine really.." you tell her.

Applejack just huffs & closes her eyes, she lets herself slump on the couch. Sweat flowing down her head & body profusely, she tends to work her butt off every morning with some running & exercises to limber herself up.

"Ah what'evea..." Applejack mutters in a tired tone. She lays her head against the couch's arm rest, her hooves being held up by the other end.

Looking at Applejack's body, seeing the sweat drip down her face, stomach & legs sort of makes you feel aroused. You clench your legs with grit teeth, really not wanting any sort of wood right now.

Applejack gives another tired sigh, she arches her body forward & stretches. Giving you a good view of what makes her so damn sexy...

"Mmmm~! Since ya not so tired, would ya mind giving ya southern beaut another one of ya masterful massages..? " AJ says, crossing her hooves together "Ah could really use one.." she says with that seductive voice again..


Oh boy....
141212111111122.title: It Was to be Expected...

1412121111111221.content:
You give a sigh as you glance at the clock. You still had three hours before you had to be back at Pinkie Pie’s, but you tend to lose track of time when you’re with AJ. You’d have to set an alarm on your phone for eleven –thirty just in case you lose track again.

“Alright, Applejack,” you say. “I’ll give you a massage.”

“Thanks a plenty, sugarcube!” she says as she lies on her stomach on the couch. “I was wonderin’ if you’d work on my back this time.”

Your heart skips a beat as you hear this. Massaging AJ’s hooves was one thing, but her back? Needless to say, this makes you nervous.

“Well, don’t be nervous, now,” she says. “I won’t bite ya.”

You take a breath and walk towards the southern beauty lying on the couch and get to work on that massage, trying your hardest not to get aroused. It didn’t help that Applejack would let out a sigh of relaxation every so often.

“Dead puppies, monster trucks, the smell of an old person’s house…” you think as you try to distract yourself from how hot this was. The last thing you want is for AJ to get the wrong idea. Finally, after several minutes, her phone gets a text, and you have a good idea of who it’s from.

“Well, lookie here,” she says. “Pinkie Pie invited me and the other ponies to a party at noon.”

Seconds later, your phone gets a text from Pinkie as well. You read it and it says:

“Just sent the txt 2 the girls. Can’t w8 4 the party! :)
-Pinkie”

“I got an invite, too.” you say.

“Well, that gives me somethin’ to do today.” says Applejack.

You get back to work on that massage, and eventually AJ is feeling much better.

“Ah! That was amazin’, hon!” she says, stretching her body.

“Glad you liked it.” you say. “Well, I’d better get going.”
“Alrighty, then. See ya at the party.” she says. “Oh, and sorry again fer turnin’ down your offer for the prom.”

“It’s no problem,” you say.

Applejack gets up and walks towards you. “You’re too sweet, ya know that?” she says. She then hugs you tightly, the feeling of her chest on yours putting a smile on your face. AJ then kisses you on the cheek saying something you were not expecting to hear.

“I love you.” she says with a wink.

Hearing this was surprising to say the least. It was also really bittersweet. On one hand, Applejack just said she loved you. On the other hand, now you’re gonna feel really guilty when you take Rarity to the prom. You couldn’t think of any other response except…

“Thanks.”

You quickly leave Sweet Apple Acres and check the clock. It was eleven fifteen. You have plenty of time to make a quick stop at Rarity’s and tell her that you’re taking her to prom, but it wouldn’t kill you to help Pinkie Pie finish setting up for the party and just call Rarity. Then again, she may prefer to be told in person…
1412121111111221.title: It Won't Take THAT Long...

14121211111112211.content:
Knowing Rarity she will not be happy if you just tell her "Hey! AJ blew me off so I can go with you now!" from a text message. Your legs start making you walk all the way back to Carousel Boutique.

You can't help but hear those words over and over inside your mind...

I love you..said Applejack You feel your eyes get droopy as you keep hearing her sweet accent say those words. You sigh & slide your hands in your pocket.

Applejack drop the Love card so soon, you weren't expecting to hear that from her till maybe about a month or a year of your relationship. Though, you two were best friends before you confessed your feeling's to the apple farmer. You still remember the day you both met, going to your first week of high school. Your eyes close as you take yourself back....


============================================================================ ====================================
Things were rough back then, Twilight wouldn't talk to you, you haven't met the rest of the girls & the topper, you are the only human in Ponyville High School...scratch that, Ponyville in general.

First day was awful..once you got to your first class, Miss Cheerilee made you stand up in front of everypony to introduce you..

It felt so awkward, standing there, while your teacher pretty much tells the class about you...or more like what you are.

The eyes of everypony staring at you like if you were some freak show, maybe to them, since they've never seen a human in person before. Some eyes filled with curiosity , some filled with wonder, but most filled with disgust. When Miss Cheerliee told the class to you ask you about yourself, most the question felt more like insults..

Why is your mane so short?

Where's your tail..?

Is your muzzle broken..?

Do you have a cutie mark?

You some sort of monkey?

You never had these kinda question back in Baltimare..but back there humans are more common, this felt really odd for you. You end up answering about not having a tail by saying you're born without one, you face is naturally shaped this way, you don't get marks on your butt & your human ancestry are from apes.

The curious or disgusted eyes of the pony's stayed looking at you even after all the question...even when Miss Cheerliee finally let you take a seat.

This wouldn't have been so bad.....if it didn't happen over & over in all your classes

Seriously, all your classes were about, telling the students what you are, letting them ask the same questions, answer them no different. You never felt such relief of going back home after a day of school. Just closing yourself in your room ,ignore Twilight's cold queen attitude, play around with Spike & playing your games.

The past first week was dealing with bullies using you for a way to stroke their ego's, being ridiculed from the popular kids & dealing with your personal loneliness.

But then the second week started, and on Monday things changed for the better.

After school, you walk to your locker after dealing with your daily dose of getting picked-on. As you open it up, you hear the sounds of hoof-steps walking closer to you. You clench your teeth in anger, thinking its one of those Luna-damn jocks that force you to do their homework, not today dammit!.

As you were about to turn around to shout, your body stops as you hear the voice of a mare with a southern accent..

"H-Howdy partner.." said the orange-colored mare wearing a cowboy hat.

You stare at this mare, you remember seeing her in your fourth period class in math. You wonder what she would want with you. You close your locker after getting your books from it. "Who are you..?" you ask reluctantly.

The cowgirl mare smile & holds out her hand "I'm Applejack, please to meet ya partner!" the mare now known as Applejack says with enthusiasm. Your eyes narrow slightly, wondering what's her deal..

Applejack takes notice of the look in your eyes, she blinks and moves her hand back "What..? Ya don't do handshakes where you're from sally..?" she says with a bit of sarcasm.

The way she says her words end up pulling your stressed nerves, you slam shut your locker, not giving much of a damn if its locked or not. "Look, if you're here to give me more shit then, say it already." you tell her off, having had enough of being everypony's butt monkey.

Applejack seems taken back at your retort, she glares harshly at you as you ready up to leave "Now hold on their buckaroo, ah ain't here to mess with ya like those other jerks.." said Applejack, you can tell she's trying not to sound a bit peeved.

You scoff at that & saddle up your backpack "Sure..." you say with some sarcasm as well "What do you want then..?"

Applejack's expression changes to slight embarrassment, she gives a nervous chuckle "Well...Ah was hoping you'd..." she mutters as she lose trail of her last words.

You turn to look at Applejack with a curious look on your face "Hoping you'd what?" you ask.

"You'd want to be friends.." she says shyly.

Your look at this mare in surprise, she wants to be friends...with you? Part of you would welcome this, but what if she wants something from you and is just using you to take it? Or she's gonna do some sort of prank on you?

"No thanks.." you say bitterly.

The cowgirl seems shocked at that reply "No..? Why not?!" she retorts, sounding offended.

You ignore answering her & start walking over to the exit. You'd had enough of this BS, no-one,nopony would just go up to someone and say *Hi! wanna be friends?* especially when you're considered the freak of this school. As you reach the exit, you hear the cowgirls voice again.

"Ah guess she was wrong about ya"

"Huh..??"

You turn away from the exit, looking back at AJ standing with her arms crossed.

"Ah friend of mine said ya were a shy little fellow hiding in you're own shell, that ya needed a friend.." AJ tells you.

You feel your teeth clench at her words, she might be right...

Applejack walks over to you slowly "Look sugarcube.." sugarcube..? Did she just call you a cube made of sugar..?

"Ah know its rough, coming over from a far away place, we all have it rough on the first day of a new school, especially when ya different than the rest...but its much easier with friends." Applejack tells you, looking at your face to read your emotions.

You feel your lips twitch, trying to say something back at her, whether it's a witty remark or just a insult. You can't seem to say anything though.

Applejack's emerald eyes read you like a book, she smiles & lightly hits your shoulder.

You wince & rub the spot she hit "Ow.."

AJ giggles "Sorry sugarcube..." she says

You rub your shoulder & roll your eyes, at least it was just a light punch. You sigh, realizing being a loner won't do you any good. You need a friend more than ever. Besides...something about this mare makes you feel like you can trust her.

You pull out your hand to the cowgirl. She blinks then looks at you a bit astonish.

You give a little smile "Pleasure to meet you Applejack.." you say.

AJ's hand grips your tight & shakes yours roughly, damn she has a strong grip..

"Pleasure's mind sugarcube!" your friend AJ says with a happy tone.

You give a weak chuckle as you pull back your arm.

"Ehe...so umm..I was wondering.." said Applejack, her voice trailing off key. You tilt your head slightly, wondering what she's gonna ask. The southern cowgirl scratches the back of her head as she ask "...Ya think you could help me out with my math..?"

You roll your eyes, figures. But a smile forms on your lips "Sure, your place or mine?" you ask

AJ blinks, looking surprised. "Ahh..Ah think my place would be good, Big Mac wouldn't like if ah I left to some stranger's home...besides, I think you should meet my sister, she loves meeting new people!"

You chuckles & nod at her eagerness "Sounds good, let's go then"

"Wait a minute sugarcube, ya didn't give me ya name"

"Oh right...my name is....

============================================================================ ====================================

Your flashback gets interrupted as you face-plant against a door.


"Owww! Mother...!!!" you shout as you pull back & rub your nose, you blink as you see that you face planted on the front door of Carousel Boutique.

Wow, longest fifteen minutes of my life... you think to yourself.

All this past time you've been thinking about the past, when really you should be thinking about now. How would this effect Applejack is she finds out about you taking Rarity?

As you reach for the door knob, a cold feeling goes down your spine as you think that maybe..you don't really love Applejack..

You shake your head at that revelation.

You open the door of Rarity's shop, you call out to her "Rarity..?"

Not hearing any responses, you walk inside the store. It still as clean as you left it, you do remember Rarity was gonna rest after you left.

As you walk towards her fashion stage, you see...
14121211111112211.title: The First Day We Met

choices: Tell the girls at the party.
141212111111122111.content:
You approach Rarity's stage to see her brushing her lovely mane. You also see that she's changed her clothes, too. Rather than the white dress she was wearing just hours ago, she was now wearing a dark red sleeveless top and black skinny jeans. The darkness of her clothes made her white coat stand out more, which was probably why she chose those colors.


"Hey, Rarity." you say.


She yelps in surprise again. "Oh, [your name]!" she says. "You must stop startling me like that."


"It's not my fault," you say, jokingly. "You're just so jumpy."


"Oh, ha ha." she says with the same playful tone. "So what brings you back?"


"Well, I asked Applejack to the prom," you say. "and she said no, so I can take you."


Rarity's eyes immediately brighten up as she hears this. "Really?" she asks, making sure that she heard what she thought she had heard.


"Really." you say.


"Oh, I'm so excited!" she says, wrapping you in a tight hug. "We're gonna have so much fun together!" Rarity loosens the hug a little, then moves her face closer to yours, planting a soft kiss on you. Naturally, you were taken by surprise. When she lets go of the kiss, she does something else unexpected.


"I love you," she says.


Those three little words again. Hearing them from Applejack is one thing, but from Rarity, who's really selective with guys, is another. Why would she drop the love card unless...


Then it hits you. You remember Rarity saying that she was waiting for her Prince Charming. She must have been referring to you. You were really in a jam, now. You ponder continuing going through this, or coming clean and telling Rarity and Applejack that you like both of them.
141212111111122111.title: Those Three Words Keep Coming Back

1412121111111221112.content:
You decide to save this matter for later, because Rarity's waiting for your response to her saying she loved you. You don't want to say "I love you too," because you're not even certain of whether or not you like her more than Applejack. You're most likely get some backlash for this but you take a short breath and say:


"See you at the party." you say.


Rarity has a rather hurt look on her face, but she doesn't react harshly.


"Yeah... see you then." she says.


That was, by far, the most awkward visit to someone's house you ever made.


When you exit the Carousel Boutique, you get a phone call. You take a look at your phone and see that it was Auntie Celeste with her daily check-up call.


"Hello." you say.


"Hi, [your name]!" says your "aunt". "Just want to know how you're doing?" Before you speak, she add one more thing. "And please don't give me one of your less-than-a-sentence answers like you usually do."


Actually, you weren't gonna do that this time, because you really need some advice.


"Well, things aren't too good." you say.


"Uh-oh. Did you and Twilight have another fight?" she asks.


"Actually, I'm on good terms with her now." you say. "But I am having girl problems." You move somewhere quiet so nobody else can hear you.


"Girl problems, hmm?" she says. "Define 'girl problems'."


You take a deep breath, because this is gonna be a LONG explanation.


"Well you see, I have a crush on Applejack, and when I told her I liked her, I found out that she liked me too, but now I think I have feelings for Rarity, and both of them kissed me and said that they loved me." you explain.


"Wow, that's bad." says Auntie Celeste.

14121211111112211122.title: May I Have This Dance?

Without a single word, Applejack gets up and starts to leave, tucking her hands into the orange denim jacket she was wearing.


“Where are you going, Applejack?” asks Fluttershy.


“I need some air,” she answers, and she walks out, closing the door behind her.


There’s an awkward silence in the room that lingers for several seconds. Fnally, you speak up.


“I’m gonna go check on her.” you say.


“Wait up,” says Rarity. “I’m going, too.” You’re unsure of whether or not it’s a good idea to let her go with you, but you decide to take her along anyway. The two of you walk out the door and see Applejack walking down the empty streets in the direction of her farm.


“AJ, wait!” you call out.


She stops in her tracks, but doesn’t bother to turn around. “What?” she says coldly.


“I know why you’re mad, and-”


“Good!” she interrupts, turning around so you could see her teary eyes. “Saves me the trouble of explainin’ it to ya!” Seeing Applejack crying was a surprise to both you and Rarity, since it was an extremely rare occurrence.


“I can’t believe you!” she yells. “I tell you that I love you, an’ the next minute, yer slow dancin’ with Rarity!”


“Wait, you told [your name] that you loved him?” asks Rarity, who was starting to piece everything together in her mind.


“Stay outta this, Rarity!” AJ snaps. “This is none of yer business.”


“Applejack, if you just give me two minutes, I can explain everything.” you plead.


Before she can respond, Rarity chimes in again. “Hear him out, Applejack.” she says. “I’d like to hear his explanation as
well.”


AJ stands there and thinks for a moment. “Fine.” she says. “But two minutes and that’s all, ya hear?”


You nod your head and pull the two mares aside to a more secluded area, despite the fact that the streets were practically empty.


“Okay, now what’s your explanation?” asks the cowgirl.


“Well, it’s just that…” you say. “I like both of you, and I don’t know who I like more. When both of you told me that you loved me today, it made the decision a lot harder.”


The looks of both mares’ faces were ones of surprise.


“Applejack, I was going to ask you to the prom, hoping that you’d say yes,” you continue. “But then Rarity asked me, so I promised to take her if you said no. Part of me wanted you to say yes, and another part wanted you to say no.”


AJ and Rarity looked like they were starting to understand a little.


“I wanted to tell you guys this during the party because I don’t want to take one pony to the prom while I’m still unsure of whether I like her, or somepony else.” you say, wrapping it up. “It wouldn’t be fair to either of you.”


There’s a moment of silence.


“I… I’m sorry, [your name],” says Applejack. “I had no idea what you were goin’ through. I was bein’ selfish.”


“Applejack,” you say. “If it’s not okay with you, I don’t have to take Rarity to the prom.”


“I agree.” says Rarity. “It wouldn’t be right to go if you don’t want us to.”


She thinks for a moment and says-

You're surprised at how well this turned out. You were worried that either AJ and Rarity would be mad at each other, or that they would be mad at you. Then again, they're both reasonable ponies. "Oh. Heya, sis." she says. "I was just checkin' to see if [your name] was alright."

"I'm doing just fine, Applebloom." you say. "I just have a little headache. Thanks for checking up on me."

"No problem," she says with a tiny smile, and she closes the door.

"Well, for some reason, AB's been mighty distant and depressed lately." she says. "I know!" she says. "Why don't you try an' talk with her? She might open up to ya!"

"Well, she's letting me in." you think. "I must be getting somewhere, right?"

You open the door and see the little filly lying in her bed.

"I wanted to talk to you." you say.

"About what?" she asks, turning her head towards you.

"I was told hat you weren't feeling to good lately." you tell her deciding it would be best not to mention Applejack's name. "Want to talk about it?"

"Well… okay." she says. "Remember when you came to visit two days ago an' you and big sis wanted to talk in private?"

"Yeah…" you say nervously, having a slight idea where she's going with this.

"Well I… kinda tried to eavesdrop on you two from my bedroom window… and I saw Applejack kiss ya."

"Oh…" you say, finally understanding what was going on.

"You see, I kinda have a crush on ya, but I'm not mad atcha fer likin' someony that's more your age." she explains. "I was mad at big sis because she was the pony you liked… and she liked you back."

"So that explains why you've been so hostile towards AJ, huh?" you ask, and Applebloom nods her head. "Well, did you ever tell her that you liked me."

"No…" the filly says quietly.

"Well, then maybe you should apologize." you suggest. "It's not like she knew that you liked me."

Applebloom says nothing.

"And for the record," you say. "I'm not saying this just because I like your sister. I'm saying this because despite the fact that I don't feel the same way for you as you do for me, I still care about you and I don't want to see you like this."

The young pony's eyes well up as you say this. "You really mean that?" she asks.

"Of course." you answer.

Applebloom then hugs you tightly. "Thanks, [your name]." she says. "AJ's lucky to have you."

"No problem," you say. "And I'm sure that someday, you'll find somepony that'll be lucky to have you."

Appleblom lets go of you and walks to the door. "I'm gonna go apologize to my sister." she says before leaving. Just as she leaves, your cellphone rings. Who is it?

Auntie suddenly went quiet for some reason, but you then hear her voice "That's no problem sweetie, I love you too" said the Sun Goddesses.

You really want to jam & check this new house out, finally! A whole place for yourself! And! Your old good stuff back at your home Canterlot can finally come over here too!

"I can tell you must be giddy with delight" Auntie says slyly "Which is why *I'm* going to stay over there to see if you're responsible.."

"WHAT!?"

"WHATS WITH ALL DA YELLING!?"

You flinch from the loudness that is Granny Smith, old timer must of been napping in her room and you happen to woke her up.

"S-sorry!" you yell back.

You hold the phone close to your ears & make sure to not be so loud.

"W-What do you mean you're staying over?!"

"Like I said [*Your Name*]"

"B-but what about your job as a Princess???! and raising the sun!? You can't drop that to just see if I can take care of myself!"

"Oh, no need to worry [*Your Name*]. Luna will handle all the matters once I depart Canterlot. She'll do all the duties of raising the sun & the moon" Celestia tells you matter-of-factly.

You feel your eye twitch in irritation, why is Auntie so over-protective!? Hell, she ain't that much to Twilight and she's her faithful student!

In a last defense of your own pride, you stammer "B-but Auntie! I can take care of myself! Really, you don't have to leave Canterlot. I promise to call you instead! How bout that huh!?"

Your dear Auntie stays quiet for a minute till she responses "..I am sorry [*Your Name*], But you know your mother made me promise to protect you & keep your safe until you mature into a grown man...and I must see it myself."

You give up...

Princess Celestia is your dear Auntie, and you can never beat her out of anything..

Well, Auntie knows best..and she's been more of a mother

..since mom..

You shake your head.. "F-Fine Auntie..."

Auntie's voice in the reception sounds a bit faint "Thank you, I'll be at your new home during the evening of today..."

"That soon..?" say surprised

"Yes..is that a problem young man...?" Oh boy, she drop the young man card...she's serious..

"U-um no! of course not...See you then Auntie"

"Mmhmm, don't think of this as me babying you. I would like to see Twilight and Spike since its been quite a long time.." Auntie says solemnly.

You blink, you then finally get the reason why Auntie is really staying over. You snicker with a smile on your face "Oh I get it now, you wanted a vacation didn't you Auntie?"

"Huh..?"

"You're not coming here to just watch me, but to get away from all the royal stuff from Canterlot right?" you say feeling sure thats reason.

"..E-eh yes, yes that's the reason. I have been stuck in the castle for the past 3 months. I would enjoy a trip to Ponyville to wellow with my subjects." said Auntie, you feel her words seem a bit forced though.

Before you ask her anything else, Celestia beats you to the punch "I shouldn't keep you waiting [*Your Name*], Farewell..oh! and when I'm in Ponyville...no girls in *our* home, understand young man?"

"W-Whaaaaaat???"

"Hehe~ good bye!" *click*

You huffs, typical. You get a new place to live in, but your mother-figure wants to watch for a few days to see if your worthy.

You notice you're still in Appleblooms room, and judging by the light from the window, their is still daylight to burn.

"Should I go check on the house?" you ask yourself, you do remember seeing the house being for sell so you know what home Auntie was talking about. "Wait..does Twilight know about this?"

Crap, Twilight, if she doesn't know about this you wonder how she is gonna take it. After all, the real reason you wanted a place to crash was when she was a frosty ice queen with you..

Decision time!
141212111111122111222111221.title: Having a Aunt who is a Ruler has Benefits

1412121111111221112221112211.content:
Since the sun is shinning brightly in the sky, Auntie isn't setting the sun too soon. Besides, a few minutes checking out your new home won't take long.

You get off of Applebloom's bed & run down stairs, you spot your lovely cowpony slicing up some apples for her younger sister.

Not wanting to stop, you quickly say "Gottagoseeya!!" as you rush pass the front door & leave Sweet Apple Acres behind.

Applejack & Applebloom blink, AJ rolls her eyes "That boy is so random..." she mutters as she finishes slicing the apples. Applebloom quips "..More than Pinkie Pie?"

Applejack chuckles "Okay, Okay, not that random.."

============================================================================ ====================================

After a few minutes of running, you reach the center of Ponyville, which is the market district of Ponyville.

You get a good look at the house, it's two story's, with a nice window at the top. You wonder who would of got this place, never crossed your mind that it would be you.

You walk over to the front door, you turn the knob...*click*

The doors unlock...guess the movers forgot to lock the door. The door swings open & you take a step inside, the living room is about as big a Fluttershy's. You close the door & walk around, getting a nice feeling of your new home.

"Big and all mine.." you say aloud.

After a few minutes of checking out the kitchen & bathrooms, you walk up stairs towards your where your bedroom should be. As walk into the bedroom, your eyes widen as you see your new bedroom with..your old decorations from your Canterlot home.

Your a royal queen sized bed with the Celestia sun patterns on the sheets & blanket, drapes hang over the window, said drapes have Celestia & Luna's ying-yang like symbol.

The floor even has a huge carpet, your old dressers on each side of the bed.

You feel touched, Auntie really brought back all your stuff you left in Canterlot here. Even put it all up for your rooms belongings.

You walk over to the bed, feeling the soft, lush fabric. How you missed this comfortable bed, you quickly let yourself drop on it.

You feel your eyelids close slightly from such comfort, the bed Twilight let you have felt like it was a iron broad with feather sprinkled over it to make it feel like a bed, but this...this..*yawn* his nice....



You slept for what it felt like a few minutes, which was really over 5 hours.

Tossing and turning, you open your eyes & sit up.

"*Yawn!* ..Ahhh.." you yawn, you look around your room...and notice how dark it is. Your eyes widen, Oh crap, you feel asleep!

"Oh freaking crap!" you shout, you forgot to tell Twilight about getting this place but a sudden trip down memory lane which leaded you to the bed made you forget!

As you're about to get off the bed, you hear a familiar voice.

"How are you enjoying your new place [*Your Name*]..~?"

"Huh??"

You snap your head to look over at the entrance, there you see your Auntie, Princess Celestia...!
1412121111111221112221112211.title: Let's go see are new place

14121211111112211122211122111.content:
Your Auntie Celeste was wearing her royal dress that she usually wears when she's ruling over Equestria.


"I hope you found everything to your liking." she says.


"Everything's great, Auntie Celeste." you say. "I just forgot to tell Twilight that I was moving out, so I'll just be on my way."


"Okay, then." she says. "Just don't get sidetracked, okay? I don't want you to miss your curfew."


"Curfew!?" you say in disbelief.


"Yes, curfew." she says with a slightly stern voice. "Eleven o' clock. I don't want you staying up at all hours of the night when you have school the next day."


"Fine," you say, and you rush out the door towards Twilight's house. After you explain the situation to her and Spike, they seem surprised.


"You're really moving out?" Twilight asks. "Lucky you. And we were just starting to get along again."


"Well, I'm not that lucky..." you say. "Aun- I mean, Princess Celestia is gonna be living with me."


"Say what!?" she and Spike exclaim. "Why."


"I have no idea." you say. "And she also said that I can't have girls over, either."


"Has she forgotten that besides me, ALL your friends are girls?" Spike asks.


"So much for a housewarming party..." says Twilight.


"Well, there's nothing I can do now," you say. "I'm gonna head back to the house. Later!"


"Bye," says both the mare and the dragon.


When you finally get home, you see your aunt sitting on the couch in a bedroom robe.


"I see you've changed out of your dress." you say.


"Why, of course." she says. "I'm not gonna wear that thing all day. By the way, I'll be dressing more casually since I've relinquished my duties for the time being."


"Okay then..." you say, then a question pops into your head. "Just curious, where's your room?"


What's Celestia's answer?
14121211111112211122211122111.title: Nothing Strange Here

choices: Don't tell Twilight and maybe tell somepony else
141212111111122111222111221112.content:
"I'll be sleeping with you of course" she replies nonchalantly.

You stop and clean your ears, "could you repeat that Auntie? It sounded like you said you were going to sleep with me" you say.

"That's exactly what I said" she replies, "is there something wrong with that?"

"Auntie if there aren't enough beds I can just take the couch" you reply as you had seen another bed in the house but maybe Auntie Celeste just really liked the one she got you and this was her way of telling you that...but then why would she have all your stuff in the room.

"Absolutely not" she replies almost angrily, noticing you flinch she continues more softly "that won't be necessary."

You mentally sighed and steeled yourself, you had to ask this no matter how weird the answer you'd get. "Then why Auntie?"

"Maybe I just want to cuddle" she replies walking right up to you and giving you a soft hug. "I don't get to see enough of you due to running Equestria, everypony else gets to see you and spend time with you and I don't, that's just not fair." she says. You were thoroughly confused with her actions, You told her about the situation with you and both Applejack and Rarity, she more than anyone else would know what you were going through. You froze as one thought took over, Auntie Celeste was jealous, it was the only ting that made sense, strict curfew, no girls over, and (hasn't happened yet) sleeping in the same bed as you. Although this thought overpowered all others as the only logical one (others included alien replacement and a succubus taking her form) you obviously couldn't accept it because that would mean that Aunt Celeste had feelings for you (can you get the mares or what?)

"Dear are you alright? You've been very quiet" Aunt Celeste's voice cut you out of your trance and you found that you couldn't stare at her eye-to-eye.

"Y-yeah I'm fine, was just thinking about something" you reply, she smiled slightly and walked off, well I have to go get dinner prepared, don't go far" she says giving you a small smile before walking off into the kitchen leaving you standing there stunned for a few seconds. On top of the fact that Applejack and Rarity liked you, now you had to deal with the possibility that Auntie Celeste might like you, and you couldn't even go to anypony for advice as she was the one you went to for advice. You felt the room start to darken as your body started to sway, everything going black as you fainted.

You awoke in your bed to the sound of voices, from what you could tell it was Twilight and Aunt Celeste, "I-I don't know what happened, I just went to go make dinner and then I heard this loud sound and I rushed in to find him passed out" you slowly opened your eyes to see Aunt Celeste talking to Twilight, "don't worry Princess, my magic tells me there's nothing wrong with him he just fainted, although I can't figure out why" she says.

You try to speak but your throat was dry and all you ended up doing was coughing "he's awake aunt Celeste cried and as Twilight ran off, you assume to go and get you a glass of water, Aunt Celeste wrapped you up in a tight hug, "what happened?" she asks.

"N-Nothing, I just was so happy that you were staying with me that I fainted: you say pulling out the worst line ever, surprisingly Aunt Celeste seems to buy the line, a large smile spreading over her face, she steps back as Twilight enters carrying a glass of water and hands it to you. Aunt Celeste smiles and speaks as she stands up "well I still have dinner to make, you seem well enough and Twilight will get me if anything's wrong, dinner will be in about 30 minutes." The door to your room shutting behind her as she leaves, Twilight just sat there staring at you "so what were you thinking about so hard?" she asks.

"Pardon?" you reply

"My magic said that there was nothing wrong with you, but you were thinking about something so hard that you overloaded yourself, what were you thinking about?" she asks. This could be a blessing in disguise, although you and Twilight hadn't exactly been on the best terms for a while, she was still your friend right? Although that exact same reasoning made her the worst possible candidate, plus Twilight was kind of paranoid, for all you knew she might take your theory as you trying to get between her and Aunt Celeste.
141212111111122111222111221112.title: "I'm sleeping with you, silly!"

1412121111111221112221112211122.content:
You decide not to tell Twilight and seek advice from somepony else. Who? You'd have to figure that out later. Right now, you had to figure out how you're gonna answer the question Twilight just asked you.


"Oh, I was just thinking how I'm gonna get around this curfew that Celestia set up for me, and how I'm gonna convince her to let me have girls over," you explain.


"Was it really so important that you had to practically fry your brain thinking about it?" she asks rhetorically, completely buying your excuse. You shrug your shoulders and she sighs. "Eleven PM isn't that bad of a curfew, and I'm sure if you, me, and the others all ask Celestia, she can compromise with us."


"If you say so," you say.



"I'm gonna head home," says Twilight. "Don't stress yourself out so much, okay?"


"Easy for you to say," you think. "I won't, Twi. Don't worry." you say.


The unicorn smiles and leaves the room. Over the next several minutes, you think about who you should turn to about this whole issue with Auntie Celeste. You wanted to tell somepony who would take you seriously, so Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie are definitely not on your list of candidates. Then you think that maybe you should tell someone that's close to Auntie Celeste (other than Twilight, of course), and the only pony that comes to mind is Princess Luna.


You and Luna didn't talk much. In fact, the last time you even saw her was this past summer, when you went to Canterlot for a few weeks, and that was almost ten months ago. She was well acquainted with your parents, though, so maybe she'll be willing to help you out. The only problem is this: how are you gonna get in touch with her? You walk downstairs as you wonder how you could get in contact with Luna when, as luck would have it, you see Auntie Celeste on the phone talking with her.


"Luna, you'll do just fine on your own," she says. "It's only for a couple of months."


This was it. Now or never.


"Auntie Celeste, is that Princess Luna on the other line?" you ask, as if you didn't already know.


"Yes it is," she says. "Would you like to speak with her?"


"Yes, please," you answer.


"Alright then," she says. She turns her attention back to her sister. "Hold on, Luna. [Your name] wants to speak with you." Auntie Celeste hands you her phone and you speak into the receiver, turning around to go up the stairs.


"Hi, Princess Luna," you say.


"Hello, [your name]," she says. "We haven't spoken in a very long time. How goes everything?"


You wait until you're in your room to answer. "Pretty good, but I actually wanted to talk to you about something important," you say as you close the door.


"Really?" she asks. "About what?"


"It's about your sister," you say quietly.


"Oh..." she says after a long pause. "What is the matter?"


You sigh, "Well, I think started a while back when I told her that I liked somepony." You said "somepony" because you didn't want Luna to know that you liked two ponies. "Now, she's telling me that she's going to be living with me in this house. Not only that, but she sets a strict curfew for me, and she tells me that I can't have any girls over, knowing that most of my friends are girls. Not only that, but she even wants to sleep in the same bed as me. I think that Aut- I mean Celestia is a little... jealous."


You stand there and wait for Luna to tell you how ridiculous that sounds. Instead, she sighs.


"I had a feeling something was amiss about Celestia lately," she says.


"What should I do?" you ask.


"I think you should be up front with her and talk to her about it," she says. "While there is the possibility that she'll just dance around the issue and avoid giving you any straight answers, it's still worth a try."


"Thanks, Princess Luna," you ask.


"Just 'Luna' is fine," she says. "Let me know how it all works out, okay?"


"Okay," you say. You then hear somepony in the background speaking to Luna.


"I have to go. Tell Celestia I'll call her back, alright?" she asks.


"Sure," you say, and the line goes dead. You take this opportunity to write down Luna's number on a piece of paper so you can contact her later. You head to the door to return Auntie Celeste's phone to her. You open the door to see...
1412121111111221112221112211122.title: Nowhere Else to Turn

choices: "Why were you talking about me behind my back?"
14121211111112211122211122111222.content:
You could've sworn your heart had stopped for half a second when you open the door to see Auntie Celeste standing on the other side.


"Oh shit!" you think. "She didn't hear my phone call with Luna, did she?"


"Sorry to interrupt, [your name]," she says. "but dinner's ready."


You mentally sigh in relief. She doesn't suspect a thing. "It's fine, Auntie," you say. "I just got off the phone with Luna." You hand Auntie Celeste''s phone back and walk downstairs with her to the dinner table. You eat your dinner slowly, still pondering how to confront Celestia about her supposed "jealousy issues," not even bothering to look up at her. Your aunt notices this, but decides to make small talk rather than just asking you what's wrong.


"So, how are Applejack and Rarity?" she asks.


"They're fine," you answer.


Your aunt sighs, hoping to get a better answer than that. She then tries something else to get you to talk to her. "Look, [your name]," she says, her voice getting more serious. "There is something really important that I need to ask you."


You look up at Auntie Celeste, wondering what she wanted to ask.
14121211111112211122211122111222.title: You Gave Me a Heart Attack!

141212111111122111222111221112222.content:
'Damn it! She did hear me. Since she will dance around on my questions, might as well delay the inevitable.'

"What do you mean, Auntie?" you ask.

"Please do not give me that, (your name)," she says in a somewhat stern voice. "I heard you when you were talking to Luna. Why would you betray me like that?"

You notice that Celestia's eyes are starting to well up. It wasn't just jealousy, but it just might start to become paranoia.

You sigh, just to start dealing with this conversation. You stand up and stay there, prepared for anything that could happen.

"Look, Auntie," you start, "I have a complicated love life right now with Applejack and Rarity. The only thing I told your sister was if you were acting off lately since you seem so possessive about me. Auntie, are you jealous of them?"

Celestia seems taken back about what you have said. She starts frantically looking around to lead this into procrastination.

"(Your name), I have no idea what you're talking about," she avoided.

"That could explain the curfew and why you don't want girls in the house. I even had to lie to Twilight because of the jealousy she might have of me keeping you away from her."

Celestia stands up and tries to walk away to an unsuccessfully made attempt to escape by you grabbing her hand. Albeit she is your aunt (figure), you still treat her as royalty (duh).

"Celeste, just please, answer me."

Does she reply?
141212111111122111222111221112222.title: Confronting royalty

1412121111111221112221112211122221.content:
Celestia turns and looks at you in shock. The look on your face was practically pleading for her to give some kind of explanation.

The princess lets out a somber sigh. "Okay," she says. "Come with me."


You do as she says and follow her upstairs to your room. You both take a seat on the bed and Celestia begins to explain herself.
