Apple Bloom stands up and goes inside, her tears still flowing like calm streams. "Zecora, I was wondering, do you have any love potion of any type? If I can't have [your name], then nopony can!"

Zacora sighs before replying. "I am sorry, my dear Apple Bloom, to say that I think there is none. I may have a remedy, but I can't exactly change [your name]'s mind for the one."

"Please, Zecora! I really like him and I don't want to be without him. Are you sure there isn't any way for you to get me and [your name] together?"

Zecora had to think about it. After all, it's a filly of 13 who's in love with you of 17 years of age.
1422211212.title: And into the Everfree Forest..!?

choices: Applejack stops you, and she questions her sister about what she said.
You drink the tea, potion and all.
14222112122.content:
Zecora was at a crossroads, she knew that she shouldn't interfere with another's love life, but she couldn't stand seeing Apple Bloom so upset, either. In the end, she decided to grant the young filly's request, but she would only make the spell temporary, lasting only for the weekend.


"Okay, but just this one time." she says. 'I hope I won't regret this act of mine.' she thinks.


"Really?" asks Apple Bloom. She rushes to Zecora and hugs her tightly. "Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you!"


"I'll see if I can put something together," she says, "but be warned, it might not last forever."


Zecora knows that she has every intention of making sure that the spell won't be permanent, but she decided to at least tell Apple Bloom that it might wear off, rather than telling her that it will wear off.


Meanwhile, you and your friends progress through the Everfree Forest, wondering where to look for Apple Bloom.


"Maybe she came here to look for Zecora..." says Fluttershy.


"That would make sense," says Twilight. "I don't see any other reason why she would come here."


"Well, we'd better get a move on," says Rainbow Dash. "It's already six in the evening, and the sun is starting to set."


“Ah’ll catch up with y’all in a second,” says Applejack. “[Your name], can I talk to ya?”


“Sure,” you say, and the rest of the ponies head off in the direction towards Zecora’s hut.


“So what is it, Applejack?” you ask once the others are ore out of earshot.


“Well, ya wanted t’ say somethin’ to me, right?” she asks back, and you nod your head. “What was it?”


“Oh,” you say nervously. “Well, I was going to say that I… I sort of… like you…”


Applejack is taken aback for a moment. She blinks and says “Really?” You nod your head again. “Wow… Ah’m really flattered that you were so up front and honest with me… Ah guess that’s one of the things ah like about you…”


“You mean…” you say, starting to put two and two together. Now it was AJ’s turn to nod her head. “For how long?” you ask.


“Remember the day ah first invited you over to Sweet Apple Acres?”

“Yeah. That was the first day we met.”


“Since then.”


Wow, so Applejack started liking you before you started liking her. And here you thought that the idea of there being a connection between you two was absurd.


“Ah know we’re in a might urgent situation, but…” she pauses, “ah’d like to kiss you.”


You nervously chuckle. “Sure.”


You and AJ get closer to each other, and then you both wrap your arms around each other. Equally nervous, you both inch your faces closer and closer, until having your lips meet in the middle. Kissing Applejack felt warm, like there was a fire burning inside her, a fire that grew hotter and hotter with each passing second. You both eventually part from each other, getting back to reality. With your feelings finally out in the open, you and the cowpony rush off to catch up with your friends.


“I can see Zecora’s hut!” says Rarity.


“Oh! Here comes [your name] and Applejack!” says Pinkie Pie.


“Well, now that everyone’s here, let’s see if Zecora has seen Apple Bloom,” says Twilight. The unicorn knocks on the door, and Zecora promptly answers it.


“Oh! Well hello, my dears. I think I know just why you’re here,” says the zebra. “You must be looking for Apple Bloom. She’s inside, in my living room.”


“Oh, thank Celestia!” says the oldest Apple sister.


“She was safe here with me. Would you like to join us for tea?” she asks.


“That would be great, thanks,” says Twilight.


You and your friends enter the hut, and see Apple Bloom at the center table. Applejack rushes over to hug her little sister.


“Are you okay, little sis?” she asks.


“I’m totally fine,” says the filly. This confused AJ a little, considering how upset her little sister was when she ran off. She pushes the thought aside, though, since the fact that the little filly is safe is more important.


With everyone gathered at the table, Zecora brings out the cups of tea. She had spiked your tea with the love potion she conjured up. As planned, she only put in enough to last the weekend, figuring that would be enough to make Apple Bloom happy. After Zecora hands out the cups, Applejack turns to you.


“[Your name], ah never got to thank ya for lookin’ after my little sis for me,” she says. “Ah really appreciate it. It means a lot to me.”


“No problem,” you say.


Zecora looks at the way you and Applejack are looking at each other. Somehow, she sensed the attraction between you two, and starts to have second thoughts. Even if the spell would last only two days, it might ruin your relationship with AJ. Then again, that might not happen, either.


“Ah made this tea myself!” Apple Bloom chimes in. “Ah know you’ll all love it! Especially you, [your name].”


Surprisingly, Applejack is the only one that finds those last words a little suspicious. She eyes her sister for a second, wondering what she meant by those words.


You pick up your tea and are about to drink it when…
14222112122.title: Just This Once

choices: You started looking for Apple Bloom in the middle of the night,
You wake up the next morning, daydreaming of Apple Bloom.
142221121222.content:
Applejack thought something was funny, but Apple Bloom has always done stuff like this. Probably because you hang out with them a lot, she looks at you as a second brother. Maybe that's why you have that effect on the filly.

So nonetheless, Applajack calms down as you drank your tea. 'Not bad,' you thought, 'tastes like apples, irony, with a hint of cinnamon. And for some reason, it also tastes like green tea. I think that's just behind my tongue.'

What you didn't know is that your tea was spiked with a potion that will alter you mentally later on. Zecora sees your eyes going big, but you shake your head and snap out of it.

'I knew this was a great mistake. I just hope it's not effective for [your name]'s sake...' she thought.

'Yes! He drank it! I can't wait for him to finally come to MY arms! Thank you, Zecora! Just need to wait until it kicks in, then he'll be all over me'

"Wow, great tea, Apple Bloom," Twilight says.

"I have to agree, it's really good. You should tell me how you did it," you say.

Apple Bloom blushes as she and Zecora realize that the potion is taking quicker effect than anticipated. She just hoped that nothing else went bad.

After you said your goodbyes, you start to walk home. When you got out of the Everfree Forest, you started feeling dizzy. It took enough force for Applejack to try and walk with you, somewhat making Apple Bloom jealous.

'Enjoy him, Applejack. In a few hours, he'll be mine.'

Before you reached Twilight's house, you were feeling faint. You didn't have the energy to open the door as you fell into unconsciousness.

"[Your name]!" everypony exclaims. Luckily, you fell into the Apple sisters' arms. They carry you up to your room and cover you. Seeing that you have a slight fever as well, Twilight places a cool towel on your forehead.

"Anypony have any idea how [your name] fainted like that?" Apple Bloom asks, seemingly worried.

"I'm not sure," Twilight asks. "But maybe we'll see tomorrow. I have a feeling he isn't waking up anytime soon..."

They all take their leave, Apple Bloom last. But something unexpected happened later.
142221121222.title: Nothing funny here, yet

choices: ... you managed to regain your sense but not in its entirety.
... a sudden burst of strength overruled Twilight as you lost your state of mind
1422211212221.content:
You were tossing and turning that night, unable to sleep. It just passde 3 AM and you suddenly wake up, with a sort of want-- no... need to be with a certain somepony. Matter of fact, you were even struggling to get up and walk, The first thing that happens is that you crash down, for some reason, not feeling any pain at all.

It woke Twilight up and tried to see where it was. When the library was clean, she looked into your room, surprised at your sight.

"Dear Celestia, [your name], what happened!?" she exclaims, but to no avail. You were literally deaf and blind to the world around you. The only pony that ever made any sense to you, ever made any understanding...

Apple Bloom...

She was the filly your heart desired. Even though the spell was only supossed to be temporary, the spell was unfortunately strong. You tried to make your way to the door to look for Apple Bloom, but you were stopped.

As Twilight lifted you via magic to your bed, you struggled to get up.

"Sheesh, what was in that tea?" Twilight says under her breath. But while you were struggling...
1422211212221.title: It was a different type of spell...

choices: She follows the two of you.
She tries to figure out why you're acting so strange.
1422211212222.content:
You wake up early, as you usually do. As you get out of the bed, you think about the events that transpired last night. You remember going to search for Apple Bloom, the Applejack wanted to talk to you about something, then you found Apple Bloom in Zecora's hut and you drank some tea that she made.


"I guess the tea made me sleepy," you say to yourself. "Oh, well."


After you take a shower, eat breakfast, and get dressed, you get a call from Applejack.


"I wonder why AJ would call me this early?" you say, the memory of you two admitting your feelings to each other completely clouded. All that you could think about was her little sister.


"Hello?" you answer.


"Hey, sugarcube!" says Applejack. "Ah was wonderin' if ya wanted to come on down to Sweet Apple Acres today."


You wonder why the cowpony on the other line sounds so happy. Something must have happened to her that's making her be this way. Then again, why do you care? Going to Sweet Apple Acres means seeing Apple Bloom, the filly of your dreams!


"Sure," you say. "I'll be right there."


After telling Twilight where you're going, you rush over to the Apple family house, where Applejack (and more importantly, Apple Bloom,) was waiting. When you knock on the door, you hear hoofsteps rushing to answer it. The door swings open, and Applejack smiles when she sees that it's you.


"[Your name]!" she says, hugging you and kissing your cheek. "You're here!" When AJ kissed you, it caused your head to hurt for just a second, and you vaguely remember the last time you kissed somepony, but the memory quickly fades away.


"AJ, what are you doing?" you ask.


"What do ya mean?" she asks. "All I did was kiss ya."


"That is what I mean," you say. "Why did you kiss me."


"Do you even remember what we were talkin' about last night?" she asks. "You know, when we were admittin' our feelings for each other?"


You feel the pain in your head again. This time, the memory of you and Applejack confessing your feelings for each other comes back, but t was very vague, and it leaves your mind. You then eye the mare with a look of confusion. What in the hell was she talking about? Was she delusional? She must be a little trippy. Looks like you're not the only one that was affected by the tea last night.


"I don't remember that at all," you say. "Is your sister home?"


"Well, yeah. She's upstairs, but-"


With that information, you immediately go inside the house and walk up the stairs to see your sweetheart. "Apple Bloom!" you call out.


"[Your name]?" she answers in disbelief. "Yes! The potion worked! He's all mine now!"


The filly rushes towards you and wraps you in a tight hug, which you happily return. "How've you been, sweetie?"


"Just fine," she says, "but Ah'm much better now that you're here."


"Well, would you like to take a walk around town with me today?"


"Ah'd love to!"


"Ahem. 'Scuse me?" says Applejack, who was watching most of this scene unfold before her very eyes. "Ah'd hate to bother you two, but can Ah borrow my little sis for a sec?"


"Ah'll be right back, handsome!" she says, and she follows her big sister into her bedroom.


Once the Apple Sisters were in the older one's room, AJ keeps her voice down so you can't hear.


"Okay, this is way too weird," she whispers. "Somethin's up, Apple Bloom, and Ah wanna know what!"


"Nothin's up, big sis," whispers the younger sibling. "[Your name]'s just came to his senses. It's not my fault he likes me."


"But last night Ah told him that Ah liked him, and he said that he felt the same way 'bout me!"


"He obviously wasn't in his right mind. He was probably trying to make ya feel better. That's just how nice he is."


"Apple Bloom, what did you do?!"


"I told ya, nothin'!"


"Apple Bloom, you did do somethin' to [your name], and Ah swear to Celestia Ah'm gonna find out what it is, and when I do, Ah'll... Ah don't know what Ah'll do, but yer gonna get in so much trouble!"


"Ah know being rejected is hard, big sis, but grow up. Ah'm the one [your name] wants, so get over it."


With that, the filly exits the room, leaving her older sister fuming mad.


"Ah'm ready to go, darlin'!" she says happily.


"Alright then," you say. "Let's go."


You and Apple Bloom leave to go out on your date, but what does Applejack do?
1422211212222.title: The New Love of Your Life

choices: Have an accomplice help her out.
14222112122221.content:
As you were walking down the trail of Sweet Apple Acres, Applejack gets the idea to sneak around to see what is going on. She didn't like the idea of you taking Apple Bloom out and especially since you just admitted each others feelings just yesterday, and had your first kisses.

Eventually, the cowpony takes on the decision to spy on you. Going downstairs, Applejack sees that you're just leaving the farm house.

"Ya think [your name] would be faster than that," Applejack whispers to herself. Keeping a reasonable distance, she sees now that you're holding Apple Bloom by her arm. Trying to set her emotions aside, the older sister keeps following you until you reach town. Seeing how that it's a bit overpopulated, this put Applejack at a crossroad.

''Kay, now what? Ah can't be walking like this; otherwise Ah might attract attention. Should Ah keep goin', or should I get somepony to help me out? Hmm...'

What does Applejack do?
14222112122221.title: A second Twilight, only Applejack spies you

choices: Apple Bloom sees the Crusaders, and AJ is able to get you alone.
142221121222211.content:
Applejack gulps and decides to risk being discovered. What was she supposed to tell the others. Was she supposed to tell them that you're under some sort of spell that she can't explain and that Apple Bloom has something to do with it? They'd never believe her! This is something she has to do on her own.


"Okay, mah mind is made up," she says to herself. "Ah'll have t' follow those two without attractin' attention to myself."


AJ tries her best to blend in with the crowd, and she makes sure that she doesn't lose sight of you and her little sister. Thankfully, you and Apple Bloom had all your attention focused on each other, so you don't even notice AJ following you. You both eventually stop in the park and sit on a bench under a tree. AJ hides in some nearby bushes and keeps watch.


"It's a really beautiful day, ain't it, [your name]?" asks Apple Bloom.


"A beautiful day with a beautiful filly," you say.


The younger Apple sister blushes while the older one's blood boils. What Apple Bloom says next only makes it worse "This is a lot better than hanging out with Applejack, huh?" AJ had to hold herself back after hearing that. "Simmer down, AJ," she thinks to herself. "Ya need to stay real inconspicuous-like if ya wanna find out what's goin' on."


"Applejack...?" you say, the pain in you head coming back again. All the times you and AJ hung out together flack through your mind in a matter of seconds, you suddenly remember how much you liked her, but the spell regains control on your mind again. "Uh... yeah. This is a lot better!" you say.


The cowpony almost sheds a tear when she hears you say that. "That settles it. This definitely ain't the [your name] Ah know. Ah know for a fact that he love spendin' time with me. He'd never say somethin' like dat," she thinks, then she realizes something. "Hold on. When [your name] said mah name... he seemed to remember somethin'. Whatever is controllin' his mind, it's not that strong. Maybe Ah can try and break the spell if Ah remind [your name] of how much we love each other!"


With this new goal in mind, AJ continues to watch over you and Apple Bloom. After you and the filly leave the park (with Applejack following close behind), what happens.
142221121222211.title: Incognito

choices: Your subconscious won and you finally remembered everything.
The spell was too dominant for your mind. Only one thing left to do...
1422211212222111.content:
As you walk down back to town, you and Apple Bloom suddenly spot Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo.

"Hey, ya two!" Apple Bloom greets.

"Apple Bloom! How's it going?" Sweetie Belle asks.

"Really great, especially with [your name] here." All you could do was blush and scratch the back of your head.

"Ah'd like to tell ya 'bout it, but..."

"It's okay, Apple Bloom," you say, "go ahead. We can meet at the Sugarcube Corner later."

"Thank ya, [your name]!" Apple Bloom hugs you and you hug back, not wanting to let go. Once she lets you go and walks with the Crusaders, you feel a hand covering your mouth and dragging you into the bushes and into a path on the other side.

Struggling, you tried to pry the hands of your face but that all changed when you heard your attacker's voice.

"Settle down, [your name]!" she whispers. You turn around and see her slightly annoyed but more desperate looking face.

"(Muffled) Applejack!?"

She lets go and helps you stand up. "What's the deal with scaring me like that!?" you nearly exclaim.

"Not so loud, please! Ah have somethin' to tell ya, [your name], somethin' that Ah really need ya to hear."

Listening to Applejack is making your head hurt, in the way memories come back. You listen to what she has to say.

"What is it, Applejack?" you say, head tilted.

'Ah just hope that this can help. Ah need to get 'im back!' "Look, [your name], ya, have t' remember! Yesterday when we were lookin' for Apple Bloom, ya told me you liked me and I admitted the feelin's back over at the Everfree Forest." Your head starts to hurt more as the memories are struggling to come back. "Remember? You used to hang out a lot and said that you loveed bein' with me. We even hung out once as a date of sorts! Somethin' made you forget all that and is making you think that Apple Bloom is the one you loved!" With her voice breaking, Applejack starts shedding tears while your mind was trying to win a battle. "Ah can't stress this out enough! Please, [your name], remember!"

You get down on your knees, holding your head in pain. Groaning a bit, the cowpony steps back a bit. It was either the filly or the mare in your mind. After you seemingly calm down, Applejack starts again.

"[Your name]?"

Your mind is yours. What happened?
1422211212222111.title: A chance to remember yourself

choices: Convince AJ to let you handle this.
14222112122221112.content:
The love spell that was controlling your mind felt like a pair of large hands covering your eyes from reality, only allowing you to see what the caster wanted you to see. When Applejack reminded you of all the good times you had together, the memories started to pry the spell open and break it, but the spell proved to be too strong, and it's hold on you was restored.


You get up on your feet, your massive headache subsiding, and you look at Applejack. "I'm sorry, AJ," you say, "but I don't remember anything."


The mare looks at you in shock and sheds a tear, then several more follow after that. You turn around to meet Apple Bloom at Sugarcube Corner, but then Applejack grabs your arm, preventing you from going anywhere.


"What are you doing!" you say.


"Whatever it is that's messin' up yer mind, Ah'm gonna stop it!" she says. "What do Ah do? Ah reminded him of everything we've been through, and it didn't work. Ah thought Ah was so close, but it didn't work. Only one thing left to do."


With her mind made up, Applejack forcefully pulls you close to her, and she gives you the most passionate kiss she can give you. You pupils shrink to a microscopic size, and you feel the spell starting to crack. The crack continues to grow and grow, until the spell's hold on you shatters into pieces. With your mind back in the right place, you wrap your arms around Applejack, embracing the mare you were meant to be with. She flinches a little when she feels your arms around her, but she relaxes and cracks a smile when she realizes that her last ditch effort to restore your memory worked.


When the mare releases you from the kiss, you look into her eyes lovingly. “Thanks, Applejack,” you say.


“Oh, [your name]!” she says, tightening the hug she has you wrapped in. “Ah thought that Ah lost ya for good!”


“Well, it’s only because you were willing to go so far for me,” you tell her.


“Applejack! What are you doin!?” cries a voice nearby. You and AJ turn around to see Apple Bloom with an angry look on her face. Sweetie Bell and Scootaloo are right behind her, wondering what’s going on.


“Quit tryin’ t’ take [your name] from me!” the young filly says. “He likes me, not you!”


“Not anymore, he doesn’t,” says the older sibling. “Whatever you did to mess up his mind, I fixed it.”


“What!?” Apple Bloom says. “Then Zecora must have made the spell breakable on purpose!” she then covers her own mouth, realizing that she just gave herself away.


“Zecora? Spell!?” says Applejack. “That’s is, missy! You and Ah are gonna have a talk right now!”


What do you do?
14222112122221112.title: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures

choices: "Would you like a good-bye kiss before I go?"
"I'm sorry, Apple Bloom, but maybe you should find another colt for you."
142221121222211122.content:
You put your hand on Applejack's shoulder. "Applejack, maybe I should talk to her, but I think we should take this back to Sweet Apple Acres. It's a little too conspicuous here."

Somehow, Applejack calms down. "Fine."

Once back at the farm, you were able to have Applejack stay inside the house while you talked to Apple Bloom outside. Her scared and saddened look didn't change your opinion, because it was understandable why she did this.

"Apple Bloom, relax," you say in a calm manner, catching the filly off-guard. "I'm not mad or anything."

"(Gasp) Ya aren't?"

"No. I understand why you went through all the trouble, with the potion and everything. Besides, I knew you had a crush on me when we fell that time."

Apple Bloom blushes. "Ah really did want to kiss ya. Now that Applejack broke the spell, Ah guess Ah'm too late..."

You were hit with guilt when she said that, especially now that she's crying. You pull her in for a hug, her grip nearly choking you.

You feel obliged to say something, but what?
142221121222211122.title: After all, you (sorta) understand why she did this

choices: Twilight, Rainbow, Rarity, Pinkie, and Fluttershy
1422211212222111221.content:
You felt really sorry for Apple Bloom. You never meant to break her heart, but it couldn't be helped. Even if you didn't like her sister, a relationship between the two of you wouldn't work out. If it were ten years later, a four year age gap wouldn't be that big of a deal, but it wouldn't be good for the young filly to wait ten years for you instead of living those next ten years to the fullest. You decide to throw Apple Boom a bone and give her some sort of consolation.


"Apple Bloom," you say.


"Yes, [your name]?" she says.


"Would you like a good-bye kiss before I go?"


The filly looks at you in disbelief. "Ya mean it?"


"Sure. I feel kinda bad that you're so heartbroken, so think of this as my way to make you feel better. It can't be too long, though, because Applejack might get suspicious."


"Seven seconds?"


"Three."


"Five?"


You think on it for a moment. Five seconds wouldn't hurt. "Okay. Five seconds."


You had to get on one knee since Apple Bloom is more than a head shorter than you. The young filly can't help but smile at the fact that you two are about to kiss. You both slowly lean in towards each other, and your lips finally meet. Apple Bloom's lips had the same taste as her older sister's, but the whole experience was different. It felt as though the filly you were kissing felt unsure, yet almost as passionate as her big sister.


One... Two... Three... Four... Five.


True to your word, you break the kiss after five seconds. "Thanks, [your name]," she says.


"No problem, AB," you say. "And don't worry, you'll find a colt your age that you'll like,"


Apple Bloom smiles at you, and you smile back before you go back into the house. When you get to the living room, you see Applejack sitting on the couch, waiting for you to return.


"So," she says, "how'd it go? It was pretty quiet like."


"She took it pretty well," you say. "I guess hearing it from me worked a lot better than hearing it from somepony else."


"Well that's good," she says.


"So, I guess we're officially together now..."


"Ah guess we are."


"I wonder how our friends are gonna take it?"


"Why don't we tell 'em on Monday when we get to school?" she suggests.


"Sounds good to me," you say.


Applejack gives you a quick kiss on the cheek before you leave, and you have an idiotic smile on your face for the rest of the day. Two days later, when you and AJ get to school, you both stand outside the main entrance, about to make your relationship public. You both look at each other and nod your heads. You then hold each other's hands and walk into the school halls. You immediately attract looks from the other ponies in school. The looks on their faces ranged from either "I knew it," to "Them? Together? Who knew?" Thankfully, there weren't any looks of disgust. As you both walk down the hallway to your lockers, some ponies approach you.


Who are they?

14313.content:
You desperately think of a way to… deflate, so to speak, and then an idea pops up into your head. You quickly whip out your phone and dial Twilight’s number.


“Hello?” the mare says as she answers her phone.


“Hey, Twilight,” you say. “I was just checking in on you and Fluttershy to make sure everything’s okay. I’m sorry I couldn’t help you guys out.”


“Oh, it’s fine, [your name],” she says. “We were able to handle ourselves with the animals after all, so no harm done.”


As Twilight speaks, you feel your lower half get more relaxed. Since you thought of her as a sister, talking to her doesn’t rile you up as opposed to talking to Applejack.


“Okay then,” you say. “I’ll see you when I get home. Later.”


“Bye!” she says before she hangs up.


You look up to see Applebloom coming down the stairs. “Ah thought ah heard yer voice, [your name]!” she says excitedly. “What brings ya here?”


“Well, since Big Mac is away, your sister asked me to look after you while she does his chores.”


“That’s great!” the little filly says. “Ah’ve been wantin’ to ask ya if you could give me and the Crusaders some drawin’ lessons to see if it’s our special talent.”


“The Crusaders are here?” you ask.


“Of course! We have meetings every Friday after school,” she says.


“Alright then,” you say. “I guess I can help you guys out.”


Later that day, Applejack finally finishes up her chores, and you were finally finished teaching the Crusaders. Their drawings were pretty good, but you doubt that’s their special talent. You head downstairs to get a drink of water when AJ walks in.


“Ah hope mah sister an’ her friends didn’t give ya too much trouble, sugarcube,” she says.


“Are you kidding?” you say. “It was no trouble at all.”


The cowpony chuckles. “Well, thanks nonetheless,” she says before kissing you on the cheek. Just then, something comes to mind: you have nothing planned for tomorrow, so you can ask AJ out. What do you do?
14313.title: It Never Fails

choices: "I'm sorry, sweetie, but I'll have to say no."
"I'll pay, but only half. You'll have to pay for the other half yourself."
"Okay. Maybe I'll even get you a ticket, too, so you can spend some alone time."
144.content:
"Umm... Your birthday is coming up soon, right?" you ask.


"Yeah..." she says. "That was a little out-of-the-blue, sugarcube."


"I know, I know. It was just a random thought," you say. "I was just wondering if you had anything planned for that day."


"Not really. Ah'm probably just gonna stay home with the family."


"But it's your eighteenth birthday, AJ. Don't you want to do something special?"


"Nah. Ah'm fine with keepin' it low-key. Ah don't want a big ol' party just fer turnin' eighteen."


"Better hope Pinkie Pie doesn't have anything planned."


Applejack chuckles. "Knowin' her, she probably already does."


"Is that [your name] down there?" asks a young filly from upstairs.


"Yup! He's gonna be watchin' ya while Ah go an' buck some apples!" AJ calls out. Just then, Apple Bloom comes down to greet you. "Heya, [your name]!" she says.


"Hey, Apple Bloom," you say. "How's it going?"


"Ah'm doin' good," she says. "Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo will be here soon, then you can see our new plan fer gettin' our cutie marks!" You look up at Applejack and you both roll your eyes. One day they'll learn. Personally, you never understood why it was so important to get a mark on your but that nopony was going to see, unless you were a filly in a bathing suit or and exhibitionist. AJ leaves you and her sister alone, and the two of you begin to shoot the breeze, eventually coming to the topic of Applejack's birthday.


"You know my sis'll be turnin' eighteen in two weeks, right?" she asks.


"Yeah. When I asked her if she wanted to do anything, she didn't really have anything planned," you answer. "I'm sure there must be something she'd want to do for her special day."


"Oh there is," says the filly. "She doesn't want to be a bother t' anypony."


"That's ridiculous. Your eighteenth birthday is one of those days where you're entitled to be a bother," you say.


"Well, AJ's been wantin' t' go to Vanhoover for a vacation, but money's been mighty tight lately an' she couldn't put any bits aside fer the train ride."


"How many bits are we talking here?" you ask.


"Five hundred," she says.


"Damn, that is a lot," you lament. You try to think of a way to help AJ out, and you finally figure something out. "Excuse me for a second. I have to go to the bathroom." Once you reach the bathroom, you pull out your phone an dial a certain number.


Ring.... Ring... Ring...


Finally, somepony picks up the phone. "Hello?" the pony says.


"Hey, Auntie Celeste," you say. "I was wondering if you could do me a favor."


"What is it sweetheart?" she asks.


You take a deep breath and give it to her straight. "I'm gonna need five hundred bits in two weeks."


You were not expecting the response you got.


"Oh no. I was hoping this wouldn't happen. I know you're worried, sweetie, but have you and the young mare considered putting the foal up for adoption? I know abortion seems like the only way out, but-"


"Celeste, what are you talking about?" you say, flustered. "I didn't get anypony pregnant! It's for Applejack's birthday!"


You hear a gasp of relief. "Oh, thank goodness! My word, [your name], you scared me half to death! I was not ready to become a grandmother!"


"You're thousands of years old, and you're not my mother." you bluntly remind her. "Anyway, I want to get AJ a ticket to Vanhoover for her eighteenth birthday."


"I don't know, [your name]," she says.


"Oh come on, Auntie!" you plea. "When have I ever asked you for money before?"


"Give me a moment. Let me fetch my list. My incredibly long list."


"Fine, but this is different. This is for one of my best friends. I don't want her to stay cooped up in her house on her eighteenth birthday."


What does your aunt say?

14422.content:
"Help you study the human body, huh," you say, pondering Lyra's proposition.


"Yeah," the unicorn replies. "I've always been interested in learning about humans, and while I've read a lot of books on human anatomy, I think it'd be great to do a hands-on study."


Her intentions seem genuine enough, but you can't help but ask, "What's the catch?"


"No catch at all. In fact I'm willing to make things as comfortable as possible for you. If you ever feel uncomfortable, just say the word."


"... Alright, I'll do it, if you pay me when I show up to... where are we doing this exactly?"


"At my place. It's across the street form the Carousel Boutique. And don't worry, I'll pay you every bit once you show up. How does tomorrow at noon sound."


You think on it for a moment. You don't have anything to do tomorrow, as far as you know. "That sounds good," you say.


Lyra's face brightens up. "Great!" she exclaims before pulling out a piece of paper. "Here's my number," she says as she scribbles the digits down with her magic before handing the paper to you. "Text me so I have yours, kay?"


"Sure," you say with a smile before continuing to walk home. "See you tomorrow, Lyra."


"Bye!" she says as she waves to you.


You make your way back home and see that Twilight's already returned from Fluttershy's place. "Hey, Twi," you say. "Sorry I couldn't help you and Fluttershy. I was helping AJ with something."


"No harm done," she replies. "Fluttershy and I were able to manage. Since you mentioned Applejack, though, you know her birthday is coming up, right?"


"Of course."


"You plan on getting her anything?"


"Yeah, but I'm keeping it a secret." You didn't want Twilight to know that you were getting AJ a ticket to Vanhoover. Being the inquisitive mare she is, she'd then ask you how you planned to pay for it. Sure, you could lie and say that Celestia would be paying for everything rather than half, but that could lead to a phone call to Celestia, which will lead to her getting mad at you for lying, and she'll decide not to pay for the ticket at all.


Yeah, you don't take risks with Twilight.


Instead, you attempt to change the subject. "You know, I talked to Applejack, and she said that she didn't want to do anything special for her eighteenth birthday."


"What!?" Twilight says. "Why not? An eighteenth birthday is supposed to be special! I read it in a book about important milestones in a young pony's life. Remember Rarity's eighteenth birthday party last month?"


"Oh yeah, that was a blast. Hell, even Fluttershy had a decent get-together for her birthday the month before."


"Well, maybe we can convince her to do something for the occasion..."


"Hopefully. We have two weeks, though, so I wouldn't worry about it too much. Who knows? She might have a change of heart."


"I sure hope so."


With that, you go up to your room and get ready for bed. Looking after the Crusaders took a lot out of you. You can't figure out how AJ can handle them.


The next morning you woke up at around eleven in the morning, so you go downstairs for breakfast, scrambled eggs and pancakes, to be exact, and wolf it down quickly, you then rush upstairs to brush your teeth take a quick shower before getting dressed. By the time you're all ready yo leave, it was quarter to twelve. You figure that you should leave now so you could get to Lyra's on time. Thankfully, Twilight is in her room reading a book, so you're able to avoid the awkward "Where are you going?" moment.


At three minutes to noon, you reach Lyra's house. You knock on the door and the unicorn promptly answers. "[Your name]! You made it! Come in!" she says happily. You both go to Lyra's living room, where you both take a seat. What does Lyra do first.

144221.content:
"Well, I'd like to start by just asking you a few questions. Is that alright?" Lyra asks.


"By all means, fire away," you say.


"Alright. Well, the first thing I'd like to know is why humans don't have cutie marks," she says, "and how you figure out what your special talent is without it."


"Well, I'm not sure why we humans don't have cutie marks," you answer. "My best guess is that it's because we aren't magical creatures like ponies. In reference to your other question, it is really hard to figure out what your purpose in life is without something telling you what it is. Some humans pursue what their passionate about, while others pursue what will make them the most money, and while all ponies are talented at something, some humans just don't have a certain talent or niche to fill."


"Wow, interesting. Well, the next question I want to ask is why are humans so fascinated with the advancement of technology?"


"Humans are curious creatures by nature. Since the beginning, we always wanted to know two things: how the world works, and how we can make it better."


"I guess ponies have humans to thank for how far we've come."


"Well, it wasn't all us," you saw with a chuckle.


"So... there's one more question I want to ask you before we move on..." Lyra says.


"What is it?" you ask.

And as you knew, she would start chattering it up, apologizing for her mistake.

"Oh, my goodness!" Fluttershy exclaims, in that high whisper. "(Your name), I'm really sorry for bumping into you like that! I didn't know you were behind me! I was just--"

"Fluttershy, Fluttershy!" you interrupt. "It's okay. I know it was just an accident. I wasn't looking either, so I'm at blame as well."

You scratch your head, blushing because of bumping into Fluttershy, and the fact that she was the most beautiful dress you ever saw, the way it's white frame balanced out her golden coat was so enchanting, that you find yourself blushing even more than usual, especially since you're gonna try to ask her out to homecoming.

"Are you okay, (your name)?" Fluttershy asks. Her head is tilted slightly with a confused look.

"N-No, I-I-I'm fine, Fluttershy. Heh heh eh..." Another flaw is that you sometimes stutter around her. You try to think about what you say, but with the pegasus of your dreams standing right there is severely complicating the situation. "So, uh, you needed help with the animals here?"

"Oh, right! Yes, you see, there were more than what I expected. Could you please... help me?" She grabs your hands, something totally unexpected and was making you sweat very badly. It doesn't give any help either that her cute smile is there.

"S-Sure, I'd love t-to help!" Luckily, she doesn't notice anything yet, so you took this as not messing up. "Uh, where is Twilight?"

"She left just before I bumped into you."

After about half an hour finishing rounding up the rabbits, squirrels, birds and all the other woodland creatures, you sit down at a nearby tree. Fluttershy does the same, only she sits next to your right hand side.

"Thanks for helping me, (your name)," she states. "I'm really grateful for it."

"N-No problem," was all you could manage to say. You both sit there in awkward silence. You keep telling yourself to tell her now, but it's just so difficult.

"Hey, Fluttershy?" you start.

"Yes, (your name)?" she replies, looking at you. Now what?

"I, uh, w-would you..."
15.title: Twilight and Fluttershy

choices: She says "Let me think about it."
151.content:
Suddenly, Fluttershy starts blushing very heavily, which is not that big of a surprise.

After at least a minute passes, you start responding by saying, "Fluttershy?"

Finally, she speaks and...
151.title: "... ...go to homecoming, with me?"

choices: You call Fluttershy and ask her to homecomimg.
You run to her house and ask her in person.
152.content:
In your mind, you run through a bunch of different ways to ask Fluttershy to homecoming, but nothing good came up.


"Is there something you want to tell me, [your name]?" she asks.


Finally, you give up. "Never mind, it's nothing," you say, as you mentally kick yourself for being so indecisive.


"Oh, okay..." says Fluttershy, sounding a little disappointed. The awkward silence between you two returned, until your phone rings all of a sudden. Fluttershy jumps a little in surprise.


"Hello," you say as you answer the phone.


"Hey, [your name]," says Twilight on the other line. "Dinner's almost ready. Are you done helping out Fluttershy?"


"Yeah, I'm all done here," you say. "I'll be on my way." You then turn to the pegasus next to you. "I've gotta go, Fluttershy," you say to her. "I'll see you around."


"Okay, bye," she says. "Say hi to Spike for me."


As you walk home, you continue to think about how you blew it with Fluttershy. You need to get your shit together. Homecoming is a week from now, and you still haven't asked Fluttershy yet. You weren't really worried about her going with another guy, since you're the only guy her age that she's close to, but you don't want her to be stuck at home with nothing to do on homecoming night when you could've asked her to go with you. You look up, and you see that you were so deep in thought that you reached home without you noticing.


As you eat dinner, Twilight looks at you with a question mark over her head. "Is something the matter, [your name]?" she asks.


"No, it's nothing," you say.


"Are Dumbbell and Hoops picking on you again?" she asks in a tone that reminds you of Auntie Celeste whenever she asked that same question.


"No, I'm just thinking," you say.


Twilight drops the subject and you continue eating. After dinner, you look at the clock. It was six-thirty in the evening, and you think about Fluttershy again. You then come to a realization: the worst thing she can do is say no, so you have nothing to lose. A surge of confidence flows through you, and you decide to go through with asking Fluttershy to homecoming.


How do you go about this?
152.title: Smooth. Real Smooth.

choices: She says yes in some way
She sadly declines your offer for another reason
You hear, "Can you come over first?"
1521.content:
It was decided. You will call Fluttershy once you get outside. If there was one thing you knew about Twilight, she always gets all that big sisterly type with the teasing and helping out, albeit she is a few months younger than you.

Once you reach a safe place, and luckily Twilight was studying a new book she obtained, you thought it was now safe to call the pegasus that you intend to take for homecoming.

After you dial her number, time felt as of it stopped all around you. You were about to ask out Fluttershy.

The other side picks up with the voice you were waiting to hear. "Hello?"

"Hey, Fluttershy," you replied. "How are you?"

"I'm fine. And thanks again for helping me out with the animals."

"No prob. Uh, can I ask you something?"

"Sure, (your name) what is it?"

"I, um, would you..." 'Imbecile, just friggin say it already!' "Fluttershy would you be my date for homecoming next week?"

You hear a slight gasp when you said that. You fail to realize that you were sweating badly and blushing. Luckily no one was around.

"Um, (your name)?" Fluttershy replies.

"Yes, Fluttershy?"
1521.title: You call Fluttershy and ask her to homecomimg.

choices: Telling you yes in a most heartfelt way
Flying towards you with total elation
15211.content: How does she accept your favor?
15211.title: She says yes in some way

152112.content:
"Look out," was her response. You didn't know what she meant my that, but you had a feeling you might soon. Once the line had dropped, you felt a slight breeze, which you know isn't by Rainbow Dash since she's working with weather elsewhere, and you look around. So many furlongs high at the why you see a faint vague figure.

It's too small for you to see who it is, but who else can it be but a pegasus. It falls, going towards you!?

You try to move, but curiosity killed the cat. Yours was still wondering who it was. It was time enough when you realize its... Fluttershy?

Now you're really surprised! She's scared of even her own shadow! But flying at speeds comparable to Rainbow scares the hell out of you! But you couldn't help but see a huge smile and... tearing eyes?

You step back, but it proved futile, as she lands on top of you, with no hesitation, and you ate forcefully pushed all the way to Twilight's house and make a big hole where the door should be. Luckily, she or Spike didn't get hurt.

Fluttershy then surprisingly kisses you right there, not caring that she caused a scene right there. Actually, everyone thought it was cute and adorable.

"Oh, (your name), yes. Yes! I would love to go to homecoming with you! I've waited so long for you to ask me, and I can't say no! I will go with you!"

You were surprised that even Fluttershy would retort like this. Hell, you were even expecting for her to say no. But all this was worth it, not even caring that you were in pain (you hear your ribs crack and fingers break).

Once the pegasus gets off of you and helps you up, she couldn't help but kiss you again, this time you kissing back. By the time Fluttershy came to her senses, she pulled back and looked sideways, blushing heavily.

"I'm sorry, (your name)," she says. "I guess I got carried away."

"It's okay, Fluttershy," you reply. "At least you said yes." You both smile at each other, sort of awkwardly, luckily the other ponies walked away, and she says goodbye and leaves. You don't know how or why, but you bow know the rest of the week will go by greatly.
152112.title: Flying towards you with total elation

1521121.content:
The next day, a Saturday, you and Twilight walk to the park to meet up with your friends. Your unicorn friend couldn't stop talking about how Fluttershy tackled you last night as she accepted your invitation to the prom.


"I think it's so sweet that you and Fluttershy are going to homecoming together!" she says with excitement.


"I know," you say. "You said it fifteen times in the last hour."


"Sorry, [your name]," she says. "But I always thought that you and Fluttershy would be a perfect couple."


Your heart skips a beat when you hear Twilight say those words. Did she really believe that you and Fluttershy were the perfect couple. To be totally honest, you thought that Fluttershy had no romantic interest in you at all. Then again, she never really opens up when it comes to romantic feelings.


The two of you finally get to the park and are greeted by Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, and Applejack.


"Hey there, Romeo," says Rainbow.


"What are you talking about?" you say.


"Twilight told us all about how you asked Fluttershy to homecoming!" exclaims Pinkie Pie.


"She did, did she?" you say, looking at Twilight with a resentful glare.


"Now, now, there's no need to be embarrassed, [your name]," Rarity chimes in. "Why, I think it's rather sweet."


"'Oh, [your name], I'd love to go to homecoming with you!'" says Rainbow Dash, imitating Fluttershy. "'I've been waiting so long for you to ask me!'"


You blush a little at her teasing.


"Now, stop it, Rainbow!" says Applejack. "Or are ya just jealous that he has a date to homecoming and you don't?"


"Last time I checked, NONE of you have dates besides [your name]." Rainbow argues.


"Correction," says Rarity. "One of the stallions form the baseball team asked me to the dance two days ago,"


"And I'm going with this really handsome pony form the chess club," says Twilight.


"Whatever," Rainbow Dash says in a huff.


"Hi, guys!" says a pony from far away, you turn to see that it's Fluttershy, and she's...
1521121.title: The Perfect Couple?

15211211.content:
No, it was just average Fluttershy, in her usual attire of white, green, or gold, which today was a lucky light gold plain dress somewhat similar to Twilight's. Wait, isn't that it? Eh, you can care less.

"Why, hello, Fluttershy," Rarity greets.

"Hey, girls," she replies. But she blushes when she moves to you. "H-Hi, (y-your name)..."

Now it was your turn to blush. "Hi, Fluttershy..."

"Aw, cat got your tongues?" Rainbow falls over laughing.

"RD, what's so funny?" you ask. "Jealous much?"

That brought her laughter down somewhat. "A little. Even if I did like you though, I wouldn't be crashing you to Twilight's house."

This brought Fluttershy's blush over to her face, still not feeling entirely forgiven about that.

You grab her hand and she calmer down a bit. "Fluttershy, it's okay. You were elated and I guess you couldn't control yourself."

"Uh, well, that is true..." Fluttershy says, looking away from you.

"I could've cared less about the injuries, matter of fact. I just have way too love for you..."

The Pegasus looks towards you, now with her blush gone. "I guess I wasn't the only one hiding a crush these past years either."

The two of you look lovingly into each others eyes, completely deaf and blind to your surroundings. It was soon that you started to cuddle, pulling each other in towards yourselves.

"Oh, (your name)..."

"Fluttershy..."

The two of you finally kiss, feeling as if it was your first (while your actual one was at yesterday's crash). Savoring the sweet taste of her full lips, you didn't want to let Fluttershy go at all for nothing. But the moment is cut short when...
15211211.title: Nothing new here

choices: "We should hang together. It'll be nice for a change."
"Let's see how they react when we're not here..."
15211212.content:
Who you saw walking down the trail wasn't the average pegasus that was the shy, animal loving one, if not, she's the now starting to be expressive, animal lover, and most beautiful pony here that rivals Rarity's prettyness. Hell, if Spike were here, he would instantaneously change perspective of his crush. Luckily, everything was sorted yesterday sort of.

Walking down was Fluttershy, in a light green knee length dress that balances out her golden coat (yet again), with the same color of heels (which surprised everyone), poofier hair, and above all, makeup. Yes, makeup. Not even Rarity can believe it. If it wasn't for Applejack catching her before she nearly fainted, Spike would be crushed from beside her.

She finally reaches up to your position. It's about time. The whole minute made it feel like she's starring on the catwalk.

"What's everyone looking at?" Fluttershy asks, not looking at all concerned. No one answered, except by Rainbow's jaw falling to the ground.

"Hello, (your name)." She leans in and kisses you cheek, just before you faint.

"Oh, my! What happened!?" Fluttershy exclaimed.

Twilight walks over to you and sees that you're still breathing.

"Don't worry, Fluttershy, he's fine," Twilight answers.

"Phew! Thank goodness."

"Hehehe, serves you right!" Rainbow states.

"What do you mean, Rainbow Dash?"

"If it ain't yer pretty looks, it'll might as well be you becoming way too much for (your name) t' handle," Applejack said. "We already know fer sure that he liked you from the start. Why you makin it diff'cult for this guy?"

"You should've seen him before!" Pinkie Pie charters. "Every time you left, he runs faster than what Applejack or Rainbow can run!"

"Well, I didn't know.."

At least five minutes went by and you started to stir about. Your first sight, after you stand up, was Fluttershy's most beautiful presentation ever. You really can't tell if you have a fever, or if it feels that way because you're blushing so badly.

"H-Hey, Fluttershy..." You really couldn't think of anything else to say. The worst part is that your best pony friends are here.

"Sorry about, you know, making you faint like that."

"That's alright, Fluttershy. I just didn't know you were coming well dressed like that..."

You were subconsciously holding hands. The other ponies were stuck in conversation.

"You see, I told you they would make the perfect couple," Twilight remarks.

"Sure coulda fooled me," Applejack says.

"Oh, they look so cute together! I can't wait to see how it'll all turn out!" Pinkie exclaims.

"What should we do though?" Rarity asks. "Should we all hang together, or leave them to be?"

The ponies get mischievous looks. It was up until Rainbow Dash says...
15211212.title: What the what..?

choices: "We could go back to my place."
152112122.content:
"You are so diabolical, Rainbow Dash," whispers Rarity as she hears the rainbow-maned pegasus's suggestion.


"Okay, but how are we gonna come up with an excuse to leave?" whispers Twilight.


"We don't need one," Rainbow answers. "I bet that no matter what we say, they'll just be happy to be alone together."


To prove her point, Rainbow Dash walks over to you and Fluttershy. "Hey, you guys," she says. "The others and I need to go to that... thing at the... place..."


"Okay, later," you and Fluttershy say simultaneously. With that, the other ponies leave, but they don't go too far. Once they were out of view, they quickly found a spot where they could spy on you two.


"So, Fluttershy," you say. "Since the others are gone, is there anything you want to do?"


The pink-maned pegasus ponders for a moment, wondering if there really was anything she wanted to do. Unknown to the both of you, no matter where you go, your friends will be following close behind.


Finally, Fluttershy tells you what she wants to do.
152112122.title: "Let's see how they react when we'r...

choices: The misfits and school bullies, Guilda, Hoops, and Dumbbell
1521121221.content:
"You know, a stroll through. If you want that is."

To her surprise, you extend your arm, which she takes. The others, not so far, are gradually making their way to make it possible to spy on you. Even though you heard some twigs snap, or bushes rustling, you didn't care.

Once you got to town, everyone, looks at you two, astounded. They always thought you'd be with somepony else, and that Fluttershy would be more... less.

You even heard chatter from the other ponies:

"Is that really (your name) and Fluttershy?"
"I guess she finally did it."
"And I really thought he never would've pulled it through."
"Of course, he always liked her since they met!"
"Is that really Fluttershy in makeup?"
"They look so cute together!"

Once you went through all the chatter, you stroll through to a park that Fluttershy likes to go to every now and then. Once you sit, you both sigh.

"I can't believe it," you comment.

"We just want to take a stroll and all that happens," Fluttershy adds. "But (your name), did you really like me from the start?"

You look at her. Her somewhat pleading big eyes tell you something. "Fluttershy, to be the most heartfelt honest to you, (you grab her hands), yes. I liked-- no, loved you ever since I saw you. You're just so beautiful, kind, and friendly, that it was impossible for me to admit it."

The pegasus looks at you with a surprised look. You thought you screwed up, but realize its not the case when you see her smile.

"(Your name), I, well... I really liked you, too. I would even say I was lucky enough to not faint afterwards once you'd pass me, especially home. I was really excited when homecoming was announced that I really tried to ask you to go with me. Actually, that was the only reason Twilight Sparkle sent that text. But since none of us did, I still can't forgive myself for tackling you yesterday."

You see her blush a bit and look away, remembering the little crash yesterday. Meanwhile, the spying ponies were looking closely, phones ready, and cameras set.

"Fluttershy..?" you start. She looks at you, with that cute gaze that you couldn't resist but to lean in as she does the same. You both slowly, slowly close your eyes, and kiss right there. Shutters went off, but it was practically silent. You hug Fluttershy and she does the same, still savoring her sweet taste of her full lips.

Once Applejack was satisfied, she looked at the upcoming ponies.

"Oh, great," she whispers. "Girls, look who's here." Everyone turns to see...
1521121221.title: "We could go into town,"

15211212212.content:
To the displeasure of the five ponies, three individuals that they really didn't want to see were coming over.


First, there was Gilda, Rainbow Dash's ex-best friend. Rainbow's dislike for this griffin rivaled even yours. She bitterly remembers the day Gilda transferred to Ponyville High. Her reason for doing so eludes Rainbow (or anypony else for that matter) to this day.


Then here was Hoops, the light brown-coated pegasus with a short, unkept dark brown mane. He's one of your frequent tormentors at school. While it doesn't bother you as much as it used to, it was still a pain in the ass to deal with him and his cohort, Dumbbell.


Speaking of whom, the dark brown-coated pegasus with a dirty blonde mane was following close behind. Like his equally dimwitted friend, he constantly harasses you and your friends at school.


These three bullies tended to hang out together, but since they're kindred spirits, that's no shock.


"What do you guys want?" asks Rainbow Dash.


"We heard talk that [your name] and Fluttershy are a couple, and we had to see it to believe it," says Gilda. She then looks at you and Fluttershy leaning close to one another, still oblivious to the fact that all this was going on. "Heh, I guess it is true."


"Well, now that you've seen what ya wanted t' see, y'all can turn tail and go on yer merry way!" says Applejack. "Go on, git outta here!"


"No way," says Hoops. "We have a few things to say to the happy couple."


"Don't worry," says Dumbbell. "We won't be long."


"You're right, you won't!" says Twilight. "Because we're not letting you get near them!"


"Yeah" the other ponies added.


Are your friends able to stop the three bullies?
15211212212.title: Unwanted Encounters

152112122121.content:
While it was still unknown that your pony friends were spying, they now turned to defenders.

Once you let go of Fluttershy, she looks at you, heavily blushing. You feel that you did the same, but smiled afterward. "You want to get out of here, grab a bite to eat?" you ask.

"Sure, (your name)," she replies. "I'd very much like that."

Instead of fancily walking, you two hold hands instead, running with each other.

Meanwhile, the other ponies and griffin were rumbling, they manage to know them out, using Twilight's magic, Pinkie's random items and her Pinkie sense of stuff falling from the sky, which I think is tail twitching or something, and Rainbow's overall determinations. She's still holding a grudge on how she treated everyone, especially Fluttershy.

Albeit tired, the ponies are glad they won.

"Hoo-wee, I didn't think I had this much fun since that time with them buffalo a whiles back," Applejack comments.

"At least finally I give then what was coming," Rainbow adds.

"Yeah, its nice you all feel that way, but where's (your name) and Fluttershy?" Twilight asks.

They look around, then Rarity spots you guys frolicking about.

"Aw, they look so cute together!" She just had to take a photo. "Next time, it goes for photo ID."

Once you and Fluttershy reach Sugarcube Corner, you suddenly hear growling. "What was that?" you ask teasingly.

"(Giggle) I may have been a little hungry since this morning," she replies.

"Well, don't worry, we're here at the sweet shop. Why don't we get something here? If you want."

She nods. Once inside you see Mrs. Cake over at the counter.

"Why, hello, (your name) and Fluttershy!" she greets. "How can I help you?"

"What's today's special? And another thing off topic, where is Pinkie Pie? You'd think shed usually be here when friends cone visit."

"I only saw her in the morning," Fluttershy states. "They said they needed to do something."

The door opened. Behind it was...
152112122121.title: In a way or two

1521121221212.content:
As the door opens, you and Fluttershy hear a familiar bubbly voice.


"Aw, man!" says Pinkie Pie. "I can't believe we lost-" she stops mis-sentence as she sees you and Fluttershy at the counter. She meant to say that she couldn't believe that she and the other ponies lost you and your new fillyfriend. They lost track of you two as they were following you.


"Lost what, Pinkie?" asks Fluttershy.


Pinkie's eyes dart around wildly as she tries to come up with an alibi. The other ponies are just as nervous, remaining quiet as they stand behind Pinkie.


"I can't believe that we lost... Rarity's earring!" she says, finally coming up with an excuse. As if on cue, Rarity sneakily takes of one of her earrings and hides it using her unicorn magic.


"Oh, well that's too bad," you say. "I hope you guys find it."


"I hope so, too," Rarity says. "That earring was part of my favorite pair!" One thing about Rarity was that she was a good actress. Neither you nor Fluttershy suspected a thing.


All of a sudden, your phone rings. Who is on the other line?
1521121221212.title: Cover Nearly Blown

15211212212121.content:
You look at your phone and see that its your dear Auntie Celeste. You definitely need to tell her about your life now.

"Excuse me, ladies, I have to take this," you say. Once outside, you pick up.

"Hello?"

"Hi, (your name)! It's Auntie Celeste. Just calling to see how you're doing."

"Oh, Auntie, its going so great!"

"Hmm? Now why is that?"

"Uh, where do I start? Um, okay. Yesterday, I was helping Fluttershy out with the animals and almost screwed up for asking her to homecoming..."

"Oh, my. I'm sorry, sweetie.

"Don't be! I called her to finally ask, and well, in total elation, she tackled me, agreed, and kissed me!"

"(Giggle) Wow, now that's a way to show love. So you and Fluttershy are dating now, I presume?"

"(Sigh) Auntie, I loved her from the start. Of course we would be."

"Well, I hope you have a wonderful time! Remember, I'm here if you have a problem."

"Thanks, Auntie."

"Oop, I better go now, (your name); they're needing me for an important objective I need to complete."

"Okay, bye!"

"I'll talk with you tomorrow!" You hang up. You start to walk back inside the shop when you see everyone eating. No wonder something felt off.

"Mmm, so you just made this recipe yesterday, Pinkie Pie?" Twilight asks.

"Yup, I'm glad you guys liked it."

You decide to sit down with Fluttershy, but that was before you were pushed by...
15211212212121.title: Auntie Celeste

152112122121211.content:
You hear something break and the other look at you. Via time, you learned that it's usually just yet another attempt for the little one to try and get their cutie marks. All at once they knew what to do, especially since most of the incidents are coincidentally aimed at the Sugarcube Corner.

"(Sigh) Applejack and Pinkie Pie, the cushions, Twilight, the measuring tape, and Fluttershy, over here please."

Just after the things are set up, you hear faint screaming. Now that the measuring tape is down, you'll be able to see what the follies ate up to. Even you think the idea of the Cutie Mark Crusaders is ridiculous. And because of all things going on, you and Twilight even recorded the attempts.

"Three, two, one--" she says just before the door is slammed open and they fall down. "Wow, 4' 9"... and a half. A new record."

"Really?" Scootaloo asks.

"What was our last one?" Applebloom asks.

Rarity checks the record book you made. "Hmm, not much of an improvement than 4' 2". But what, may I ask, were you and you two doing, Sweetie Belle?"

The fillies were a bit ashamed, especially since they know Fluttershy was there. She speaks up, "Well, we sorta tried to test out to see if Scootaloo could handle carrying us, but we crashed with another pony and well..."

"And who was this other pony you collided with?" Fluttershy asks.

"That would be me," said another voice. Who it belonged to was...
152112122121211.title: The little fillies just don't give up

choices: you kick him in the face
152112122121212.content:
"Watch where you going punk I am not in a good mood"say's one of the thugs

"Why don't you look where you going jerk"you say

"Oh I see trying to play brave in front of your girlfriend well lets how well you can take a beating."

"(your name) please don't go to their level it's not worth it."say's Fluttershy

"Better listen to her loser before you regret it"

"Your right these guy are not worth my time they are just lonely and desperate."

"Now you did it kid!!!!!!!!!"

The thug punches you into a table and is about to beat the crap out of you until...
152112122121212.title: a pissed group of thugs.

choices: Suddenly, fluttershy began to sweat as her wings got hard.
Futtershy left the room and you begin to find something to cook.
1521121221212121.content:
You kinda laughed a bit when you did. The thug's nose began bleeding while he tried to hit you again. You luckily dodged him and managed to get up again. You backed away as he tried to punch you, again and again. You looked over and saw fluttershy whining in fear.

BAM! You suddenly took a smack to the face .

Fluttershy began crying as your nose began to bleed too. You felt so terrible seeing her like this, but you're still not taking any shit from this guy.

You reached for one of the chairs next to you and whacked him right on the head. The thug screamed as he fell to the floor.

"Yeah , go (your name) !" Rainbow dash cheered you on.

"Yeah go go go !" Pinkie joined in.

Everyone else just stared in amazment, besides poor little fluttershy with her hands covering up her face.

As the thug tried to get up, you hit him with the chair again, this time the top snapped off of the legs during impact. You were prepairing for another swing when suddenly, he fainted.

You looked at where the other two goons were, discovering they weren't there anymore.

"Holy shit ,(your name), that was awesome!" Rainbow dash exclaimed.

Fluttershy, still in tears, ran over and hugged you tightly. "Oh (your name), thank goodness your alright!" You hugged her back, trying to calm her down.

"C'mon, I'll take you home", you say while stroking her hair.


When the two of you got to the house, fluttershy began to tell you: " (your name), I'm sorry if I was overreacting earlier, it's just that, I love you so much, and when you got punched I ..."

*groooooan*

The moment was ruined by fluttershy's hunger.

"You stay here fluttershy, I'll go cook something for you", you said.

"Your shirts covered in blood, here let me clean it up for you." Fluttershy took off your shirt...
1521121221212121.title: bar ( or bakery) fight!

choices: You both get it together and calm down.
You both ignore it and go further...
15211212212121211.content:
As soon as your shirt was off, Fluttershy blushed and stood nervously still. You look at her, slightly embarrassed that this happened. You couldn't help but see that she's sweating beads and that her wings are fluttering a bit, hence the name (it isn't, lol).

She was the fist to speak. "I... I didn't know... you were well-built, [your name]..."

Grasping your arm, you blush harder than before. "Well... I wouldn't call this..."

You were interrupted as Fluttershy leans against you, letting her hands go around your chest, making her wings flutter even more. Using them to hug you, she immediately kisses you without thinking. You try to resist but eventually kiss back. She lets go with a huge blush that covers her face.

1521121221212121111222221.content:
“Alright then,” says Celestia. “Going back to what happened earlier today, I’ll let it slide this one time, but I don’t want to hear that you’ve gotten into a fight again. Do I make myself clear?”


“Yes, Auntie,” you say. You glance at Twilight and expect her to be chuckling at your expense, but instead she seems to feel sorry for you.


“Alright then. I’ll be on my way,” says Celestia. “Take care, you two.” You and Twilight wave goodbye as the princess flies out of the window.


“I’m going up to my room,” you say as you grab the paper bag and go upstairs. Once you get to your room, you close the door and go into your closet. You use a stepladder to get to the top of the closet and grab a box with a lock on it. This is where you keep your most personal possessions, including a picture of you and Fluttershy from freshman year, your first year in Ponyville. You put the box of condoms in your lock box and place it back in its place in your closet. Just then, you hear a voice,


“[Your name]?”


You’re still standing on the stepladder and the sense of surprise from hearing the voice makes you fall backwards. You brace for impact but instead feel a magical aura surround you, gently setting you on your feet. You look towards your doorway and see Twilight standing there.


“Sorry for scaring you,” she says.


“It’s okay,” you say. “Do you need something?”


“Well, I just wanted to say that… I’m sorry for ratting you out to Princess Celestia. I was just worried, and I thought that telling her what happened was the best thing to do. You’re not mad at me, are you?”


“Meh, not really. I didn’t get in trouble or anything, so it’s fine.”


“So, what were you doing just now?”


“Putting something away in my lock box.”


“You don’t have to keep secrets from me, you know.”


“It’s not just from you alone, Twi. There are some things I prefer to keep to myself.”


“Alright then. I’ll be in my room. Later.”


“Bye.”


Once the unicorn leaves, you let out a sigh. You don’t know if you should be annoyed with her or not. She did say sorry, though, so you can't really stay mad at her. The next day, you go over to the Carousel Boutique to ask Rarity to make an outfit for you.


"[Your name], darling!" she says. "What brings you here on a Sunday?"


"Well, I was wondering if you could make an outfit for me for the dance Friday night," you say.


The unicorn smiles. "No problem! I'll put you on the top of my waiting list," she says. Rarity was your closest friend in Ponyville, and she was also the pony you could trust with a secret. Some would question why, but she has yet to reveal a secret of yours in the almost three years you've known her. "Is there anything specific you want?"


"Only that it's easily removable," you say, thinking about what you and Fluttershy will be doing afterward.


What does Rarity ask next?

"Maybe we should stop spying on them, in case he does," says Twilight.

Meanwhile, you think about how out of character Fluttershy's been acting lately. First she gets herself all dressed up for you only a day after you admitted your feelings for each other. Next, she suggests going back to her place the first chance she gets, and then she practically forces herself onto you, asking you to have sex with her. Her coat was charcoal black, with holes in her arms and legs. Her silky mane was a dark cerulean color, and it went down to the middle of her back. She has a long, deformed horn on her head, a black crown, and tattered wings. To top it all off, she was wearing a long black dress that looked like it's been torn up intentionally.


Your Auntie Celeste has told you about this mare, how she almost ruined the royal wedding between Shining Armor and Princess Cadance, how she led an army of love sucking creatures in an attack against Canterlot, and she looks exactly the way Celestia described her.

info.brief_description: You're a human student at a Ponyville high school. Interesting things are bound to happen.
info.description:
This story takes place in a world where humans and anthro ponies live side by side. You're an average human boy, seventeen years old, and an eleventh grader in high school. In order to get you out in the world, your parents (who are good friends with Princess Celestia) sent you to live in Ponyville to spend your high school years. You live with Twilight Sparkle and are good friends with Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Applejack, Fluttershy, and Spike, of course. You and the main six ponies attend Ponyville High School and are all in the same grade.

This is mainly a romance story where you decide which pony in the Mane Six you want to pursue. Now, on to the guidelines of this story.


1. Aside from choice chapters, please make additions that are at least three to four paragraphs long.
2. The adult ponies can by faculty members at Ponyville High. The mayor of Ponyville, for example, can be the principal.
3. While your love interest can be one pony, you can break up with them and move on to another one, but don't make it happen too early or often.
4. Sex is allowed, and you can be descriptive if you want.
5. There isn't much else I can say aside form "have fun!"
NEW RULE! (Added 10/13/13): PLEASE have good spelling and grammar in your additions. Any chapters submitted after the date this rule has been added will be deleted.

Royalty Edition of this interactive: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1917654-MLP-FIM---HSA-Royalty-Editi...

EDIT 11/8/12: Wow. Only a month and a half and this interactive had already reached 50 chapters and over 650 views! That's faster than any of my other interactives!

EDIT 1/6/13: As of today, this interactive made it to over 100 chapters and almost 1500 views!

EDIT 4/28/13: Over 200 chapters and almost 4000 views in just over 6 months! This interactive of mine is now the one with the most chapters!
